name: Way of the Hunter: Hunter's Advantage Pack
summary: Enhance your hunting experience with the Hunter’s Advantage Pack, featuring three specialized rifles and a versatile electronic caller. Designed for all types of wildlife, this DLC delivers precision, power, and adaptability in every shot.

name: Warlords
summary:
Warlords is a stratigic war game, fought out by eight different players, for the domination of the Kingdom of Illuria. It can be played by one to eight people, with the computer taking the remaining positions. The Kingdom of Illuria, after some severe internal disputes, has setthed under a sullen and uneasy peace. This truce has now disappeared, along with the arch-mage who imposed it. The eight empires of Illuria realize that this is their chance for total domination, a very unstable situation. Forces are being mobilized for conquest, and only one Supreme Warlord will prevail.

Your objectives in Warlords are brutally simple: to eliminate all organized opposition to your rule. To do this, you will have to control all eighty cities in the lands of Illuria, and thereby eliminate all seven opponents. There are many ways to achieve this, and brute force is just one of them. you might ally with dragons or wizards, or have your Heros search out and wield magical swords that will tip the battle in your favour. Clever military tactics and even economic warfare are possibilities too.

name: Watchword
summary: Watchword is the anagram roguelike. Strategically spell real and made-up words while using magical rule-bending books to score massively satisfying combos. Build your deck of letter tiles and find synergies in this endlessly re-playable twist on classic word games.

name: Wargroove: Double Trouble
summary:
Team up and lead the Outlaw faction to strategic victory, with new criminal Commanders in the new free DLC, Wargroove: Double Trouble!

Wargroove: Double Trouble adds a brand new co-op enabled campaign story which introduces Outlaw Commanders; the mighty Wulfar, troublemaker twins Errol and Orla, as well as the maleficent Vesper.

name: War Mongrels
summary: War Mongrels is an isometric real-time tactics game that takes place on the eastern front of World War II. Its story-driven campaign takes inspiration in the grim events that actually took place and the real stories that arose from them.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Armageddon
summary: In this hex-based, turn-based strategy game, players will lead the Imperial forces of the Armageddon Steel Legion and Space Marines from a variety of Chapters against the Ork invasion through over 30 scenarios, on the hostile terrain of the planet and its gigantic Hive Cities.

name: Warthog Launch
summary: Warthog Launch was a browser flash game created by Boll, a prominent member in the Halo community. Due to the popularity of the game, it was included as part of the Limited Edition and Legendary Edition of Halo 3 as a bonus minigame.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Anniversary Edition
summary:
Released as a free update on the base game, this Anniversary Edition includes:

• All DLC
• The full soundtrack for the game
• Classic and brand new wallpapers
• The original manual (pdf)
• The Official Strategy Guide (pdf)
• Ringtone
• The Collector's Edition Artbook (pdf)
• Collectors cards (pdfs)
• The original launch trailer

name: Warcraft III: Reforged
summary: Warcraft III: Reforged is a stunning reimagining of the revolutionary real-time strategy game that laid the foundation for Azeroth's most epic stories. It is a remake in the truest sense, featuring a thorough visual overhaul, a suite of contemporary social and matchmaking features, and more. Command the Night Elves, Undead, Orcs, and Humans as alliances shift and armies clash in this timeless real-time strategy game.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Versus
summary: Versus is a free game mode* providing an entirely new way to play Warhammer: Vermintide 2. Engage in thrilling 4v4 battles, alternating between the Five Heroes of Vermintide and the Skaven Ratmen, all set against the backdrop of the rich Warhammer Fantasy Universe.

name: Warhammer Combat Cards
summary: Warhammer Combat Cards is a digital card game made by Well Played Games in conjunction with Games Workshop.

name: Warhammer Quest: Silver Tower
summary: Bite sized turn-based strategy battles in a Tower of pure Chaos! Dive into one of our huge campaigns, or jump in to a Daily Quest. 20+ Champions from the Age of Sigmar to collect, each with unique gameplay, weapons and skills. Can you take on the Trials of the Summoner?

name: Wario Land II
summary: What kind of no-good ruffians would break into my castle and steal my treasures?! It's that rotten Captain Syrup and that Black Sugar Gang! I'm looking out for bad guys and scavenging for coins as I track down my treasures. If I don't get them all the first time, that's OK. I can go back again and again until I find them all. Captain Syrup doesn't stand a chance against me!

name: Wasteland Angel
summary:
World War III happened and killed most of the world's population. The ones that got toasted were the lucky ones. Survivors live in constant fear of being murdered or enslaved by violent gangs, renegade military units and, of course; mutants.

Outfitted with a heavily armored car, unlimited firepower and a thirst for vengeance, our Heroine - the Wasteland Angel roams the radioactive wastes, travelling from one God-forsaken town to the next, protecting survivors from being enslaved. She's on a mission, to defend those that can't defend themselves.

name: Warframe: The Seven Crimes of Kullervo
summary:
Return to Duviri and delve into a sprawling new island dungeon where the tragic Warframe, Kullervo, awaits your redemption. This strange, floating prison obfuscates both Kullervo’s crimes as well as the mysterious (yet familiar) Warden who binds him under lock and key. Explore the prison’s cells to uncover the story of Kullervo’s misdeeds and wield the power of treachery through his trademark daggers and thirst for vengeance.

As a mainline update It contains an exhaustive list of quality of live changes to the game. The main new content is the 53rd Warframe, Kullervo, and his signature weapons along with the chance to encounter his story missions on a new island in Duviri.
Other Duviri changes include Captain Vor's appearance in Undercroft challenge missions for a chance at new arcanes, Kaithe customization with armor and ephemera, 2 new side missions with Paragrimm's Tomes and Lost Belongings objectives, the return of Kaithe races and 15 new decrees.

name: Wayne Gretzky's 3D Hockey '98
summary: Take on "The Great One" again in this hot sequel to the smash hit voted "Best Sports Game" of '96! With more great features, such as new hidden teams and improved, hard-hitting AI, Gretzky '98 packs a wallop! Includes all 26 teams, each with 17 available players on their actual NHL teams, and you can make player trades or line manipulations to create a powerhouse team of your own. Play 3-on-3, 4-on-4 or 5-on-5 games on either arcade or regulation size hockey rinks, plus exhibition games, full 82 game seasons or a best-of-seven playoff series with full statistic saving capability.

name: Wave Defense: Trappist
summary: Gear up and get going! Defend your outposts from waves of alien enemies with your mech. Build and upgrade your base, protecting the extraction of the mysterious planetary system’s rich resources!

name: Watch Your Nightmares
summary: Watch Your Nightmares is a point-and-click survival horror video fangame creat of Sweetsylveon. The game is based on FNaF 4 with a concept of camera system, and is released on July 31st, 2018.

name: Waratte Iitomo! Tamorinpic
summary:
A Super Famicom four-player party mini-game collection based on the long-running Japanese variety show Waratte Iitomo! and featuring its shades-wearing host Tamori.

Waratte Iitomo! Tamorinpic ("It's OK to Laugh! Tamorinpic") is a party mini-game collection based on the Japanese TV show of the same name. The show was a daily hour-long comedy variety show featuring recurring guests and various skits and interviews, hosted by the shades-wearing comedian Tamori (whose real name is Kazuyoshi Morita). It aired from 1982-2014 and made several longevity records in the process.

The game allows for up to four players, but only two players ever play at once: most of the mini-games are based on completing a task within a set time or with a certain amount of precision, so all players don't need to play simultaneously. Instead, the first pair of players will play each mini-game, followed by the second pair (or two-and-one, if the three-player mode was selected). These mini-games have a comedic edge to them and vary from bowling with a snooker cue to a Simon Says game that involves clapping the correct way to certain goofy poses Tamori makes.

Due to the license, the game was never released outside of Japan.

name: Waves
summary:
Waves is a twin stick shooter that can be played by anyone, but with a high enough skill threshold to keep even the most hardened shooter fan entertained.

Clear the arena of enemies while racking up a big fat Combo with swift kills and well timed Bombs. If it all gets a bit too much you can use your Time Buffer to slow down the action and turn defeat into victory. Players can compete across seven different game modes with online high-score tables and Achievements in their pursuit of twin-stick perfection.

name: Warcraft III: Nirvana
summary: Warcraft III: Nirvana is a melee mod for WarCraft III TFT. It adds several custom races and can be played on any melee map. This project is focusing on renovating WC3, expanding its playability while keeping it well balanced.

name: Water Sort: Color Puzzle Game
summary: The ultimate liquid sorting experience that will captivate your mind and immerse you in a world of vibrant colors!

name: Warpswap
summary: Teleport, swap, and solve puzzles! Use your unique ability to swap places with blocks and uncover the secrets of a lost planet.

name: Wagamama High Spec
summary: Wagamama High Spec is a romance visual novel in which the player assumes the role of Kōki Narumi. With multiple plot lines, the player's choices will steer the story to different endings.

name: War Beans
summary: Wage war against massive hordes of orcs, undead and demons in this survival roguelite. Upgrade and combine epic weapons and talents. Enlist an army to fight alongside you. Embrace the chaos of the battlefield!

name: Wacky Wheels
summary: Nothing beats the excitement of playing against other human racers, and in Wacky Wheels, you can do just that. You and a friend can play at the same computer or you can race against challenging computer opponents who have adjustable degrees of difficulty. Either way, Wacky Wheels is packed with the features you want: non-stop action and variety, heart-racing music and furious 3D point-of-view vivid VGA graphics and animations. It's so fun, you'll hate to finish.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Sanctus Reach
summary: Warhammer 40,000: Sanctus Reach is a 3D turn-based strategy game like you've never seen before: fast, immediate, deep, impressive to look at and incredibly fun! Fight through a dark era of carnage and endless war and lead the Space Wolves in a struggle to defend the last bastion of mankind.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Execution Force
summary:
Unleash the Emperor’s judgement as a new threat casts a shadow over the galaxy. Execution Force introduces the elite Officio Assassinorum, a secretive, deadly force capable of eliminating high-value targets with surgical precision. Utilise their unparalleled stealth and lethal arsenal to turn the tide of battle as you face a new danger in the form of the Tentarus Hive.

Alongside this, take the fight to the forces of Nurgle as you unleash your strike force into the heart of enemy cruisers in brand-new Boarding Action missions, disabling them and claiming the spoils of victory.

name: WallSmashers
summary: an action physics-destruction-based infinite runner where you smash into walls at high speeds in order to accumulated multipliers and points. THIS IS NOT A RACING GAME! See how you stack against other players with our leaderboards (on mobile only for now)

name: Wagon
summary: Wagon is a 1-bit card game where you make tough decisions to try and survive winter on the Oregon Trail.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Duty Eternal
summary: Experience thrilling new missions, a powerful additional class, and all-new ways to decimate the forces of Nurgle in the first major DLC for the critically-acclaimed tactical turn-based RPG.

name: Walled Haven
summary: An open world action-adventure set in the Walled City, a dystopian metropolis where Kung Fu decides all.

name: Warp Bound
summary: In this roguelite auto battler, you've been thrust into an uncharted sector of the Galaxy, discovering friends and foes alike. Traverse different environments, seek out and deal with traders, equip unique parts for your ship, form varied strategies, and fend off a variety of hostile factions.

name: Wabisabi
summary: Wabisabi follows Kousuke, an artist who is struggling to understand himself and what role he plays in the universe. Joining him are the game’s two heroines Haru and Aki, spirits who tend to the shrine in Kousuke’s rural village. After spending a semester away in Tokyo for school, Kousuke returns to his village to spend time with the shrine spirits and possibly discover what his art lacks. Throughout the story, Kousuke deals with the unnerving realization that he will never be his Grandfather, who was a genius artist that gave everything away to move to the village.

name: War Machines
summary:
Online battle tank army war game. Play now and become a top military commander!

Are you a fan of top-quality army & military tank games? Check out War Machines, which offers options for all-out army vs. army war, or play some quick 3-minute online military tank battles for a fast-paced adrenaline rush. War Machines is an epic free online war tank battle game, so download it now on your mobile device and become the world’s best military tank commander!

Fast-paced online shooting game.
Defend your country’s army.
Choose between two explosive modes.
Unlock amazing tanks and become the next star military commander.

KEY FEATURES:
- Fight together in a team or in a free-for-all war
- Stunning next-gen graphics
- Controls optimized for exciting war tank battles
- Unlock the best military tanks to guarantee victory for your team
- Go up against enemy military tanks
- Fight online in World War locations and industrial zones

With two army & military battle game modes to choose from, you can enjoy endless hours of fun with War Machines: the ultimate online battle tank game! Fight online against war robots in industrial military zones, or on World War battlefields in various European cities. Remember, only the best army & military will survive in this tank game!

name: Warzone
summary: A 2D top-down shooter game set in a distant post-apocalyptic future.

name: Wartales: Contract - The Beast Hunt
summary: Hunt the Beast through the mist-laden valleys of Brigga! Unravel the truth behind its cursed existence and follow its trail into its den. But beware, if you wish to survive, you must learn to hunt it.

name: Warfare Reloaded
summary: Saudi Arabia, one of the worlds leading oil suppliers and a key U.S. ally, has been taken over by a highly organized group of radical terrorists. The government is in a state of collapse and turmoil and you have been chosen to lead the United States armed forces to restore control.

name: War Heroes
summary:
Battle players from all around the world in this free, multiplayer action game!

Discover, collect and upgrade 25+ cards with different troops and weapons, from the destructive fighter aircraft to the treacherous landmines! Define your strategy and choose the 8 cards that you will use in the combat. Your decision will make the difference between victory and defeat in this clash!

name: Way of the Warrior
summary: The planet's greatest warriors have been assembled in a citadel, high atop the Himalayan mountains. It is here that only one challenger will survive and have his name etched with magical blood into the Book of Warriors. The tournament will bring together good, evil, mortal, and immortal. The outcome will lie in the hands of one... you. Find the way, noble challenger, find the Way of the Warrior.

name: War of Castle VR
summary: War of Castle VR is a multi-player MOBA VR game.You can fight against computer AI or other players. Unlike traditional games of this genre, it delivers a more realistic battle experience and deeper interaction. Its highly-immersive gaming environment and intense battles puts players directly onto the combat zone.

name: Waddle Words
summary: Waddle, spell, and honk your way to victory in this chaotic word game for 1–4 players!

name: Wanwan Aijou Monogatari
summary:
It's Momo's birthday today, and her parents have a surprise for her: a puppy! She names her new friend Baku, and they two of them rush off to play at the park. While they're playing fetch, Baku finds a curious doll, which springs to life and tells her that the Kingdom of Memories is in trouble: the vegetables are revolting, and she's the only one who can stop them! The doll, Judy, and an alarm clock named Clock lead Momo and Baku there, and so their adventure begins.

Bow-wow Puppy Love Story is a simple Japanese-style adventure game designed for young girls. The majority of the game consists of written dialogue with cute animated characters. There are dialogue choices every so often, though they have only a minimal impact on the story progression. The player can also jump back to specific scenes, and print a variety of stickers with images from the game.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun – Words of Vengeance
summary: Type like your life depends on it in Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun – Words of Vengeance! Brutally decimate hordes of daemonic scum with every keystroke, in this fast-paced rail shooter. None can stand against the might of your WPM (words-per-minute)!

name: Warrior's Way
summary: Warrior's Way is a battle simulation game developed by Spike Chunsoft. Players assume the role of a general on a quest to conquer the world one country at a time. Players amass armies either by encountering other players on StreetPass or using Play Coins to recruit mercenaries, before taking on the leaders of each country. Battles follow a rock, paper, scissors mechanic, in which players assign soldiers to three classes, with each have strengths and weaknesses against the other classes, and pit them against the opponent, the first to win two matches winning the battle and earning a portion of their soldiers. Defeating certain leaders earns materials which can be used to upgrade the player's castle, granting new options. Players encountered on StreetPass will be monarchs if they have StreetPass Battle. The player may choose to greet the monarch peacefully or challenge them to a battle in order to earn more soldiers.

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Eyes of the Nine
summary: In the name of the mighty Tzeentch, god of magic and sorcery, Vortemis the All-seeing and his sworn acolytes seek to open a pathway between Shadespire and the Realm of Chaos. Unlock this warband and play as the Eyes of the Nine in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Drepur's Wraithcreepers
summary: Eternal hunters in service of the Great Necromancer Nagash, this band of Glaivewraith Stalkers are driven ever onwards toward their prey by the ceaseless beating of the Patrician's skin drum. Unlock this warband and play as Drepur's Wraithcreepers in Warhammer Underworlds: Online.

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Thorns of the Briar Queen
summary: Dragged out from her crystal tomb beneath the city of Shadespire, the Briar Queen and her spectral army of geists, and spirits are ready to combat all who trespass in the Mirrored City. Unlock this warband and play as the Thorns of the Briar Queen in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

name: Warcraft Adventures: Lord of the Clans
summary: Warcraft Adventures: Lord of the Clans picks up where Warcraft II: Beyond the Dark Portal ended and develops many of the popular characters and locations first introduced in the Warcraft real-time strategy series. Players return to the land of Azeroth as Thrall, a young virile orc robbed of his heritage after being raised in servitude by humans. Destined to reunite and lead the disbanded orcish clans, Thrall must escape the humans' shackles and return the Horde to dominance.

name: Warlords Battlecry: The Protectors of Etheria
summary: A terrible threat long foretold rises to finish a war waged in prehistory, throwing Etheria into chaos. Will you save or lose your kindred? In this successor-in-the-making to the RPG/RTS Warlords Battlecry, interact with the world and discover myriad new tactics to dominate the battlefield.

name: Warfare
summary: Saudi Arabia, one of the world's leading oil suppliers and a key U.S. ally, has been taken over by a highly organized group of radical terrorists. The government is in a state of collapse and turmoil and you have been chosen to lead the United States' armed forces to restore control. Search and destroy using the latest military hardware from the Abrams tank to the Apache helicopter in realistic settings ranging from the open desert to close-quarters infantry combat. Wear down enemy morale by capturing vehicles, weapons and buildings. You'll need elite forces to destroy the world's best-armed fanatics, bent on world-wide economic collapse. The soldiers who survive will gain experience and move with you from mission to mission.

name: Waffle Spin Ball
summary: Waffle Spin Ball is a chaotic paddleball/pinball-inspired arcade game with 2 x 5 worlds and 25 levels, 10 playable characters, power-ups, power-downs, cheats, and both local and online high score leaderboards for each game mode. Bounce, blast, and climb the global Top 5!

name: Warp Bot
summary:
Explore a mysterious world among the stars with a small robot lost in space.

With no memory of how he got there, he must use his intelligence, energy blaster, and a unique teleportation mechanic to survive deadly traps and challenging platforming.

The game focuses on precision and puzzle-solving, encouraging creative movement and logical thinking.

name: Warcraft Rumble
summary: Warcraft Rumble is a mobile action strategy game where collectible Warcraft Minis come to life to clash in epic melee battles. Whether you choose to play in the massive single player campaign or compete head-to-head in epic PvP battles, prepare to experience the true meaning of joyful chaos!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Adepta Sororitas
summary:
A new faction joins the war for Gladius Prime: the Adepta Sororitas, with eighteen new units and unique gameplay mechanics.
The Adepta Sororitas, also known as the Sisters of Battle, are the militant arm of the Adeptus Ministorum.

name: Way of Boy: Another Way
summary: Way of Boy: Another Way is a 2D action-adventure game in the series “Way of Boy”. You will plunge again into the so-called "Alternative Russia" in the shoes of the new protagonist, which is the exact opposite of the former. This will be reflected not only in the plot, but also in the gameplay, as you run in an opposite direction, an atypical direction for most platformers.

name: Walking on Ice
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure in Walking On Ice, a mobile game where quick thinking and strategic moves are your best allies. Test your brainpower as you guide your character across icy terrains to reach the level exit. Can you solve the puzzle and escape the frozen maze?

name: War Robots: Frontiers - Lancelot Rising
summary: Push beyond your limits with new battle supplies.

name: Wai-wai de Q: Aki no Daikansha Matsuri! - Dai-1-kai
War Dogs: Red's Return
summary: Follow Red as he faces challenges to uncover the reason behind the current state of chaos in the suburbs, in this retro beat' em up inspired classic.

name: Wandering Sword: Mount Pack - Majestic Steeds
summary: Wandering Sword - Mount Pack: Majestic Steeds is an expansion pack for the game's main body Wandering Sword, which includes 6 types of mounts.

name: Wario: Master of Disguise
summary:
The world's most low-down and ornery garlic-lover never lets a get-rich quick scheme pass him by. Wario: Master of Disguise opens with our money-mad hero taking a break from being a shady software impresario to watch a TV show about a master thief. Working himself up into a lather of jealousy, Wario leaps through the screen and embarks on his own glamorous globe-trotting career as a thief.
With the helpful advice of a mustachioed magic wand named Goodstyle, you'll soon learn how to use your DS stylus to draw specific designs on Wario to give him new costumes. Break into exotic locations, from a luxury liner & watery ruins to an Egyptian pyramid, all in the hopes of grabbing as much treasure and loot as Wario can carry.

name: Wanko of Marriage: Welcome to the Dog's Tail!
summary: Toya Inuzuka is the successor to the family shrine but dreams of becoming a pastry chef. Complicating things further are these two fluffy-eared and bushy-tailed messengers of god, Koharu and Azuki dream to marry Toya... The three of them will have to work together to fulfill their dreams!

name: Wallaby!! Usagi no Kuni no Kangaroo Race
summary: In this game the player bets on races. The twist is, the racers are wallabies. They also have rabbits in their pouches. The game takes place in a world largely inhabited by the said rabbits, but there are other animals, such as koalas who serve as bookmakers. The game also features managerial elements, as the players must manage their racers. The player can choose to play as one of four rabbits and name them. The racing itself is non-interactive, the only option being to change focus from one wallaby to another. The player can watch a race whether they've made a bet or not.

name: Walt Disney's The Jungle Book Rhythm N' Groove
summary: Sampling a good beat from Dance Dance Revolution, Disney Interactive and Ubi Soft have a new groove going in Jungle Book: Rhythm n' Groove. The game brings all of your favorite characters from Disney's animated movie The Jungle Book and gives them something to dance to. You get to see Baloo, Mowgli, King Louie, and others get their Jungle Boogie going to remixed Jungle Book songs like "Bear Necessities". Two players can battle it out for King of the Jungle in two-player dance-offs. Yo Bagheera... Do the Funky Panther!

name: Warriors of Waterdeep
summary: "Assemble your team of heroes to fight deadly enemies across the Forgotten Realms"

name: Walt Disney World Quest: Magical Racing Tour
Warm Snow: The Ash of Nightmare
summary: The Ash of Nightmare DLC will introduce a new mechanic that will be at the core of the DLC, the Nightmare system, as well as five new bosses, six true and false endings, 30+ new Nightmare abilities, a hundred combos, and several new NPC skins!

name: Wanting Shock
summary: A fun murder mystery project, turns into a deadly game...

name: Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus
summary: At the heart of Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus lies a richly detailed tactical game, played out as intense fast-paced skirmishes in PVE campaigns and tightly competitive PVP battles, as well as massively collaborative guild boss fights. With a deep and ever-expanding story penned by renowned Warhammer writer Matt Forbeck, Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus will tell stories across factions, as players build and customize their armies with epic and legendary units from the Ultramarines, Necrons, Adepta Sororitas, Black Legion, and many more to be revealed. Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus has something for every type of player.

name: Wayne's World
summary:
Wayne's World is an adventure game based on the movie with the same name. The game itself is a classic point and click adventure, and should not be confused with the platform game based on the movie.

You play both Wayne and Garth, and you can switch between them at any time. The plot is simple; In an attempt to save their tv-show, Wayne and Garth decide to hold a pizza-thon (a charity show with a pizza-theme) in order to raise money. In order to be able to hold the pizza-thon Wayne and Garth must embark on several quests to collect items and hire people they need for the show. The adventure includes participating in babe-jeopardy, joining a biker's gang and baking pizza. The graphics are in 2D and the sound contains several samples from the movie.

name: Walker
summary:
It's the most awesome machine of mass destruction ever to stalk your screen. Fitted with the most powerful twin cannons yet developed and a real mean attitude, the Walker has the destructive powers of an H-Bomb and the charisma of a Kalashnikov.

Featuring a unique control system which gives you total control over the movements and attack capabilities of this fearsome war monster, the only thing Walker leaves to the imagination is the smell of battle!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Lord of Skulls
Wai-wai de Q: Haru no Saiten Special - Dai-2-kai
Wattson the Bulb
summary: A metroidvania platformer set in a bizarre world. Master unique abilities and combine them in creative ways to overcome challenges over a hundred hand crafted levels. Speed through to find the fastest route or explore at your own pace to unlock everything — a tough but rewarding adventure awaits.

name: War of Warship
summary: Command history's most iconic war vessels as you build your own massive naval fleet. Level up important tech modules and prepare to dominate the oceans!

name: War Wind II: Human Onslaught
summary: War Wind: Human Onslaught offers a great variety of vehicular, mechanised and special units, with intense and exciting maps, and a rich array of options, graphics and sounds, along with a combat model that offers a dynamic balance of play. All this, plus the addition of the human element make War Wind: Human Onslaught a compelling must-play for any real-time strategy fan.

name: Wanderling
summary: Wanderling is a no-combat roguelike platformer about exploration. Die, retry, and mark your path deeper into a dungeon filled with traps and enemies. You get 8 tries to gain the upgrades and map knowledge needed to clear each dungeon.

name: Wanna Run Again
summary: Wanna Run Again is a Platorm Jumping And ADV Type Game. Lead Character-Mew, pass over 16 different game stage inside her own dream.

name: Warhammer Survivors
summary: Thrust into a universe of relentless war, become the embodiment of bullet hell in Warhammer Survivors, a fast-paced roguelite survivors game. Play as characters from the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer: Age of Sigmar universes, collect and evolve iconic weapons and destroy endless swarms of enemies.

name: War Era Lumberjack
summary: "War era Lumberjack" is a mini-game in the process of making a simulation game during the Warring States period in Japan.

name: Watch Tower
summary: Casual arcade with clicker elements! Defend the Kingdom from invasion! Take control of the last surviving tower and a group of archers to stop the army of evil creatures.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Regicide
summary: Regicide, the strategy game based on chess set in the classic Warhammer 40,000 Universe from Games Workshop is an adaptation of 'Regicide', a board game described from the Warhammer 40,000 universe with similarities to the M2-era chess; played by mankind for over thirty-eight thousand years. Regicide blends board-game strategy mechanics with dynamic tactical abilities.

name: Wan Nyan Doubutsu Byouin: Pet no Oisha-san ni Narou!
summary:
Pet kept under various owners can simulate an important job of curing injuries and diseases, and while playing the game, you will foster animal! The stage is an animal hospital, you will take good care of various kinds of Wannyan at once! Appearing 30 kinds of sesame nihon!

A total of 20 types of Oshigoto games are included! In a hospital, as you do your job well, you will be able to leave more responsible roles. Rehabilitation to injury treatment, every day until your care, a wide range of work has become a game!

Holiday fun There are two days off every month. On this day, you can enjoy things other than work. In thetown there are shopping buildings, parks, movie theaters, etc. You can go out with hospital colleagues and my pets.

You can also enjoy coordinating fashion and interior! More than 700 kinds of fashion items are available for women & men! There are 24 kinds of hair styles you can choose! In addition you can choose from 5 different colors! There are 240 interior items in total! You can make a nice room depending on your ingenuity!

name: Warriors of Titus
summary: Warriors of Titus is a first-person MOBA (Mutliplayer Online Battle Arena) for VR. Finally you can be immersed in a MOBA as you battle to reclaim Titus.

name: Waku-waku Volley
summary: Waku Waku Volley is a volleyball game that features different game modes: World Mode: Classic mode with teams of 6 players in which the game features 8 different countries to choose from: Italy, Netherlands, Russia, Cuba, Brazil, China, Japan & USA. 2 human players can play in the same team.

name: Warriors: Legends of Troy
summary: From the creators of Dynasty Warriors comes an unbelievable game that tells the tale of the epic Trojan War. In this ancient time, men and gods fought alongside one another for eternal glory. Carve your name into history as you experience amazing action and incredible mythology.

name: Wavecade
summary: Wavecade is a sci-fi, arcade-style, shoot-em-up where YOU control the speed of the game. Destroy blocks in style as you collect powerups and avoid hazards. How far can you go? Set your own rules and unlock your favourite mode to play.

name: Wahm
summary: "A surreal psychological horror game where chaos and fear collide. The full game is being released in chapters, with each update adding a new level and deepening the experience

name: War Over the Mideast
summary: Tactical wargame simulating modern air warfare conflicts in the Middle East, part of John Tiller's Modern Air Power series.

name: Watashi ha Joyuu ni Naritai no
summary: This is a short visual novel about a girl who has lost sight of the reason for her dreams to become an actress.

name: Warne Shtartik
summary:
Show Me Your Smartness is a fun group quiz game between two teams, specially designed for challenging family gatherings and diwaniyas. Test your knowledge in various fields such as culture, history, sports, and art, and compete with your friends to see who knows the most.

The game contains a large collection of questions categorized by category, with varying difficulty levels to suit all ages. Each team chooses its own question and earns points for correct answers. The goal is to collect the most points and win the challenge.

name: Waffle Kitty
summary: Waffle Your Way to the Purrfect Picnic!

name: Wai-wai de Q
summary: The first season of Wai-wai de Q (later called Satella-Q), comprised of 4 episodes.

name: Wasteland 2: Director's Cut - Digital Classic Edition
summary:
From the Producer of the original Fallout comes Wasteland 2, the sequel to the first-ever post-apocalyptic computer RPG.
The Wasteland's hellish landscape is waiting for you to make your mark... or die trying. With over 80 hours of gameplay, you will deck out your Desert Ranger squad with the most devastating weaponry this side of the fallout zone, test the limits of your strategy skills, and bring justice to the wasteland.

name: Ware's Laboratory
summary: Anti-piracy measures are now active. Your game has turned into a nightmare. Crawl through corrupted levels, read notes from a malicious developer, and face the nature of evil itself.

name: Warcraft: Guardians of Azeroth 2
summary: Guardians of Azeroth 2 is a total conversion mod for Crusader Kings 3 set in the Warcraft universe by Blizzard Entertainment which harnesses the latent potential of storytelling through exploring the societal and interpersonal dynamics of the world like never before. Relive the harrowing years of strife first told in the beloved strategy games and the early years of World of Warcraft as you chart a new saga for Azeroth and cement a legacy to last the ages.

name: Watch Where You're Going
summary: A multitasking game about texting and walking. Get bombarded with messages, search for answers through the apps on your phone, and send answers back, all while making sure you don't walk into a pole.

name: Watch the Cornline VR
summary: VR game about shooting scarecrows. Stop them before they get out of the field. Earn points, unlock maps and beat records. Try different modifications and break new records.

name: Warframe: Valkyr Unleashed
summary:
ADDITIONS:

- New Warframe
- New Weapons and new Prime Gear:
- New Damage Model 2.0!
- New Customizations
- New Decorations for the Dojo
- New Tile Set: Corpus Gas City
- New Enemies and new boss
- New System: Trading 1.0!
- New System: Codex and Scanner
- New Mods
- New Resource Drone
- The Hunt for Alad V

name: Warframe: TennoCon 2024 Digital Pack
summary: Instantly add this year's exclusive TennoCon items to your Arsenal, available for a limited time only!

name: Warframe: Shadows of the Dead
summary:
ADDITIONS
- New Warframe: Nekros
- New Prime Warframe: Mag
- Survival Missions Return!
- Survival now takes place in procedurally generated levels, allowing greater mission variety, challenge, and replayability.
- Weekly leaderboards are now live for all survival missions on the Starchart!
- All Raid Void Keys have been retroactively replaced with Survival missions.
- A handful of our new mods can be found by playing Survival missions, good luck!
- The Conclave
- New Level Sets: Orokin Derelict Spacecrafts.
- New Sentinels!
- New boss: Infested Golem
- Level Expansion - Grineer Settlement
- New Weapons!
- New Clan weapons!
- New Prime Weapons in the Void!
- New Mods!
- New Customization Options:
- Clan Dojo Level update/props:
- All Grineer now speak "Grineer", a language capable of communicating their barbaric ways!

name: Warframe: Sisters of Parvos Waverider Pack
Warframe: Chains of Harrow
summary: In response to a disturbing transmission from Palladino, the Red Veil Syndicate's spiritual medium, Tenno are compelled to investigate a dark, mysteriously abandoned Steel Meridian spacecraft found adrift. Inside the vessel, lights flicker and emergency lights strobe. All is quiet except for whispers of "Rap. Tap. Tap," heard echoing throughout the lifeless craft. What does it all mean? Players must uncover the terrifying reality of what happened onboard, how the Red Veil might play a part in it, and more.

name: Waifu Aim Trainer
summary: Now you can train your aim with waifus. Enjoy and relax while shooting waifus!

name: Warframe: Echoes of Duviri
summary:
This update adds Wisp Prime along with her signature weapons Fulmin Prime and Gunsen Prime. These additions replace Nidus Prime, Strun Prime and Magnus Prime which have now been added to the Prime Vault.

Other additions include a new drifter melee weapon Argo & Viel, new Undercroft tiles with a Jackal assassination mission, 5 new Incarnon weapons, 4 new Warframe augment mods, 4 new Duviri decrees, and a Duviri dojo room that allows you to free roam on the Harbinger’s Pass and Courtier’s Bliss islands.

name: Ward Off Evil
summary: Ward Off Evil is an open world strategy RPG set in an apocalyptic sword & sorcery world. Create your character, rally an army, and roam the wastes as you battle to avert, or bring about, the end of the Cycle.

name: Wanba Warriors
summary: Have you got what it takes to be a Wanba Warrior? Step into the absurd world of calligraphy combat and prepare to lay the smackdown upon all who dare to oppose you, dishing out damage with your chosen ink brush of brutality!

name: Warp Drive
summary:
WARP DRIVE is a fast-paced, arcade style racing game with a brand new way to drive: instantly TELEPORT around the track to find shortcuts and hidden routes! Take control of your QUAD ROTOR RACER, equip a Warp Module, and enter a series of high-speed tournaments to test your skills and creative driving abilities. Drive on the ceiling, jump huge canyons and race up waterfalls in an epic inverted racing battle!

Compete in a series of dynamically generated tournaments, with random options providing a different experience every time you play! UPGRADE your car between races, gradually adding more capabilities to DRIFT, BOOST, or WARP your way to victory. Follow the advice of your outspoken manager, Lenny, or just ignore whatever he says... what do aliens know about racing, anyway?!

WARP DRIVE: Race! Warp! Win!

name: WanderersTip
summary: Stranded on an island with a weird cult obsessed with calling themselves "happy ducks." Sneak around, explore quirky places, and uncover hilarious secrets with darker twists. How deep into the duckit hole will you go? Wanderer's Tip—a pixel-art adventure where humor meets mystery.

name: Warrior Lords
summary: Warrior Lords offers a furious medieval arcade experience, drawing inspiration from classic beat 'em ups. Battle through Western Europe wielding cold steel, delivering powerful kicks and summoning dragons. Choose from 6 unique heroes and defeat your rivals in a quest for supremacy.

name: War
summary: War is an unlicensed arcade-like game made for the Famicom by Hummer Team.

name: Warcraft II: The Dark Saga
summary: Warcraft II: The Dark Saga is the console version of Warcraft II: Tides of Darkness and its expansion built on. It is the same as the original product but with new features.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Lex Imperialis
summary: "Lex Imperialis" is the second story expansion for Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, featuring 15 hours of compelling gameplay, a new companion, Familiars, and an entirely new faction: the Adeptus Arbites.

name: Wanderness
summary: A tranquil cozy game made from beautiful panoramic photographs with a soothing nature soundscape. Relax and calm your mind with a slow walk in the realistic world of Wanderness.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus II
summary: Fast-paced tactical combat meets strategic management in this sequel to the acclaimed Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus. Take control of either the ancient and deathless Necron legions or the techno-religious acolytes of the Omnissiah, with the fate of a world in your hands.

name: Waifu vs. Evil
summary: Waifu vs Evil is a first-person action horror game set in a small abandoned town that has been attacked by an alien.

name: War for the Overworld: Underlord Edition
Warriors Orochi 3: Ultimate
summary: Warriors Orochi 3 Ultimate is an enhanced version of the hit action game Warriors Orochi 3, once again combining the much loved heroes of the Dynasty Warriors and Samurai Warriors series. The mythology of the Orochi universe expands with a new main storyline, which brings the heroes together again into the chaos of battle as they are summoned upon by a mysterious stone. The adventure is complemented by side stories offering over 175 scenarios and endings to uncover, including the ability to battle from the point of view of various characters and even "what if" hypothetical stages that exist in a parallel world.

name: Watcher From the Void
summary: You’re a night-shift nurse called to help a deaf patient after an accident. But as you explore his house, strange things happen. In Watcher from the Void, you must collect key pieces to escape while avoiding a deadly presence. Use stealth and distractions to survive the night In this horror game.

name: Wake Up The Box
summary: Mr. Box sleeps too much. Wake him up in this physic based puzzle game.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Ultramarines Champion Pack
summary:
Honour your Chapter's proud martial heritage with the Ultramarines Champion Pack, granting you a unique full-body Power Armour skin and a Heavy Bolter skin featuring the colours and iconography of the warriors of Ultramar.

The cosmetics in this DLC can only be equipped in the game’s Operations and Eternal War modes.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Imperial Fists Cosmetic Pack
summary:
Honour your Chapter's proud martial heritage with the Imperial Fists Cosmetic Pack!

This Pack contains more than 40 cosmetic items and options including chapter heraldry for the left and right pauldrons, decals, unique helmets, knee markings, and colour packs from 8 Imperial Fists Successor Chapters

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Wrath of the Damned
summary: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf is a card-driven turn-based tactical game which features RPG elements, containing a single player campaign, survival and PvP modes. Win these battles using the arsenal of weapons, abilities and cunning of the sky warriors. The Wrath of the Damned DLC includes a new PvE arena marking the next step in the evolution of the acclaimed The Fall of Kanak mode, new heroes, and a new set of cards for the main game and new achievements.

name: War and Magic: Kingdom Reborn
summary:
War and Magic: Kingdom Reborn – A free 4X wargame combining real-time and turn-based tactical gameplay. The choice of more than 10 million players all over the world.

The fantasy tactical multiplayer online role-playing simulation strategy wargame has creatively inserted chessboard gameplay into battles, making it possible to fulfill the needs of war and battle strategy mania, board game (chess) fans and 4X gamers. As the lord, you could manage the entire city and use military strategies to fight other lords. Also, you could fight in person to maximize your tactical wisdom in chessboard battle playing, marshaling heroes and soldiers to win every battle. Simple rules, easy to start yet capable of mobilizing your brain’s full tactical potential.

name: Wartime Prologue
summary: Wartime Prologue is a fast-paced space shooter game that requires strategy and skill! You are a core member of the invasion fleet, where your task is to clear and secure the way to the planet for the approaching mother ship.

name: Warriors All-Stars
summary: Warriors All-Stars is a crossover game that features characters from multiple Koei Tecmo published franchises and games. Along with some original characters, the game not only features an extensive battle system, but also an abundance of content for players to enjoy outside of combat! This includes the Sanctuary, which surrounds the game’s mighty Hot Springs.

name: Wandering Memories
summary: In this short and cozy game, you restore memories by matching forgotten objects in the environment with their counterparts in the ghost’s recollections. Each discovery unveils a piece of your story and bringing emotions.

name: Warfront
summary: Fire rains from the gloomy skies. Creatures screech in the distance. Nowhere is safe. Step into the chaos and fight for survival in this horrifying round-based Infected Survival experience. Only the strongest will endure. See you on the Warfront. GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND IS A STUDENT PROJECT

name: Wagotabi
summary:
Wagotabi is an educational journey that will teach you Japanese from the zero. It relies on a new methodology which prioritizes which Hiragana, Katakana or Kanji you should learn and will help you dive deeper in the language immersion from the very start.

Embark on this transformative journey through real Japanese prefectures, immersing yourself in the culture, language, and daily life. Connect with locals, navigate new surroundings, and witness the surprises that unfold at every turn. Feel the sense of belonging as you make strides in understanding and interacting with Japan's rich environment.

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Garrek's Reavers
summary: This warband, led by the brutal killer known as Garrek Gorebeard, are frenzied cannibals, mortals whose dark excesses have drawn them ever further into the thrall of the Blood God. Blinded by battle madness, lost to the exultant sensations of combat, they care for nothing but the kill.

name: Watch Out
summary: Watch out, is intended to be a "I gotta kill 5-10 minutes somehow"-game. It's a Arcade racing game where you only objective is to get as high score as possible. The only thing you have to look for, is your time, where you get time added each road you complete, and the pedestrians by not hitting them.

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Sepulchral Guard
summary: Sworn to the God of Death's service, the Sepulchral Warden and his fleshless undying swarm the streets of Shadespire. Their sheer numbers overwhelm all who would oppose them. Unlock this warband and play as the Sepulchral Guard in Warhammer Underworlds: Online.

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: The Chosen Axes
summary: Honor, gold, and a desire to banish the curse that haunts the city of Shadespire - these are what drive the mercenary Fyreslayers. Unlock this warband and play as The Chosen Axes in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: The Farstriders
summary: Clad in gleaming sigmarite and armed with heaven-forged weaponry, the grizzled hunters of the Stormcast Eternals are the sworn enemies of Chaos. Unlock this warband and play as The Farstriders in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

name: Warpfire
summary: WarpFire was an action point-and-click browser game set in outer space. Explore space, hyperloop between regions, collect resources, kill space pirates and fight against other players.

name: Wacky Zoo GP
summary: Skid, jump and bump to first place with the help of the boosts, bombs, rockets & more! Blast your way around Wacky Town, bash your way around the Jungle tracks, and generally throw all you can grab at those who dare race ahead of you! Practice with the weapons in the Quick Races, get your name up in lights in the Time Trail records, and take on (or blow up!) the best to win the coveted trophies in the Tournaments to become top of the Wacky Zoo GP!

name: Warrior Epic
summary: Warrior Epic was a free-to-play MMO. It is an action RPG with a gameplay style similar to the Diablo games. Players start with a single generic hero, but quickly acquire more, introducing an element of warrior management. Warrior Epic uses instanced game sessions to allow players to quickly move between games with their friends, and keep each play session short. Once players join a game room, they are given a mission to complete that lasts between 10 to 15 minutes. The game starts with a brief tutorial, that leads directly into the main story arch. The classes include Assassin, Devotress, Dungeon Archer, Illusionist, Pangolan, and Pit Fighter.

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Quests and Contracts
summary: Have you been dying to get a splendid new hat for your favourite hero? Or how about that axe that you just never seem to roll for? Well, the wait is finally over! In this new FREE DLC for Vermintide we are introducing a means for you to get the loot of your dreams. All you have to do is complete the objectives and collect your reward.

name: Wardens Rising
summary: A Coop PvE Action Hero Shooter with MOBA-like base defense elements. Protect cores from massive enemy invasions by using abilities, a custom tech-loadout and building defense towers.

name: Wanted: Weapons of Fate
summary: Wanted: Weapons of Fate is a video game developed by Grin and published by Warner Bros. Interactive and distributed by Universal Studios based on the film of the same name. It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360

name: Wars Across the World
summary: WAW is a unique game concept which aims at simulating in one single system ALL conflicts throughout the world (and beyond) from Prehistoric times to nowadays, from grand massive wars to asymmetrical conflicts.

name: Warfare 1944
summary: Warfare 1944 is a World War II tactical shooter similar to games such as Red Orchestra, Forgotten Hope, and Battlefield 1942. The game is developed by the community development studio Drakeling Labs, and is currently in early access.

name: War Saber
summary: War Saber is a physics-based VR saber combat game that allows players to engage in intense duels featuring full dismemberment. Combine your saber fighting skills with a number of powerful abilities to become the ultimate warrior.

name: Watch Your Ride
summary: Watch Your Ride is a game to challenge your biking experience. Choose your character and bicycle to test your skills and win a cup. Race to the finish line as fast as you can and try not to crash. Enjoy your ride!

name: War Rats: The Rat em Up
summary: Be a rat. Kill the rats. Sidescrolling shooter meets tower defence with a sprinkle of RPG elements. A hand-drawn rat-filled side-scrolling looter-shooter moba-lite 2D gore-fest inspired by that brutal 90s gaming feel of yore.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Karak Azgaraz
summary: Karak Azgaraz is a free new content update for Warhammer: Vermintide 2. It contains three newly remastered adventure maps from the fan-favorite DLC of the first Vermintide game.

name: Wall Pipe
summary: Wall Pipe is one of many Pipedream / Pipemania / Oilswell type games released by Soleau Software. This game plays pretty much the same as the games previously mentioned: Lay out pieces of pipe so that the oil continues to flow. You're given 30 seconds before the oil starts moving. The interface is a bit confusing to me: You need to click the mouse to select the next piece, which then disappears, so you'd better remember what type of piece you're placing. I also encountered a weird bug: The clock continues to tick down while you're in the options menu, but the game apparently only checks when the clock hits 0 while you're in the actual game. So the clock ticked below 0 while I was in the options, and was at -5 when I returned to the game. The oil never flowed and I had to quit the game! Other than the weird bug and the confusing interface design choice, it does work, but there are better Pipedream clones out there, several from Soleau itself.

name: Wake Up
summary:
Wake Up is a thrilling 2D/3D adventure game made by R16studio. Dive into a world full of mystery, puzzles, psychological horror, and tension where every choice matters.
Are you ready to wake up and find the truth or maybe not.

name: War Lords
summary: Warlord is a strategy game set in a fantasy world filled with mythical creatures. As a commander, you will build and lead your own army. Experiment with unique strategies and tactics to dive into an unmatched experience across various game modes.

name: Waxy: The Wick and The Witch
summary:
Welcome to Waxy: The Wick and the Witch, a magical adventure where you play as a candle exploring the attic of a witch’s house.
This is a third-person 3D puzzle platformer that challenges you to master the power of fire while managing your wax before it melts away.

name: Waifu Cards
summary: Welcome to the fairytale castle of sweets, where charming waifu and exciting card game Go Fish are waiting for you!

name: Wayfarers Edge
summary: Venture into a perilous and once impassable mountain range in Wayfarers Edge! An RPG focused on traversing unknown frontier lands in a fantasy/western setting to take hold of your future. Travel together with other brave settlers and build bonds to help overcome the dangers together!

name: Warship
summary: This game takes players on an adventure soaring through a stormy sky.

name: Warplock
summary: A randomly generated action rogue-like, where you will rely on the use of magic and portals to warp your way through endless waves of hostile magical beings.

name: Warmongers
summary: This game contains no Pay to Win. Warmongers is a turn by turn card game that contains over 340 unique Cards. You control Creatures, Magics and Equipment to win against enemy players. In full 3d with visual effects for every Card!

name: Warna
summary: WARNA, a dating sim set in an Indonesian high school—with pixel art! Choose between three main romance options as you unravel the game’s story!

name: Warden
summary: An adventure, action, RPG, sim game featuring high mobility combat, branching dialog driven objectives and endings. A sell-sword and bounty hunter at the top of your game you'll cross a kingdom, meet people, learn agendas, talk around, stealth past or carve up opponents, maybe be a hero, or not.

name: Wall Street Raider
summary: Wall Street Raider offers the deepest stock market simulations in gaming history. Control publicly traded corporations, futures, options, and even crypto. Whether you want to make billions in equities, short-sell overvalued stocks, or hedge risk using derivatives, the market is yours to conquer!

name: Wanderers
summary: Interstellar Action Roguelite with a deckbuilding twist. Collect valuable RAM upgrades, combine your abilities, and manifest greatness.

name: War Blade
summary: War Blade is a Fight-for-survive arena game in era of cold weapon. Players will fight with only one teammate, against all kinds of deadly threaten. Only the toughest team can collect the legendary weapon and hero souls, survive to be the last one in the unknown battlefield.

name: Warrior Mage or Rogue alike
summary: Customize your hero by choosing your base stats, class, weapon load-out, and passive skills! Your build determines how fast you run, how high you jump and of course how much damage you deal! Test your build on a monster-slaying adventure, leveling up as you go.

name: Walking in Fog
summary: A first-person live-action crime suspense interactive experience. Multiple story branches and endings — Dozens of story branches and six different endings. Live-action performances and on-location shooting — Real actors and real settings enhance immersion in both the plot and characters.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack
summary:
Bear the colours of the Ultramarines Successor Chapters with the Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack!

This DLC contains more than 30 cosmetic items and options from 12 Ultramarines chapters.

name: Warehouse Simulator
summary: Step into the steel-toe boots of a warehouse operator and experience the grind, pressure, and reward of running your own logistics hub. Pick items, pack orders, manage contracts, hire workers, and grow your empire — one box at a time.

name: WarGround
summary: 'Warground' is a turn-based strategy that aims to be casual. Use 26 units of 6 troops to win the battle.

name: War Hospital: X-ray
summary: In this exclusive chapter, you get to discover Marie Curie's story, and how she contributed to military medicine. You decide how best to use this technology to tackle new challenges.

name: Walpurgisnacht
summary: Memory of forest house at dusk.

name: Wash Cleaner Simulator
summary: Scrub, wash, and power through every messy challenge.

name: Warfleet Captains
summary: Take direct command of massive sci-fi warships as you lead them into epic fleet engagements. Join up with your friends and experience cool fleet combat scenarios together!

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Tempestfall
summary: Battle the forces of Nighthaunt in this VR-exclusive action-adventure Warhammer Age of Sigmar game. Wield iconic weapons of a Lord-Arcanum and deliver Sigmar's justice using motion-based abilities and magic across the realm of Death.

name: Warriors: Abyss - Hack'n'Dash Ultimate Edition
summary: A set of 200 costumes & items to help heroes hack'n'dash as they traverse Hell.

name: Wanderer's Guide to Ocean and Islands
summary: Wanderer's Guide to Ocean and Islands is a game that combines elements of a walking simulator and a visual novel.

name: War On Christmas
summary: Help an undead girl, Bitey, pay her debt to Santa and collect all the presents he's lost before Christmas!

name: War Shore
summary: A tower defense game that will bring challenge and many hours of fun. Get ready for battle in this amazing naval-themed game.

name: Warframe: The War Within
summary: The Grineer Empire grows stronger as a cryptic adversary surfaces. What secrets does the Grineer Empire keep? Underpowered, unprepared and forced out of your comfort, you must find it in yourself to improvise, not just to save yourself but the fate of all Tenno. The Queens' Fortress awaits, where both Warframe and Operator will be pushed past their limits as they slowly unravel mysteries about the Tenno's past and their true capabilities.

name: Watch Dogs: Legion - Season Pass
summary: The season pass includes one major expansion with two episodes, extra missions, four iconic heroes with unique abilities, and immediate access to the original Watch_Dogs Complete Edition.

name: War Never Changes
summary: A clicker about War

name: Wayward Harbor
summary: Short first-person horror experience with a unique mirror mechanic. Escape from an invisible monster that can be only seen in the reflection.

name: Wastelanders
summary: A dystopian turn-based strategy game where your moves are made manifest through a colorful selection of combat cards. Assemble your deck, exploit Clashes to turn the tides in your favour, and survive long enough to learn the secrets of the Wasteland.

name: Way of the Hunter: Wild Expeditions
summary:
Way of the Hunter: Wild Expeditions is the ultimate compilation of hunting grounds all over the world. In this authentic hunting simulation, you can explore the vast the in-game wilderness and fulfil all your hunting fantasies. The wide world of Way of the Hunter allows you to follow the many storylines in hunting grounds all over the world, master the challenges of ethical hunting and solve intriguing cases of unethical behaviour. Or venture out in free hunt, and explore the breath-taking landscapes of North America, Europe, New Zealand and Africa to learn about habitats, animal behaviour and ultimately how to manage animal fitness in order to harvest the rarest and most impressive trophies.

This latest edition bundles 6 enormous hunting areas and includes agile UTVs for off-roading. All of this has been enriched with the cosmetics of the Hunter's Pack and the Outfits Pack: 5 alternative outfits for your playable hunters, a beautifully engraved antique shotgun, a cameo paintjob for the car and an impressive wooden carved statue for your Transylvania hunting lodge.

Wild Expeditions includes 6 amazing DLCs:

• Tikamoon Plains is a huge new hunting ground in Africa. Explore diverse landscapes, from windy mountains to deadly deserts and vast savannahs teeming with life. Join Malachi, a professional hunting guide, as he leads a group of adventurers through the thrilling world of Tikamoon Plains, inspired by the African wilderness. Includes bowhunting and 2 top-of-the-line hunting bows.

• Aurora Shores is a breath-taking hunting area in the northernmost part of the USA, the Alaskan wilderness. As a fresh graduate of the Wildlife Trooper School, your job is to protect the natural resources of Aurora Shores. Explore untouched nature with rich populations of wild animals, such as Kodiak bears, Roosevelt elk, Wood bison, and many more. Includes crossbows.

• Matariki Park in New Zealand offers a remarkable blend of biomes. Traverse hilly or mountainous terrain, home to the unique Himalayan tahr and the mighty Sambar deer, and venture into the lowland forest areas, the domain of the majestic Red deer. Immerse yourself in nature's beauty and lifelike wildlife that will keep you engaged for hours, all while offering insights into unique local habits and traditions.

• Lintukoto Reserve is an amazing hunting ground in Scandinavia and the newest addition to Way of the Hunter. Experience the adventures of game warden Mikael and discover the nature and animals of the European North.

• The Outfits Pack contains one original costume for each character - River, April, Wallace, Jackie and Malachi, usable in Free Hunt and Multiplayer mode.

• Hunter's Pack: a shotgun with engravings, a paintjob for the Car, and a wooden carved mouflon statue for the lodge

name: Warriors: Abyss - Hack'n'Dash Legendary Costume Set
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX+
summary:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX+ (also known as Maximum Tune 5DX+ or simply Maxi 5DX+) is an arcade racing game developed and published by Namco, based on the Wangan Midnight manga. As the ninth game in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade series and the final update for Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5, this version introduces two new car manufacturers, Lamborghini and Honda, as well as the Hiroshima Expressway course. A new Ghost Battle mode, exclusive to the Japanese and Indonesian versions, allows players to compete against ghosts from other countries, similar to the Japan Challenge in the international versions.

The update was released in North America on January 12, 2022, under the name Maximum Tune 5DX+, skipping the 5DX version for unknown reasons. In this version, the Honda brand is replaced by Acura, its North American counterpart, although many Honda cars remain, except for the Honda S2000, which only appears in the Japan Challenge.

name: Water ha Ore no Musume
summary: A 2000's VIPRPG game which begins as a parody of Dragon Quest 5, then slowly but surely flourishes into its own narrative spinning one of the most interwoven, complex, and hilarious plots.

name: Warlords Battleground: Extraction
summary: Search, fight, escape, flip your fate! In a Three Kingdoms world split across thirteen provinces, form a pact with the Dragon Maiden and explore war-torn fragments. Loot, battle, manage your gear—each run is a high-stakes gamble where your ending is yours to write.

name: Warriors: Abyss - Atelier Series Vacation Costume Set
summary: Set of 3 vacation costumes for Sophie, Ryza, & Yumia from the "Atelier" series.

name: Warriors: Abyss - "Dynasty Warriors" Costume Set
summary: A set of 5 costumes worn by the heroes in "DYNASTY WARRIORS."

name: Wanderland
summary: Wanderland, the mystery adventure from Artogon, the world-famous creator of great casual adventures series such as Shiver, Treasure Seekers and Depths of Betrayal. Sleeping Beauty has been kidnapped! Explore a world full of temples, crypts, and more.

name: Warheads for Windows
summary:
Warheads for Windows is a clone of Atari's popular 1980 arcade game, Missile Command. Originally it was pretty much a straight rip-off of the classic "intercept the falling missles" game, where you had two missile launchers (instead of three) that you could use to shoot down incoming missiles (the left and right mouse buttons fire from the left and right missile launchers, respectively) to prevent them from destroying six cities below. The missile launchers have a finite number of missiles and can be destroyed by missiles. You earn points for shooting down missiles, nukes and airplanes, and for each city that survives each round, which can earn bonus cities which replace destroyed cities.

When you have no cities left, the game is over. Version 2.0 added sound card support; a large number of configurable options; a display of how many missiles each launcher has remaining; branching missiles (MIRVs), and "blossoming" explosions, in which the destroyed missiles blow up and can destroy the other missiles, causing a chain reaction of destructions. Most of the configurable options are only available in the registered version.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - T'au
summary: The young and technologically-advanced race is the latest playable faction in Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector. Fourteen new units are available to extend the Greater Good to all the species of the galaxy.

name: Walking Survival
summary: Walking Survivor is a casual game, where you build up powerful abilities to fight off endless waves of enemies.

name: War Thunder: Premium Package
summary:
The Premium Package includes:
・ In-game aircraft "Ki-44-II Otsu"
・ Historical campaign "Pacific War: Japan"
・ In-game paid currency 1000 Golden Eagles
・ In-game currency 120,000 Silver Lions
・ Premium account 30 days

name: WAS: The Hourglass of Lepidoptera
summary:
The keyword for this game is dystopia. The game is set in Post-War Japan, yet this Japan is unfamiliar and strange compared to the one we know from history. Journey with the characters as they meet new people and encounter high drama that will forever change them and uncover the mysteries of the world they inhabit.

In this dystopian world, nothing is what it seems. Though the character seem to be in a land of peace and plenty, we quickly discover that nothing could be further away from the truth. Though WAS might appear to be a bishoujo game, we wish to present a brand-new interpretation of the concept.

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3
summary: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune is the third and latest arcade installment of the racing video game series.

name: Wanderlust: The Bermuda Secret - Collector's Edition
summary:
After your flight takes you into an ominous cloud bank, you soon find yourself hidden within the eye of a permanent storm at the center of the Bermuda Triangle, with no connection to the rest of the world, no supplies, and no hope of escape from a strange island! This point and click, puzzle adventure tasks players with finding a list of objects hidden, to uncover the truth of the island.

The Collector's Edition Includes;
- Play as Collins to save your beloved in the Bonus Game!
- Navigate the dangerous sky villages with an official strategy guide!
- Go on an exciting treasure hunt and take on the ultimate hidden object puzzle!
- Enjoy exclusive concept art, soundtracks, wallpapers, and more!
- Replay your favorite mini-games to unlock challenging achievements

name: Warriors: Abyss - Master Ninja Legacy Costume Set
summary: Set of 4 extra legacy costumes for Ryu Hayabusa, Ayane, Rachel & Momiji.

name: Warriors: Abyss - Dynasty Warriors Classic Costume Set
summary: A set of 75 costumes worn by the heroes in the "DYNASTY WARRIORS" series.

name: Walpurgis: Enkan no Meikyuu
summary:
This game is an exploration-type action game in which the player controls Sayaka Miki to explore a labyrinth.
The player controls Sayaka Miki, who has lost her memory, and explores a labyrinth filled with mystery.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Mind Plague
summary: Inexplicable violence has broken out amongst Imperial subjects, who began to act like possessed madmen. Is this a Chaos ploy? A Xenos interference? Or perhaps a Warp phenomenon? Either way, this is a matter for the Inquisition.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Hollow Bliss
summary: An Imperial ship with pilgrims on the deck has been quarantined due to a mysterious, Warp-related infection. At first glance this might not concern the Inquisition - however, there are obscure references to this malady in an Ordo case file, but most of the material has been corrupted.

name: Warriors: Abyss - Samurai Warriors Classic Costume Set
summary: A set of 68 costumes worn by the heroes in the "SAMURAI WARRIORS" series.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Deluxe Edition
Warmonger: Sins of the Naga
summary: Gunpowder and Sorcery Squad-Based Tower Defense game

name: Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus - Machines of War
summary: The Machines of War update for Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus allows you to use a sixth unit on the battlefield as the machine appears off the hex grid as a station weapon. Machines have two main abilities, a primary which is always active. The secondary can be either an active or passive ability.

name: War Survival
summary: Enemies advance without mercy, and only you can hold the front line.

name: Wanted!: Monty Mole
summary:
Wanted: Monty Mole is a platform video game that was published in 1984 by Gremlin Graphics. Versions were released for the ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64 home computers.

The player controls the titular mole who has to travel around a coal mine collecting pieces of coal and other miscellaneous objects while avoiding various nasties and the infamous crushers. The style of gameplay is typical of platform games of the 1980s. The ZX Spectrum version is a flip-screen game while the Commodore 64 version uses scrolling.

name: Wallachia: Reign of Dracula
summary: Wallachia is an insane action platformer depicting a world of ferocious fights. With spears arrows or sword in hand, your survival depends on your ability to fight. Trust no one, embody the princess, enter a deadly journey to claim your kingdom back.

name: Wail of Despair
summary: "Wail of Despair" follows a non-binary shut-in, trying to recover from their isolation and face the world once again. Facing a horrific, overstimulating, colorful and judgmental world Confronted with their past scars and mistakes, taunted with everything they've lost by a strange shadow that won't leave them alone and always follows. Can they readapt and learn to return to being something resembling okay? Or will they be swept away by the vibrant pulsating horror that threatens them back into the darkness?

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
summary: Follow the white rabbit and dive down into the curiouser and curiouser world of one of the most fantastical stories of all time. Lewis Carroll's everlasting tales of Alice's adventures are brought to life in this fantastical mini-golf course, where you'll be greeted by iconic characters and a new mechanic that will change everything. Shrink your worries, grow your imagination and explore the whimsical world of Wonderland to your heart’s content! After all, every adventure requires a first step.

name: Waifu Simulator
summary: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Wayward Souls: Curse of Shadow
summary:
Wayward Souls is an action-adventure game built for quick playthroughs and massive amounts of replay value. It was inspired by Spelunky, Secret of Mana, and our previous game, Mage Gauntlet.

Procedurally generated random levels mean that every time you play the game, it's a different experience. Control one of six characters, all with their own unique playstyles, abilities, and equipment. Explore and fight for survival, in combat where your tactics, positioning, and timing matter.

name: Way of the Hunter: Lintukoto Reserve
summary: Welcome to Lintukoto Reserve, a Scandinavian gem where the wild and serene blend seamlessly. This vast reserve offers a vast array of biomes and breathtaking landscapes that will captivate nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts alike.

name: Warhawk
summary: Blast away in this pure retro-styled shooter and battle through tons of dangerous levels and manic boss fights.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Necrons
summary: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector is a fast-paced turn-based strategy game set in the grimdark universe of the 41st Millennium. Pick your force, develop your army, field mighty heroes and fight for victory using superior strategy, awesome abilities, and devastating weaponry.

name: Warlords Battlecry II
summary: The game is set within the world of Etheria. In the campaign the player must take control of one of the twelve races and capture all sixty-seven regions of the land in a non-linear manner. The player does this whilst assuming the role of a "Hero" which he or she has created. There are twelve different playable races, each with their own type of Hero, buildings and resource dependencies.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Back to Ubersreik
summary: Claimed to be the birthplace of Sigmar, the city of Ubersreik lies at the mouth of the Grey Lady pass, and as the heroes return everything is almost the same. Or is it?

name: Wartile: Hel's Nightmare
summary: Enjoy five brand new handcrafted battle boards, continuing the story after Niflheim. Each battle board is offering variated tactical challenges, set in a unique mood and style. Lead your Viking fellowship into the Hel's Nightmare accompanied by the new hero Ogier the Dane.

name: Waka-sama no Zasuru Sekai
summary: Ryouga inherits his late grandfather's Shinto shrine, having nowhere else to go and no relatives left to stay with. There, he accidentally summons and unseals a goddess which nearly eats him alive. Fortunately, he is able to get out of it by offering to cook and buy said goddess Waka-sama all the delicious food that the little money he earns from his part-time job can buy. Brimming with curiousity, Waka-sama ventures out into modern Japan with Ryouga, looking for her sister and discovering new foods, sights, spirits, monsters, and gods all the while.

name: Warriors: Abyss - Atelier Series Academy Costume Set
summary: Set of 3 academy costumes for Sophie, Ryza, & Yumia from the "Atelier" series.

name: WarBirds
summary:
It's the First World War and the conquest of the sky is your mission. Battle your way to that target with WarBirds, the totally three-dimensional, fly by the seat of your pants, dog fight game.

Pick from any of six missions from Milk Run to The Swarm to dog fight one-on-one or fill the sky with war planes. Fight against a computer-controlled squadron or link with up to four Lynx friends to determine who is the Greatest World War I Flying Ace.

name: Warplanes: WW1 Fighters
summary: Become a pilot! Immerse yourself in WW1 aerial combat like never before in a captivating VR experience. No matter whether you prefer arcade games or flight simulators - a variety of options will let you adjust the game to your preferences.

name: War Over Vietnam
summary: Tactical wargame that focuses on modern air warfare battles in the Vietnam War, part of John Tiller's Modern Air Power series.

name: War for the Overworld: Heart of Gold
summary: Heart of Gold continues where the story left off, with 4 earth-shattering new Campaign levels, a smattering of new defences, units and spells, and a gleaming new Dungeon Theme.

name: Warfactory
summary: Warfactory fuses planet-scale automation with real-time strategy and lite 4X elements. Build sprawling factories, design modular robot armies, and lead thousands of units into battle. Conquer a galaxy with a supply chain — one conveyor belt at a time.

name: War Room
summary: War Room is a realistic strategy, taking you straight into the heat of the war in Afghanistan.

name: War Trigger 3
summary: Compete with friends or players from around the globe using some of the world's deadliest modern weapons and vehicles. Play with up to 24 players in 6 unique arenas designed for infantry, vehicle, and air combat.

name: Wave Race: Blue Storm
summary:
Racing atop a bed of dynamically changing waves, gamers must navigate their way through eight different environments under random weather conditions, including the powerful and visually impressive Storm setting.

Play through, tutorial stunt, time trial challenges, and Championship mode, which offers shortcut-laden Normal, Hard, and Expert circuits, sending you and seven other racers around eight different course environments loaded with buoys.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Black Legion
summary: The Black Legion are the latest faction to invade Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector. Fifteen new units bring the Warmaster’s wrath to the galaxy and devastation to all who stand in their way.

name: Watch Dogs: Complete Edition
summary:
Experience Watch_Dogs - the phenomenon of 2014 - with the biggest edition ever!
As Aiden Pearce, a brilliant hacker, turn Chicago into the ultimate weapon in your quest for revenge.
