name: Warzone Chronicles: Virtual Warfare Shooter - Premium Edition
Wallslide
summary: Wallslide is all about tight controls, high speeds and big jumps.

name: Waterfall Prisoner
summary: Can you escape from Waterfall Tower? A point and click puzzle game made in the vein of old-school graphic adventure classics.

name: Wake & Lunnye Devitsy
summary:
Wake is an Action game, developed and published by Boss Baddie, which was released in 2013. 
 
Lunnye Devitsy is an Action game, developed and published by Boss Baddie, which was released in 2013.

name: Waking up while the sun sets
summary: A short pixel art style game about adventuring out to watch the sun set

name: Water Blast Shooter: Wet Gun
summary: Get ready for non-stop action in epic water battles!

name: Wandering Monolith
summary: You are the Wandering Monolith, falling from the sky. Summon towers, expand the board, defend your core, and build your deck of upgrades to conquer countless worlds.

name: Wai-wai de Q: Aki no Daikansha Matsuri! - Dai-4-kai
WannaMine
summary: WannaMine - In this game you have to control the virus so he could get around the firewall of computer "firewall" and get directly to the CPU! A winding path makes the game fun and not easy.

name: Waste Cleaner
summary:
Waste, what could be worse, but someone has to solve this problem? 
Use the liquid to flush out the debris, detect invisible obstacles, build up protrusions and get to inaccessible places. Find other possibilities for using fluid in a first-person logical game with fluid simulation.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Poisoned Souls
summary: The spread of Warp-tainted drugs has been reported amongst the populace, with potentially grave consequences for the stability of the affected region. The threat level is still debatable, but the Imperium cannot take risks on matters like this.

name: War Flags 1
summary: Interesting puzzle game with flags based on World War One.

name: War to the Core
summary: War to the Core is a tactical multiplayer war game where fleets of motherships battle for global domination.

name: Wayne Gretzky's 3D Hockey
summary: As opposed to the more realistic hockey gameplay seen in Electronic Arts' NHL series, the game featured a more unrealistic arcade-style of gameplay, featuring moves such as "power saves", which caused the goaltender to briefly transform into a brick wall, "power shots", which would set the net on fire or knock the goalie into the net, and "power checks", which would send an ambulance across the top of the screen. It featured high-scoring games and over-the-top fights. There was also a simulation mode for those looking for more realistic gameplay. The game allowed the creation of profiles and would keep track of important individual and team stats, including goals, assists, and wins, among others.

name: Wars Across the World: Berlin 1945
summary: Berlin 1945 simulates the last major Soviet offensive to capture the capital of the German Third Reich. The Soviets must break through the last lines of defense to reach and capture Berlin, and possibly the Fuehrer with it.

name: Wars Across the World: Six Days 1967
summary: Six Days 1967 is a simulation of the six-days war between Israel and its Arab neighbors. Israeli forces must launch a lightning offensive to capture the Sinaï and Cisjordania before the Arab armies can become operational.

name: Wargroove: Deluxe Edition
summary: Sharpen your sword and take to the battlefield!

name: Wai-wai de Q: Haru no Saiten Special - Dai-3-kai
Waggle Words
summary: Waggle Words is a word puzzle game from Vermont Digital Arts.

name: Wani Wani World
summary:
Wani Wani World is a reskinned Berlin no Kabe released by Kaneko in 1992 exclusively on the Sega Mega Drive.
Charlie and Smiley, make their way through numerous screens of platforms and ladders filled with enemies. Their only method of attack is to bash a hole in the ground, wait for an enemy to fall into it, and then bash the enemy in the head, which causes the enemy to fall and transform into items and delicious food.

name: Wake Out of Twilight
summary: In the future, life can't get any easier. Anybody can now live the life of their dreams with no effort. However, the price for this is more than anybody agreed too. Go on a journey to help society free themselves from the nightmare.

name: Warrecs 2
summary: You are a small planet in the universe. With time, you're losing mass, therefore you have to eat smaller planets to survive. The rule is the bigger planets eat the smaller.

name: Watermelon Wars
summary: A game based on a popular Chinese video. A war caused by buying a watermelon.

name: WaterPolo Inter Nation
summary: WIN (WaterPolo Inter Nation) is the very first multiplayer water polo video game! Like any great video game, it combines the need of great game sense, as well as mechanical skill to be able to progress.

name: Warlocks 2: God Slayers
summary: Warlocks 2: God Slayers is a humorous pixel-art metroidvania. Challenge the vile gods and dethrone them in this action-packed hack n' slash experience with wizards and meteor showers.

name: Wanted Shadows
summary: Decimate thousands of demons on All Hallows' Eve to protect your infernal home. Wanted Shadows is a bullet heaven roguelite where the difference between overpowering and being overpowered lies in your skill and wit.

name: Warrior of Rome III
summary: Warrior of Rome III was being developed for both the Genesis and the Snes, but was cancelled for both. The prequels were released on the Genesis. It was likely going to be a strategy game. It was going to be published by short lived Extreme, and was shown at the 1993 Summer CES.

name: War of Gama
summary:
A world of creatures & kings
The battle between Blood Pledges and Castles powered by the players
developers: 台灣伽瑪移動數位股份有限公司

name: Warlocks Entanglement
summary: Warlocks Entanglement puts you into a destructible open world in a magical medieval setting. Explore and learn all this world has to offer and then open a gateway to the next world!.

name: Washed Up
summary: An arcade-style top-down shooter game. See how long you can survive in a zombie-infested abandoned town.

name: WanderLust
summary: WanderLust is a Fairy Tale Adventure game for Adults Only, featuring a Beautiful Princess in an Erotic story far different than any Fairy Tale you've heard before. It features simple RPG game-play, numerous sexual encounters and a very naughty theme song!

name: Wandering Wolf Trick
summary:
WANDERING WOLF TRICK is the fourth installment of the LONELY WOLF TREAT series. please play the others before this one! the story is best experienced in order.

in this game, you play as a wolf named trick, searching all over the place for your friend who went missing after an avalanche.

name: War Trigger
summary: Destroy, smash and blast your way to victory! Use advanced weapons and vehicles to dominate the battlefield.

name: Water Drift
summary:
Control your boat, as you drift along the track, the stronger and longer the turn, the more points you get! Drive the entire distance gaining as many points as possible.
Reach the finish line as quickly as possible!

name: Wall Street Junior
summary: Experience the sub-universe of stocks, bonds, loans and derivatives with a simulation providing setup to try out any investment strategy you may ever think of - Wall Street Junior will introduce you to the world of financial markets.

name: Wakey Wakey
summary: Wakey Wakey is a Puzzle Platformer with a unique world-bending twist. Navigate your everchanging bedroom, take control of new household objects, and overcome surprising obstacles to help this sleepy guy get a good night's rest.

name: Wander in Wonder
summary:
This work is an interactive animation piece on the adventures of a lost little rabbit wandering through the woods.
As night draws near, wonder-working plants and flowers show the way.

name: Waifu Fighter
summary: One day, women became very powerful and dominated all fighting arenas. You had been living in seclusion for training for twenty years. You aimed at the championship of martial arts. Encountering female fighters all over the world, you had to do your best to defeat them successfully!

name: Wars Across the World: Spain 1936
summary: Spain 1936 relates the story of one of the toughest conflict in the pre-World War II era, depicting the Civil War that tore Spain apart from 1936 to 1939. The Nationalists must capture the whole of the peninsula, and in particular Madrid and Barcelona.

name: Warbyte: Operation Falcon
summary: An old-modern school fps, where you can play tactically, or engage in crazy fast-paced combat. Host your own rooms easily, and enjoy a fair game, where victory is determined by your skill.

name: Wappy Dog
summary: Players interact with Wappy Dog who teaches young gamers to raise their very own puppy in both the real and virtual worlds and teach it cool tricks, play mini-games together and even converse! Each pet is a fully personalized experience, enabling players to customize both the in-game version and physical dog with different colors and accessories.

name: Wars Across the World: Uganda 1979
summary: Uganda 1979 is the depiction of the last offensive of megalomaniac tyrant of Uganda, Amin Dada, against his neighbour Tanzania from 1978. The Ugandans must hold the province of Kagera and repel the enemy offensive. Tanzanians must first and foremost overthrow Amin Dada by capturing his capital.

name: Wars Across the World: Caesar 56
summary: Caesar 56BC, the Third Campaign of Caesar in Gaul in Armorica. Roman objective is to crush the Venetii fleet and capture their fortresses. The Gallic player, with his mighty fleet, must repulse the enemy and prevent the capture of his harbors.

name: Warbears Mission 01: The Bank Robbery
summary: The evil groundhogs are robbing the bank! But what do these evil creatures need the money for? They must be into something conspiratorial! Join the Warbears in their first documented mission ever!

name: Way of the Cossack
summary:
In the middle of the 16th century, the Great Polish Kingdom enters its golden age. Being the major power in Europe of that time, Poland invades Ukraine, seizes its lands and enslaves local people, while building a dominating Polish empire in the area.
The southern stream of the river Dnieper becomes a refuge for those, who wish to escape from Polish domination. Soon the place by the river called Zaporozhye turns into the organized center of Cossacks opposition that becomes the biggest threat to the Polish Empire.
Taras Bulba, the legendary Cossack warrior leads his people to drive out the occupants and liberate Ukraine.

name: Warbears Mission 03: An Oceanic Problem
summary:
An S.O.S. signal from the Gas Platform in the Great Ocean!
A new enemy surfaced with an evil plan. Will the Warbears be able to stop them?

name: War of Ants
summary: War of Ants is a real-time PVP strategy mobile game where you compete with players around the world. Collect crypto-backed units, rare artifacts and wage war against other ant colonies.

name: Wailing Guignol
summary: Desert city, Ergerita. Fighting evil and violence to protect the love of my life. An exciting Sci-Fi Fantasy RPG in a world of ruins!

name: Water City
summary: In the Dome of D'Sparil there is an ancient underwater city that has recently been taken over by the minions of the dark wizard. It is your responsibility to remove the foul presence of these evil creatures from this place! City of the Damned? That was mere practice compared to the beings you must face here!

name: Way of Heroes
summary: You have to choose a hero and go through the dungeon levels of the city of Vorms. Collect the unworthy pages of the Book of the Dead and destroy it. Level up the hero and get new magic abilities. Play with other guys on two joysticks and have fun.

name: Warlords
summary: A modern remake of the arcade and Atari 2600 classic, Warlords.

name: Walls of Illusion
summary: A dungeon crawling role-playing game.

name: Waking up in LS
summary:
Waking up in LS is a short exploration videogame where you play as a usual citizen in "Linha de Sintra", the area where a railway link connects Lisbon and Sintra.

As a resident of this unique area, you'll come across a cast of bizarre and outlandish characters, each with their own hilarious quirks and idiosyncrasies.

Explore Queluz´s train station, residential areas, and strange and surreal corners. You'll come across bizarre situations that will make you laugh out loud and shake your head in disbelief.

"Waking up in LS" is a game that will keep you entertained and amused for a couple minutes, with its pixel art graphics, and a irreverent sense of humour. Whether you like exploration games or just want to laugh, "Waking up in LS" will make you smile and leave you wanting more.

name: Warrior Next
summary: Few against many... Fight with a handful of Spartans to save Greece. Destroy hordes of enemies until the fight with creatures sent by the Gods. Lots of action for everyone!

name: Wayne Gretzky and the NHLPA All-Stars
summary:
One of the many hockey games released, this version not only let the player control Gretzky, but other major players of the time as well such as Mario Lemieux, Eric Lindros, Mark Messier among many others, 600 total. It also features the 26 NHL teams at the time as well as 6 International teams to choose from.

The gameplay is similar to many other hockey games with the standard modes such as Exhibition, Season, Playoffs or even a "Just Play" option that instantly took the player to a random game. There is also a "Simulation Mode" that gives the game an authentic feel complete with penalties or an "Arcade Mode" that was more action oriented and with less rules. A battery back-up keeps extensive track of stats and has a two-player option as well.

name: Warped Kart Racers
summary: Get warped into the ultimate kart racing game - by yourself, or multiplayer - featuring the stars of 20th Television’s hit animated shows: American Dad!, Family Guy, King of the Hill and Solar Opposites! Experience iconic locations and even some surprise ones in your quest for karting glory!

name: Waste Walkers Deliverance
summary: Take on the role of Screw, a scavenger for the colony of Tranquil Point, located in an old insane asylum, who was recently sent into a coma after being injured during a scavenging run. Build and craft gadgets and trinkets to help you compete quests and missions as you journey into the dark unknown dungeons and face unreal horrors!

name: Watch Your Back
summary: You are some small-time journalists, exploited by your boss. When an abandoned Cold War-era shelter is discovered, your boss sends you there to do the story of a lifetime. Only you two will know what awaits you in there...

name: Walk in the Sun
summary:
Claire's got one goal - to spend time with her friend Jamie after school.

Nothing's going to get in the way of that.

Made in two weeks for VN Cup.

name: Wai Wai Jockey Gate-In!
summary: A horse racing game.

name: Warlords II: Scenario Builder
summary:
An add-on for a 1993 turn-based strategy game Warlords II. It includes tools that allow users to create custom maps and in-game assets like units and terrains.

This bundle comes with 24 new scenarios.

name: War of the Robots
summary: The player controls a gun turret on a watchtower in the Robot Drop Zone. Robots circle the tower and shoot seekers at the player in an attempt to deplete their damage gauge. Both the robots and the seekers must be destroyed, but ammo is not infinite and must be used with care. When the player's ammo is completely spent, it's only a matter of time before game over. In a phase where a certain number of robots must be destroyed, the player is just a sitting duck; however, in a survival phase, it is possible to advance to the next stage if the player has enough health, then they can can wait out the time limit.

name: Wake the Royalty
summary: If you have already come across physics games of the Wake Up The Box series, you will recognize the style. The goal is to use smart machinery and stir the snoring crowned shapes. Attach wood to wood to activate the mechanisms of gears and ropes and thus solve 20+ physics-based puzzles online for free. The riddles are progressively challenging. That's why it won’t be easy to pass all levels on the first try even if you often play logic games free online. Due to its touch-friendly interface, the puzzle is equally enjoyable on large screens and mobile devices.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution: Last Stand
summary:
Dawn of War II, Last Stand is a three player cooperative survival mode that is also available as a stand-alone game!

You select a single hero and face off against waves of enemies with up to two other teammates.

name: Way on Where
summary: Kyle the master thief, in an unexpected turn of events meets new people. Little does he know, this will lead to new beginnings and his life wont be the same anymore !

name: Wall Roller
summary: A simple yet addictive timing based game where you play as a ball that will auto-roll. Time your jumps well to jump from wall to wall to get to the goal. Each level gets harder, adding additional traps and obstacles.

name: Waste recycling
summary: Separation of waste, especially in our time, has become a necessity.

name: Wave of Elms
summary: Combination of roguelike and strategy in one side view game. Defend yourself against constantly attacking Elms while researching procedural research branches. Destroy the enemy or lose

name: Wario no Mori: Event Ban Ver. 2
summary: Wario no Mori: Event Ban Ver. 2 is a Puzzle game, published by Nintendo, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Wasteland Chronicles
summary: Wasteland Chronicles is a card based turn based combat game adapted from ancient mythology, featuring forty different styles and skills of Wasteland gods who will help players complete their journey from Chaos to the Jedi Sky Pass.

name: War Cars Construction Set
summary: War Cars Construction Set is a race game where you must race against the computer around a large maze viewed from above, collecting flags. Your vehicle also carries two rocks which only one can be deployed at a time. This will block your opponent for a short time. Each car has five lives and if you crash into the other car then you lose one of five lives. The game keeps going, letting you build up a score and it only ends when all lives are lost.

name: War in the Gulf
summary:
Third game in the tank combat series, following from Team Yankee and Pacific Islands, in a fictional war in which Iraq invades Kuwait for a second time.

Take command of 4 tank units, simultaneously controlling 16 different vehicles through the split screen control system.

name: Waifu Museum
summary: Waifu Museum is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Wared
summary: There is a belief that wars are won by soldiers. But sometimes, wars are won long before even beginning.

name: Watermelon
summary: Watermelon is a clicker game where you click on a watermelon to earn more watermelons! In Watermelon, your goal is to click the juicy fruit to expand your watermelon collection. Every 3 hours, a new watermelon will appear for you to add to your growing stash.

name: Waifu Wars Splash
summary: Choose your favorite waifus and let the war begin!

name: Waiting For Her
summary: Queueing Simulator of Love.

name: Warship Fury
summary: Meet a truly legendary MMO shooter for your mobile device! Become part of a community of millions of players from across the world, take a warship into your first massive sea battle, fight in a 5x5 format, and win! Check out the extraordinary variety of warships, maps, modes, and possible strategies that this warship shooter game has to offer!

name: Warehuman
summary: Game theme: JRPGs that talk about violence and mythology Read the story from the point of view of a character from a 'discriminated race' to think deeply about discrimination. In the combat part, the tense BP battle system offers the thrill of 'hunt or be hunted'.

name: Waterworld: The Quest for Dry Land
summary: Real-time strategy game based on the movie Waterworld.

name: War for Magincia
summary: In this prequel to Swamp Castle and the Great Tournament, lead a medieval faction as it attempts to secure the Kingdom of Magincia. Deal with other hostile factions and fight off barbarians to secure your rule.

name: War of the Roses
summary: War of the Roses: Kingmaker is a team based third person action game set in 15th century England. Two rival branches of the Royal House of Plantagenet - the house of Lancaster (the reds) and the house of York (the whites) - it's a fight for the throne, and the player is thrown into the fray.

name: Warmongers
summary: Choose one of the heroes with their unique armies and go to war against the rest! Make the most of limited resources, explore foreign lands and show your skills in turn-based battles.

name: Wait for Daylight
summary: Wait for Daylight is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Nio, a girl who can't seem to fall asleep normally and spends her time daydreaming instead. The goal is to explore and obtain Wishes.

name: War Machine
summary: War Machine is a First Person Shooter in which a soldier (Ryan) has a mission to save the world from a machine revolution.

name: Wanted: Dead - Collector's Edition
summary: A physical copy of the game that comes in a steelbook case and collector's box along with CD soundtrack, artbook, magnet, and postcards.

name: Watamari: A Match Made in Heaven Part1
summary: Hoshino HIkari is a female spy who joins an all girls school as a student to discover its secrets with no intention to stand out… when she suddenly receives the Mark of Virgo, and timeslips 1 year in the past?! By the developers of Ne no Kami: The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Iron Hands Chapter Pack
summary: Driven by their hatred of weakness in all forms including their own genetically enhanced flesh, the Iron Hands are known for the extensive cybernetic and mechanical augmentations that they undergo. Veteran battle brothers of the Iron Hands are almost entirely mechanical with the majority of their flesh replaced.

name: War Yards
summary: Step into the shoes of a legendary gunslinger and experience a new kind of VR multiplayer combat. War Yards utilizes a set of unique gameplay systems to seamlessly bring bullet time mechanics to multiplayer matches. The game utilizes a unique set of mechanics that allow each player to control the speed of their opponent's projectiles. These mechanics create an unparalleled combat experience that seamlessly blends fast paced action with tense strategy.

name: Watch Paint Dry
summary: A deliberately bad game in which the player watches paint dry developed for the purpose of demonstrating an exploit on Valve's Steam distribution service.

name: Water City
summary: Slice, burn, torment, throw water, and smite those repulsive dark creatures

name: Waifu Hunter - Secret of Pirates
summary: Hayate is stranded from the future to another era when brutal and full of intrigues pirates are dominant. He accidentally meets a beautiful woman pirate named Carmen who brings a secret map which leads to an immortal treasure.

name: Water Connect Puzzle
summary: A puzzle game in which you must connect pipes of water to grow trees. Mix colors to create the proper color needed.

name: Wayne Gretzky and Brett Hull Shootout Hockey
Warriors' Wrath
summary: Loot. Craft. Build. Defend. Fight. Survive

name: Walk in the Rain
summary: Simple, relaxing walking simulation

name: Warrior Chess
summary: Play chess in this glorious high resolution 3D world. With 10 highly detailed Locations "Easter Village", "Baroque", "Courtyard", "Country Garden", "Medieval Times", "1066: Battle of Hastings", "Aztec Ruins", "Stone Mountain", "Steam Punk" & "Halloween: Trick Or Treat?"

name: W.A.R. Hangry
summary: Join the clever penguins of "W.A.R. Hangry: The Last Tuxedo" in a battle royale aboard a colossal spaceship. Use recycled seafood launchers, navigate dynamic terrains, and manage your hunger to be the last penguin standing. Customize, strategize, and support ocean conservation!

name: Wails For Freedom
summary: Escape a haunted Asylum whilst riding on a wheelchair. Can you escape with your sanity or will madness consume you?

name: Wars Across the World: Korea 1950
summary: Korea 1950 relates the story of one of the toughest conflict in the Cold War era, depicting the invasion of the democratic South Korea by the Northern Korea communists. The Communist must capture Seoul and possibly the whole of the peninsula.

name: Washed Upon A Murder
summary: After washing onto a private island, you soon find yourself in the middle of a murder mystery puzzle. The worst part? Everyone thinks you've dunnit! Will you be able to prove Detective Sal's innocence? Find clues, spot contradictions and solve puzzles to discover the truth and find the real killer.

name: Walks of Life
summary: This is a life sim board game where the board represents one year of your life. Through luck and strategy you must avoid landing on negative squares and strategize on how to optimize your four core life parameters - health, social life, career and wealth.

name: War Records of Goddess Girls
summary: This game has been elaborately produced, and the content is very rich. Welcome friends who like to nostalgize and play with RPG.

name: Wacki: Kosmiczna Rozgrywka
summary:
Wacki: Kosmiczna Rozgrywka is an adventure game where you control two characters, Franz Josef (FJ) and Edek Baryła (EB). In order to assemble the aforementioned device, they travel around the whole world - you start in Poland, but later you visit America, Africa and Australia. In each location, you have to find an element of the device, and then find some means of transport to get out. The game is characterized by lots of wacky humour, and clicking on various objects will often show amusing animations.

Wacki uses a simple interface. To walk somewhere on the screen, you click there. To interact with objects on the screen, you click on them. To use an object from your inventory, you click on it and then click on whatever it is you want to use it on. You do not talk with people or examine objects to see their descriptions, though you can hold the cursor over your inventory objects to learn what they are.

name: Wars Across the World: Sepoy 1857
summary: Sepoy 1857 accounts for the great Indian Mutiny, a major uprising in India in 1857–58 against the rule of the British East India Company, which functioned as a sovereign power on behalf of the British Crown.

name: Walls of Rust
summary: Take command of humanity's last Mechs with a deck of cards, and control the hex-based gameboard to stop the spreading corruption. In this turn-based strategy game, each run is one continuous battle, so make every action count.

name: Wave Trip
summary:
Play a world of music. Make it yours.
Wave Trip is a musical arcade game. You control a mysterious and wonderful geometric astronaut as she travels through worlds of unimaginable beauty and danger, saving her friends through the medium of awesome tunes.
All of the levels can be remixed and edited, and players can create their own levels and share them with the world. Since every object in Wave Trip has musical characteristics, creating a level is just like writing a piece of music - just easier (and with more cubist sheep).

name: Wanted: Yokai Uprising
summary: Wanted: Yokai Uprising is a cooperative first-person shooter. Take down waves of yokai solo or with a partner. Choose between two mercenaries with unique play styles to complete the mission assigned to you and defeat the city's most wanted boss.

name: Wax Museum: Seek and Find - Mystery Hidden Object Adventure
summary: Enjoy the beautiful and extraordinary exhibits of the abandoned Wax Museum! Immerse yourself in a mystical detective story full of secrets and puzzles! The newest hidden object game.

name: Way of the Chook
summary: A browser beat 'em up game.

name: WarCommander
summary: Conventionally styled 2D real-time strategy is set during the June 1944 D-day Allied invasion at Normandy. Players take command of an American infantry unit right in the thick of it all, to guide them through two historically based campaigns of 12 missions each. Factors such as 11 different character classes, several available buildings and fortifications, a day-and-night cycle, and changing weather conditions are designed to bring variety and challenge to the WWII-themed game

name: Watkins
summary: Watkins is a freeware platformer released by R-Games in 2000, starring the titular Watkins, a penguin who has to save the South Pole.

name: Warno: Nemesis #2
summary: The Nemesis DLC lets players decide which pair of Divisions should come next. Each Nemesis DLC features 2 new Divisions and several new units. This Nemesis DLC will be voted on by the WARNO community at a future date.

name: Walk with me.
summary: conversations between a young god and a heart of stone.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade - Abaddon War Pack
Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade - Waaagh! Weapon Pack
WalkBot
summary: Play through this short story of WalkBot. Solve puzzles using the unique body-switching mechanic to progress and see the story unfold.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade - Champion Weapon Pack
Wandering in Space
summary: Enjoy the history of the passengers in a futuristic new visual novel...

name: Warmonger
summary: Warmonger is a Free-to-Play PVP MMO with MOBA-style combat in a persistent world. Choose between different factions and many distinct characters with tons of different weapon setups. It's not just a match: It's WAR!

name: Wake Up
summary: A retro 3d adventure game inspired by Twin Peaks and Resident Evil. This game was made during Castle Game Jam 2018.

name: WarPlan Pacific
summary: WarPlan Pacific is an operational level wargame which covers all the nations at war in the Pacific theatre from December 1941 to 1945 on a massive game scale.

name: Wars Across the World: Normandy 1944
summary: Normandie 1944 covers the first weeks of the gigantic 'Overlord' landings of June 6th, 1944 pitching the Anglo-American troops against Hitler's German armies. The goal of the allies is take a strong foothold on the coast of France and capture a vital supply port.

name: Wars Across the World: Hastings 1066
summary: Hastings 1066 is based on the conquest of England in the early Middle ages. Three players fight for the realmThe new Saxon king Harold II must hold the coastline against his two opponents: the Norman William and his army in the South, and the Vikings of Harald Hardrada landing from Norway in the North.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Emperor’s Elite Pack
summary: Renowned crusaders against the enemies of humanity, the BLACK TEMPLARS eschew the idea of a home world. Instead, they have taken to the stars in mighty crusade fleets, actively seeking out the enemy throughout the Galaxy.

name: Wayfarer
summary: Venture through a dark fantasy world riddled with mystery, magical mayhem and political intrigue.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Glory in Death
summary: Turn based strategy game featuring Space Marines, Eldar, Chaos Marines and Orks across 4 separate campaigns.

name: Way of the Knight
summary: In this challenging puzzle game you help a brave knight by building his road towards a life-saving antidote. Place random tiles to finish the road through charming grid-based environments.

name: Wars Across the World: Byzantium 1116
summary: Byzantium 1116 is the story of the reconquest of Anatolia by the armies of Byzantine Emperor Alexius Comnene, against the Seljuk Turks, just recently weakened by the passage of the First CrusadeIn a Hit and Run game, both sides are attempting to capture the opponent's strongholds in the highlands of central Anatolia before the latter can

name: Wars Across the World: Gandamak1842
summary: Gandamak 1842 is a simulation of the 'First Anglo-Afghan War', a failed attempt by the British Empire to vassalize Afghanistan. The British must capture Kabul, setup their puppet ruler there and maintain themselves in the country. The Afghan must repulse the invaders, isolating their garrisons and pushing the tribes to revolt.

name: Wars Across the World: Rhodesia 1972
summary: Rhodesia 1972 is the story of the isolated white rule in Rhodesia, trying to establish a stable and lasting state against the black rebels supported by Communist powers. The Rebels will try to unbalance the white population's morale by infiltrating as many fighters group inside the borders as possible.

name: Wars Across the World: Sicily 1943
summary: Sicily 1943 covers the 12 weeks of the 'Husky' landings of July 1943, pitching the Anglo-American troops against Axis armies for the conquest of Sicily. The goal of the Allies is to capture completely the island.

name: Wacky Races
summary: Based on the original Hanna-Barbera cartoon, Wacky Races lets you join your favorite characters on a wild race where only your wits, your driving skills and your bag of dirty tricks will get you across the finish line first!

name: WatchFamily
summary: The game "WatchFamily" is a mini game that satirizes the image of our ordinary young man who wants to take the time of his own by avoiding the eyes of the family who watches over and over.

name: Wars Across the World: Caesar 57
summary: Caesar 57 BC, the Second Campaign of Caesar in Gaul against the valiant Belgae. The Romans must crush all the hostile tribes before end of the game, or lose it. The Belgian player must prevent the Roman goals using all its forces and opportunities.

name: Wandervania
summary: Wandervania is a short action adventure game similar to the Classic Castlevania games, a big one level with collectibles and lore to go through.

name: Waterslide
summary: Waterslide puts players at the top of massive and impossibly high waterslides that take them over and above and weaving around between skyscrapers. Players must tilt their phone to stay in the half-pipe while risking their lives for bonuses and avoiding obstacles.

name: Wally Kong
summary: Wally Kong is a Donkey Kong clone for ZX Spectrum

name: Warmord
summary: Warmord is a real time tower defense strategy game. Take control of a prehistoric fortification and defend it from your opponents throughout the ages. Fight with various units from 6 different eras and be challenged by multiple maps.

name: Wandering in Space Online VR
summary: "Wandering in Space Online" is a brand new co-op multiplayer VR game, which continues the story of the single-player version and brings players in-depth space combat experiences. The game currently offers various PvE gameplays, including Assault Mode, Escort Mode, and Survival Mode.

name: Wasteland Elysium
summary: Wasteland Elysium is a post-apocalypse action shooter with Rogue-like elements. Featuring Rowling, a highschool girl, on her journey in the wasteland. Players will be facing hordes of mutant creatures. Gather resources to obtain different power-ups, unlocks and survive long enough for an escape.

name: Warface: Rifleman Tournament Pack
summary: Contains the full Champion’s rifleman gear and the assault rifle MS Radek, both are permanent. This gear set is designed to deliver the best performance possible, possesses unique class-specific buffs. Put it on and don’t let anything hold you back from diving into the heat of battle!

name: War Thunder: M1 KVT Pack
summary: This Pack includes: M1 KVT (Rank 6 USA);Premium account for 15 days;2000 Golden Eagles.

name: Watchmen: The End Is Nigh Complete Experience
summary:
Watchmen: The End Is Nigh is an episodic video game series that serves as a prequel to the film adaptation of the comic book Watchmen by Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons.

The End Is Nigh Complete Experience Includes;
- The Director's cut of the Watchmen movie on Blu-ray disc
- Part one of the game
- Part two of the game.
- Contains exclusive collectible poster
- History of Watchmen Timeline.

name: Wanted
summary: Wanted - this is a leisure game about REVENGE! You can unleash your inner fury and make those annoying people pay the price. Are you ready?

name: Watch&Run
summary: Learn speedrun mechanics such as moves, glitchs and bugs and exploit them to make the best time possible.

name: War Thunder - T-55AM-1 Pack
Waiting For the Loop
summary: A short form visual novel about artificial intelligence, humanity and family.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution: The Last Stand Tau Commander
summary: The Tau Commander is a brand new hero for Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II: Retribution and Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II: The Last Stand Alone. The Tau Commander comes with 26 pieces of wargear, 2 achievements, an all new voice and 20 levels of progression.

name: Waifu Wars Online
summary: Kill, loot, and level up with other players in this mysterious online realm. Welcome to WAIFU WARS ONLINE!

name: Warehouse Keeper
summary: Sokoban clone released in Mega Drive plug & plays.

name: Wacky Ship
summary: Wacky Ship is a top down space shooter game.

name: Warcher Defenders
summary:
A tiny castle defense action RPG with a very unique and challenging gameplay!

Fight for survival in this unique twist on Castle Defense!! Trigger special attacks to destroy the enemy hordes and protect your tower against tons of different boss encounters in this Old School, Retro Classic!

name: Way of the Hunter: Ultimate Edition
summary: Way of the Hunter - Ultimate Edition is the collection of hunting grounds all over the world and all existing equipment packs. In this authentic hunting simulation, you can explore the vast the in-game wilderness and fulfill all your hunting fantasies.

name: Wait For It
summary: A roguelike where the wait key holds the most power.

name: Wars Across the World: Agathocles 312
summary: Agathocles 312 BC is a two players WAW DLC scenario on the war between Syracuse and Carthage for the control of Sicilia between 312 and 305 BC.

name: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Ougon Maracas no Densetsu
summary: A GBA game released by Konami in December 2002. It is the first video game adaptation made for Mirumo de Pon.

name: Wakeari!
summary: A paranormal eroge title from the makers of Sexy Beach and Battle Raper. This game was released in November 2011.

name: War Zone
summary: In a futuristic 1999 setting, you an your partner (Co-op available) have been detailed to lead a counter-invasion force to push back enemy which has landed at eight strategic points in your country. However, the rest of your crew has been killed or captured, so now it's up to you. Your prime directive is to shoot your way through eight levels of top-down scrolling action for a date with the end-of-level guardian of each, be it a tank, helicopter, submarine or some other piece of military hardware. Along the way it would be nice if you could free the rest of your unit also.

name: Watchtower
summary:
War has never been as deadly.

Deadly military weapons to pick-up: Pistol, Kalashnikov, Uzi, Assault Rifle, Sub-Machine Gun, Minigun, Flame Thrower, Rocket Launcher, and Grenades to lob!

Six long and challenging missions in different areas of the world with three different terrain types: Desert, Jungle, and City.

Armies of ruthless enemies and vicious end of level guardians that show no mercy!

Heavily armed enemy vehicles and aircraft including tanks, helicopters, trucks, submarines, and jets.

Lots of lead and fun guaranteed.

name: Watergate Xtreme
summary: Watergate Xtreme is a frantic multiplayer extravaganza where you and your friends run around in a maze trying to control your guy and a remote control bomb at the same time.

name: Watch_Dogs 1985
summary: Parallel universe Watch Dogs

name: Waifu Hunter: Episode 1 - The Runaway Samurai
summary: Hayate is a toy collector from Tokyo, one day he found a jade in an antique shop that took him back in time, in the Japanese feudal era. He was accused of conspiring with Kazumi, in the plot to assassinate the emperor. Hayate will face a Ronin, Geisha, Ninja, Shogun to the Emperor's daughter.

name: Warzone: Clash of Generals
summary:
When the city-states fight for precious resources, they need war heroes who lead their armies of tanks, mechs, and robots into battle.

You are one of these heroes.

Take command of a futuristic military power and devise real-time strategic battles (RTS) against other online players in PvP matches. Support your clan in the struggle to conquer territory and take power.

name: Wartide: Heroes of Atlantis
summary: Wartide: Heroes of Atlantis is a tactical online game where you summon heroes, recruit troops, battle against intruders, and forge alliances to destroy your common enemies. Wartide's unique pre-battle deployment gives you options for creating different formations with your army. Plan your every move and reclaim the long-lost throne of Atlantis!

name: Warhedz
summary: Challenge your friends, on-line or locally, or play against AI to rule the world! In this epic strategy game, invade territories and devise of tactics to defeat your opponents and take over the world.

name: Water Density
summary: Water Density is an action/strategy game where the goal is to obtain the most Heavy Water. Use a wheel loader to create a road for your tanker to transport water back to your ship. Fly a drone to scout the landscape and tunnels, to find water.

name: War in Space
summary: War in Space is a retro style arcade shooter where you battle waves of unrelenting enemy ships with a whopping 81 levels and over 50 technologies available in the tech tree to keep you challenged right until the final wave.

name: Wallbound
summary: Welcome to Wallbound. You have been trapped in Chamber 7, with little chance of escape. Wallbound is an FPS Parkor-style game, where you can run, jump, slide past all the obstacles and get to the exit. Good Luck!

name: Way of Retribution: Awakening
summary: Old School MMORPG for Android and IOS platforms. Classic quests, equipment, equipment upgrades and many character classes. Dungeons, Open world, Free PVP

name: Waifu or Laifu
summary: The rules are simple: liked the character - swipe your finger to the left. Did not like it - swipe to the right. Not to mention, you can learn how many people feels the same for your "2D love".

name: Warship Legend
summary:
Warship Legend is an action-packed RPG game with 8 vs 8 team battles in real-time. Engage in massive naval warfare through the auto-matching system, and develop your skills through the use of various tactics depending on ship type and role.

As an intermediate commander of the joint fleet in the 1980s, you are obliged to fight against evil factions under the shadow. After experiencing strategic challenges, sincere friendship, and furious battle; you will become the master of this vast ocean.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Edition Bundle contains:

- Warhammer: Vermintide 2
- Includes the Shadows over Bögenhafen DLC
- Back to Ubersreik DLC
- 3 Heroic Deeds
- Helmgart Heraldry Themed Skins
- 1 Portrait Frame
- Sigmar Keep Statue

name: Waki & The Lost Spirits
summary: Waki & the Lost Spirits is a 2D action platformer with some tastes of a metroidvania game. In this game you will explore the forest, fight enemies, solve puzzles, complete challenges, beat some bosses in order to save the lost spirits of the forest.

name: Wars and Battles: Normandy
summary: Wars and Battles: Normandy is a platform of turn-based wargames that simulate historical battles and campaigns over several centuries and continents.

name: Way of Redemption
summary: Way of Redemption is a MOSA (Multiplayer Online Sport Arena) game from Pixel Cream

name: WattGames
summary: Turn your indoor cycling into an adventure! A new revolution in fitness gaming, WATTGAMES is the first-ever indoor cycling game that lets you do battle with fearsome enemies, explore a beautifully crafted world and complete missions through exercise. Ride for your life!

name: Warehouse Bots
summary: Take on the role of a warehouse manager overseeing a bustling hub of automated activity. In this immersive simulator, you'll delve into the intricacies of logistics as you control robots, construct efficient road networks, and fine-tune traffic flow to optimize your warehouse operations.

name: WASD Quartet
summary: A narrative game where you'll play music with robots. Explore places, and play in rhythm to discover all the secrets of this world.

name: War.io : Survival Battle Royale
summary: To all fans of battle ground is dedicated: War.io Survival Battle Royale - this is a huge fight in the deathmatch mode. A new 2d top-down shooter takes you to a world where you have to fight for your own life.

name: Warlock The Bounty Hunter
summary: A short byte-sized roguelike game where you play as a warlock taking bounties.

name: Warm Up!
summary: The sequel to F1 World Grand Prix.

name: Wartime Glory
summary: Wartime Glory is a turn-based strategy war game that is a perfect mix of classic board games like Risk with special cards that give it a new dimension of strategy and tactics. Have fun while you take over the world, one country at a time!

name: Waku-waku Ski Wonder Spur
summary: Waku-waku Ski Wonder Spur is a Sports game, developed by Human Club and published by Human Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Warbrush
summary: Warbrush is a local-multiplayer tank brawler where the tanks are imagined as "paintbrushes" fighting a war over canvases, with each tank having a different style of brushstroke. As the fight goes on, the players will leave behind a beautiful mess commemorating their violent engagement.

name: War.io : Zombie Battle Royale
summary: War.io : Zombie Battle Royale - this is a huge fight in the deathmatch mode. Modifying the 2d top-down shooter takes you to a world where you have to fight for your own life.

name: Wars Across the World: Bull Run 1861
summary: Bull Run 1861 covers the first military campaign of the American Civil War. Union forces must push towards the Rebel capital of Richmond, but must keep their rear secure. The Confederate army must prevent their breakthrough while threatening Washington, head of Lincoln's government and so close to the frontlines...

name: Wars Across the World: Innsmouth 1928
summary: Innsmouth 1928 is a simulation of the assault of the Police, FBI and U.S.Coast Guard and National Guard on the degenerate town of Innsmouth, populated by monstrous creatures. This is a mod on the Ctulluh universe.

name: Wars Across the World: Kippur 1973
summary: Kippur 1973 allows to replay the Arab-Israeli war of October 1973. The Arab side, mostly Egypt and Syria, attacks Israeli troops by surprise simultaneously in the Sinai and the Golan, to get a foothold again on their land claims. Israel must hold and then counter-attack to obtain victory.

name: Waidh
summary: Imagine one day you wake up in the middle of a jungle without knowing who you are and what are you doing there. That's where the story of WAIDH begins. Try to survive the elements of the infinite jungle and of course, try to find the answers for those questions to solve the mystery of the game.

name: Wallpaper
summary: A computer engineer returns to his remote family home in rural England to uncover long-buried secrets.

name: Warpitout
summary: An interactive art project programmed in Zgrass for SIGGRAPH '82. The game is housed in an arcade cabinet, and was described by the artist as an "artistic video game". It has been exhibited at the Ontario Science Center.

name: Wangan Trial Love
summary: A combination of racing and dating simulator game, released for the Sega Saturn only in Japan in 1998.

name: Wacca S
summary: The first major update to the arcade rhythm game Wacca, which added BPM notation, synchronising the start time of music during multiplayer play, and new game modes.

name: Wallace & Gromit's World of Invention: Wallace's Workshop
summary: Get crash test Wallace from A to B by building contraptions from components and tools - test different combinations and get Wallace down the tube and into the next level.

name: Wallace & Gromit: Top Bun
summary: Baker Bob has been murdered! Help Wallace & Gromit bake the products that Baker Bob used to make so that people don't go hungry.

name: Waste in Space
summary:
Waste in Space is the funniest ragdoll game of all the galaxies!
Swing endlessly between asteroids and destroy all the orbiting trash before it falls down on planet Earth.

name: Wauies
summary: In the tycoon game "Wauies - The Pet Shop Game," you run your own pet store. Prove your managerial skills, build pens, take care of cats, dogs, rodents and fish, fulfill your customers' wishes and expand your pet store. Play now!

name: Wanderers
summary: Embark on a journey through a mysterious alien solar system and uncover it's dark secrets. Fight for survival, build a base, and construct a spaceship. Explore each diverse and unique planet and piece together the mystery.

name: Wave Crash
summary: A water craft adventure at high speeds featuring tricks and upgradeable vehicles. Explore dozens of different maps and master the fast paced, frantic game play!

name: War Stained
summary: The year is 2022, war has kicked off and taken over the world. Everywhere you look you see tales of horror and war crimes.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade - Belial War Pack
summary: Will you hear his call and be a loyal servant of the Emperor? If you do, then why not stand out in the middle of melee with the Belial War Pack? It includes the Champion weapon and armour pack (for the Space Marine faction) and 10,000 RTCs to customize your warrior furthermore.

name: Wade
summary: A stroll along the shore of a wide river that flows into the underworld. As the player ventures deeper, the scenery starts to shift and they may encounter oddities or curiosities.

name: Wake of Ragnarok
summary: An action-rpg where some survived Ragnarok, the end of the world. Explore, find new equipment, upgrade your skills and bring the fight to the hordes of enemies and bosses standing in your way of getting home to Asgard.

name: Waifu Breaker
summary: Break hot waifus with your ball! Collect hearts and stay alive to reveal your waifu slowly. Bring light to your basement and uncover 11 lewd beauties!

name: Warface: Complete Tournament Pack
summary: This DLC contains permanent armor and weapons for all classes. All of the gear included in the DLC has been designed to deliver complete Warface experience and each item hand-picked to highlight class-specific perks and playstyles. Give it a shot!

name: Wars Across the World: Mali 2012
summary: Mali 2012 relates to rise of AQMI among the Tuareg rebellion and the efforts of Mali and France to counter them. The Islamic rebels must capture the urban centers of Mali and march on its capital Bamako to upset its government. Malian forces must hold till the French army shows up to the rescue, then they shall try to crush the enemy.

name: Wars Across the World: Saratoga 1777
summary: Saratoga 1777 simulates the victory of the American Insurgents against British troops during the War of Independence, an event which led to the Kingdom of France declaration of war against Britain. The British objective is to capture Albany, using small but professional troops.

name: Warp Trash Flotilla
summary: Warp Trash Flotilla is a space trash aggregator.

name: Wave
summary: Wave is one of the few games released for the Game Boy Advance add-on Play-Yan. It was distributed online by Nintendo in 2005.

name: Warfare Incorporated
summary: Warfare Incorporated is a real-time strategy game, released in 2003. It was developed by American studio Spiffcode and published by Handmark. In 2014 the game became open-sourced and freeware under the name Hostile Takeover.

name: Wanna Be Wizard
summary: A role-playing game for the GamePark 32.

name: Warf
summary: Unleash strategic survival in Warf, where you guide Warf through relentless hordes. Shape paths, deploy towers, and engage in thrilling combat. Defend against the horde and emerge as the ultimate survivor in this innovative fusion of survival action and tower defense.

name: Waters & Fields Adventure Bundle
summary:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Get ready for a logistic challenge in the next part of the best-selling series, which has been sold in over 120,000 copies! In Farm Manager 2022, as a farm manager, you have to ensure the right level of harvest, employee satisfaction, animal health, equipment efficiency and proper crop processing. You can buy new plots and use materials from abandoned buildings to expand your farm. Thanks to the new, more intuitive interface, employee management is even simpler.

name: Wave Machine
summary: Keep the wave alive as long as you can! Wave Machine is a rhythm game inspired by the Rhythm Heaven series! Use any button to interact, and try hitting the notes when the white bar/wave is right on you.

name: Walls & Balls
summary:
A mini-golf-pinball-pong hybrid with a Swiss design aesthetic? Say whaaaaaaa? Study and master the laws of physics in this fast paced ball bouncer. 
 
Draw walls to guide a fast moving ball into a hole. Capture power-ups to help your chances of success. Enjoy the Swiss design aesthetic and the attention to details that make Walls & Balls a delight to play. 
 
Tons of challenging levels and deceptively simple gameplay will keep you thrilled for hours. Fun for kids and adults.

name: Warp Out
summary: A VR exclusive shoot 'em up, Warp Out projects you in four different worlds full of enemies to destroy. Only your skill can bring you to the top of the leaderboards!

name: Warlord Arena: Evolution
summary:
Survival io of heroes evolving to survive!
From strong orcs, noble elves, to legendary wizards
Various races in the fantasy world start a war to determine the ultimate victor.
If you can't avoid it, use a craft to subdue your opponent.
If you survive the fierce battle to the end, victory is yours.

name: War of the Fourteen Dynasties
summary: Battle against thirteen rival dynasties across twenty war torn provinces in this challenging strategy fighter hybrid. Command your troops on the battlefield, or fight along side them as a soldier. Crush your enemies and lead your dynasty to total victory!

name: War and Peace
summary: This is a unique online strategy where you can fully control each fighter and squad. Find the enemy's weak points, create complex tactical maneuvers on the battlefield, and enjoy exciting battles. Each battle is a real test of your tactical skills and abilities

name: Wand Wars VR
summary: Wand Wars VR is an innovative roguelike magic action adventure VR game with easy style by Unreal Engine 4, the full version has single and duo modes, both modes have 8-10 hours game time.

name: Watch Dogs: DEDSEC Edition
summary:
The Dedsec Edition includes:

- Watch_Dogs
- 23cm Aiden Pearce Figurine
- 3 exclusive badges
- 4 collectible cards
- Artbook
- DEDSEC Collector box
- Map of Chicago
- Steelbook
- Soundtrack disc

Additional digital content:

- Watch_Dogs: Breakthrough Pack (DLC)
- Watch_Dogs: Palace Pack (DLC)
- Watch_Dogs: Signature Shot Pack (DLC)
- Watch_Dogs: White Hat Pack (DLC, for this edition exclusive to PS3/PS4)

name: War of Genesis III
summary: War of Genesis III is an RPG by Korean developer Softmax.

name: Waves Running Simulator
summary: Have you seen the enormous waves destroying the planet? If not, you are in the right place! In Waves Running Simulator you have to escape from the tsunami as fast as possible.

name: War Drones
summary: War Drones the Sci-Fi action game! Destroy your enemies in explosive PvP and PvE online battles! Massive multiplayer with 200+ players on the ground and air. Many extra abilities like using energy shields in the battle or Air attack from the space and teleporting your squad on to your position.

name: Waimanu: Grinding Block Adventure
summary: Waimanu: Grinding Block Adventure is a puzzle homebrew game for the Game Boy Advance, which later received a physical aftermarket release.

name: Wars of Napoleon
summary: AGEod goes back to the Napoleonic era and delivers the most detailed and comprehensive strategy game ever created about a time of struggle and conquest that forged modern Europe.

name: Watashi no Rilakkuma
summary: A virtual pet game with the character Rilakkuma.

name: War Heroes: Invasion
summary:
Mighty towers, powerful explosions, epic battles - all these and much more awaits you in this one of the best Tower Defense games.
Evil tanks, warplanes, mortar men and machine-gunners are ready to attack the land of civilians.
Take the challenge and commence the battle!

name: Waifu Puzzles
summary: This is a funny puzzle game where you need build anime girls from scattered fragments of a picture.

name: WarLords
summary: Save the World by destroying it? Gather your squad and "put things in order"!

name: Wanpaku Kokkun no Gourmet World
summary:
Wanpaku Kokkun no Gourmet World is a 2D platformer.

Later released as Panic Restaurant in the West with a changed main character sprite and increased difficulty.

name: War In Box
summary: An action game based on World War II.

name: Waternet
summary: Arduboy port of Waternet, which is a multiplatform water pipe puzzle game written for old consoles and handhelds.

name: Wan Chai Connection
summary: An adventure game released early in the Saturn's life cycle.

name: Wax Museum
summary: A severe storm and car accident force you to seek refuge in an abandoned Wax Museum. But an unknown force doesn't let you leave it... The marks of time and vandalism don't hide the beauty and extraordinariness of the exhibits, but where did the burning torches and other signs of life come from? It's up to you to reveal the terrible secret of the Wax Museum and defeat an ancient Evil! Colorful scenery, animation, and 3D visual effects will make your adventure vivid and fun. Those with a competitive streak can collect bonuses for speed and repeat the quest with new puzzles.

name: Warp Speed
summary: You control the speed of time, based on your vertical position on screen. Shoot and dodge your way through waves of enemies. Collect power-ups to help you defeat your enemies.

name: Wassermann
summary: A short and eerie horror game about trying to get into the lair of the Wassermann to rescue your spouse.

name: Warpie
summary: Run over 60 different levels with power ups, and 3 different ships. Earn coins and unlock different powers to your ship.

name: Wastebraver
summary: Wastebraver is a rogue-like survival game set in a post-apocalyptic fantasy hellscape.

name: Way in the stars
summary: Way In The Stars is a real adventure! Find the reasons for the disaster, save the ecosystem of the planet and colonists, and start your own way amongst the stars!

name: Wars Across the World: Congo 1964
summary: Congo 1964 plunges you in the midst of the bloody Simba rebellion in eastern Congo and its crushing by the mercenaries of Marshal Mobutu. The Simbas want to control as much of the land as possible and to terrorize expatriates and civilians alike.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Shangri-La
summary: The second installment of our Lost Cities series of courses takes you to Shangri-La. Make your way through a maze of bridges, soar over chasms, and collect even more lost balls! This DLC also includes a night mode version of the course with tougher holes and an all new foxhunt to solve!

name: Warriors & Mages
summary: You Play as the main character and travel to different villages and complete different quests while trying to save the king.

name: War Thunder: Reaper Pack
summary: This Pack includes: Meteor F.Mk.8 Reaper (Rank 5 Great Britain); 2000 Golden Eagles; Premium account for 15 days.

name: Warplanes Bundle
summary: Become a legend of air combat in Warplanes Bundle! Two thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW2 Dogfight and Warplanes: WW1 Sky Aces.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War III - Limited Edition
summary: Bring home the Dawn of War III Limited Edition, complete with unique collectibles to mark your return to galactic war.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution Ork Race Pack
summary: Includes 4 unique ability and wargear items to equip your squad with.KAN OPENER: Your attacks now have a chance to disable enemy vehicles. ANGRY ARMOR: Enemy attacks on the Warboss increases the damage he does. LUCKY TEEF: When you Warboss kills an enemy, friendly units in the surrounding area gain energy.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution: The Last Stand Necron Overlord
summary: The Overlords of the Necrons lead the legions into the carnage of war, commanding absolute authority over their subordinates. Armed with crackling warscythes and potent weaponry of ancient design, they dispatch their foes in flares of blinding energy.

name: Wastelan Wars
summary: You come out of the Vault, build a magnificent city.

name: Wayward
summary: A game about moving forward

name: WarDevil: Unleash the Beast Within
summary: Designed both as a Blu-ray movie and a video game, WarDevil is a long-in-development action game built for next-generation systems.

name: Wave Race 64
summary: Wave Race 64 was first released as a licensed game, with in-game sponsorship by Kawasaki Jet Ski. When the game was released for the Wii Virtual Console, every mention of Kawasaki was replaced by Nintendo-related images.

name: War of Sonria
summary: Turn based fantasy strategy game for PS Minis.

name: War of Kosovo: 2033
summary: War of Kosovo: 2033 is heavily based on its realistic city style and attractive game mechanics every season. Each season continues with new maps and special stylized wearable skins, graffiti, weapons, effects and sounds.

name: Way of the Turtle
summary:
In this charming adventure platformer, join two turtles on their journey to reunite stranded on a tropical island in the middle of nowhere. An island not so innocent as it might look at first glance. Cursed by evil magic, corrupting elements of the earth transforming them into vicious monsters and difficult obstacles.
However, not everything on the island is working against you. Become friends with the native gophers that inhabit the island, who will try and help you in your quest to get back home again.

name: Wars Across the World: Switzerland 1937
summary: Switzerland 1937 is the simulation of a fictive civil war in Switzerland, based on the unfinished and unpublished novel 'Eternal War'. It's the history of a Europe that never could recover from World War One and the Great Depression. In most European countries, conditions prevailing are tantamount to civil war.

name: War Mongrels: Renegade Edition
summary: War Mongrels is an isometric real-time tactics game that takes place on the eastern front of World War II. Its story-driven campaign takes inspiration in the grim events that actually took place and the real stories that arose from them.

name: War Platform: VR Air Force Golden - Enhanced Edition
summary: Driving advanced fighters to take off from an aircraft carrier and close combat with enemy fightersSupport without VR keyboard and handle control

name: Watashi no Happy Manner Book
summary: A Nintendo DS game by Taito.

name: Wasted Youth, Part 1
summary:
Wasted Youth, Part 1 takes place behind the walls of St. Frosts Academy - a school for slackers, troublemakers and idiots.
At first everything seems normal, but soon, children start to go missing...

Features: 16 main story missions, 13 side missions, 20 lessons to attend, 60 rooms to explore, 50 collectable trading cards to find, 60 achievements to complete, over 30 unlockable extras, and much much more...

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Castellan - Garran Crowe
summary: A flawless soul entrusted with one of the Grey Knights' most heinous possessions: the Black Blade of Antwyr. Add Garran Crowe to your Strike Force and bring righteous fury against all foes, be they Cultist or Daemonkind.

name: Wayne Gretzky Hockey
summary: Face off with "The Great One", number "99", Wayne Gretzky, nine-time winner of the NHL's MVP award and all-time hockey great. Designed with Wayne and other hockey professionals, this riveting simulation is packed with all the excitement and hard-hitting action that could be squeezed into a computer. From the adrenaline rush of a breakaway goal to the tension of sudden death overtime, Wayne Gretzky Hockey takes you onto the ice for the ultimate test of skill.

name: War Legends
summary: Once upon a time, a great evil invaded the Fairy Kingdom. Clans of wild orcs came from distant lands, and armies of the undead rose from their graves. Use the power of swords and sorcery to stop the invasion. Go to the wastelands and defeat deadly bosses!

name: Wall Shooter
summary: Wall Shooter is an immersive puzzle shooter game for VR where you will solve puzzles, shoot accurately, and save the universe from an approaching wall made of colorful bricks. (Yes, sometimes universal evil takes unusual forms.)Combine colors, use bonuses, and discover secrets on each level!

name: Wayne Gretzky Hockey 2
summary: Once again, face off with "The Great One", Number 99, Wayne Gretzky, nine time winner of the NHL's MVP award and all time hockey great. From the adrenaline rush of a breakaway goal to the tension of Sudden Death Overtime, Wayne Gretzky Hockey 2 takes you onto the ice for the ultimate test of skill.

name: War on Terror
summary: War on Terror is a real-time strategy game in a modern setting. In the game three factions are waging war against one another.

name: Waterworks!
summary: Waterworks! is a card-based strategy game. You've been placed in charge of the water supply in the medieval town of Grudziądz. You'll have to use your management skills to make sure every house has enough water and at the same time gather supplies for development of new technologies! Can you help provide the medieval town of Grudziądz with water?

name: Wall Street Raider
summary:
"An 'imaginative, stimulating' business simulation." -- Front page article in Investors Business Daily

"Wall Street Raider" (For Windows) is one of the oldest games on the Internet, published as a DOS version well before the World Wide Web, in 1986, and continually updated and improved ever since it moved to Windows in 2001. The current version (9.50), a major upgrade, was released in January, 2022. It is a sophisticated corporate finance game where you play as a billionaire, emulating a Warren Buffett or Carl Icahn.

name: Warhammer Pack: Hack and Slash
summary: ARPG and Hack 'n' Slash fans will love this pack that bundles two gripping adventures: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr and Warhammer: Chaosbane. Playing solo or with up to 4 others in local or online co-op, build your characters, loot the best arms and armour, and fight hordes of enemies in epic and intense battles.

name: Was it a Cat I Saw?
summary: This game is designed to test the limits of patience and pain of gamers. Challenge yourself with passion! And take your cat to the top with a better record than your friends. If you clear this game, will you be able to understand why the cat is trying to climb high?

name: Wayne Gretzky Hockey 3
summary:
The best selling PC Hockey game in the world just got better! Bethesda Softworks took suggestions from your letters and phone calls, and brought the pro coaches and players back to their locker room. Using their tips and tactics, along with your comments, Bethesda spent an additional five man-years creating Wayne Gretzky Hockey 3. The result is a faster, more realistic version of the fastest game on ice. From the adrenaline rush of a breakaway goal to the tension of Sudden Death Overtime, Wayne Gretzky Hockey 3 will take you onto the ice for the ultimate test of skill.

The classic overhead view has been carefully preserved and player graphics and intelligence refined even further. Bethesda Softworks hasn't messed with success, they've only made it better.

name: Water Warfare
summary: A kid friendly "first-person soaker" for WiiWare, in which you shoot water guns courtesy of Hudson Soft.

name: Wario Pool
summary: Wario Pool was a Wario series Game Boy Color billiards game in development by a British team (possibly Aardvark Software) involving Nick Pelling, Jeff Ferguson. It was officially shown to Nintendo but was rejected. However, the game would later become a title known as 3D Pocket Pool.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Assault Dice
summary: Warhammer 40,000: Assault dice, is the officially licensed Games Workshop dice roller for use with Warhammer 40,000. Custom made to simulate the unique mechanics of the game, Assault Dice captures the hands-on feel of using physical dice. Rapidly add, subtract, or "set aside" dice instantly without slowing down your game.

name: Warframe: Initiate Pack
summary:
Get the Initiate Pack and begin your Warframe journey today.

INITIATE PACK INCLUDES:
420 Platinum
Nidus Warframe
Boltor Rifle
Essential Base Damage Mod Bundle
Split Chamber
2000 Endo

name: Warp-Tek
summary: Warp-Tek is a horizontal space shooter wherein you have to rescue your pet after it got abducted by aliens and consequently imprisoned on a distant planet!

name: War Thunder: "Tracks of Victory" Bundle
Warden of the Arcaen
summary: Warden of the Arcaen is a dating sim style visual novel. The player will get to choose between dating men or women at the beginning of the game, play as 'Friends to Lovers' OR 'Enemies to Lovers'. Immerse yourself in this modern fantasy world and explore magical relationships!

name: Wat A Life
summary: You can make a game in the game, play a game in the game, or even order a takeout in the game, or make an online shopping, cheer up and make money to fulfill your dream in the game

name: Warhammer 40,000: Armageddon - Angels of Death
summary: Begin a whole new campaign taking control of the Blood Angels Space Marines as you battle the Ork invaders from the ash wastes of Armageddon all the way to the deepest caverns and claustrophobic corridors of the massive Hive cities!

name: Wand Wars: Rise
summary: Wand Wars: Rise is an innovative roguelike magic action adventure game with easy style by Unreal Engine 4, single mode has 8-10 hours play time to experience the whole world.

name: Warriors United
summary: Warriors United is a cooperative action game for up to 4 players. You'll fight and progress through levels filled with increasingly powerful enemies and bosses. Useyour skills and allies to become even stronger in your battles.

name: Wanted
summary: Top-down barrage shooter. Refer to the Vampire Ancient Survivor Meat Pigeon gameplay to add barrage, random character attributes, and random equipment.

name: Walking With Beasts: Operation Salvage
summary: Walking with Beasts: Operation Salvage is a CD-ROM tie in to the series Walking with Beasts. It was only released in Europe. The game is set in 2027 where time travelers are sent to different times and places in prehistory by The World Wildlife Bionetwork. A female agent named Vega has defected to a rival organisation who is trying to capture the beasts. The player's job is to find her, as well as destroy enemy equipment and free captured beasts.

name: Waifu Club: Azumi
summary: Waifu Club is the perfect Waifu puzzle game. Enjoy Azumi in 8 images in the gallery after you unlocked them in the game. The Gallery itself is easy controllable.

name: Wardrive
summary: You can crack into a lot of crypto wallets in one second when you were born with a lymphatic system that doubles as an RF transmitter, but now you're on the lam, riding shotgun with a cybernetic stranger at the wheel of your new ride. warDrive is a casual cyberpunk rail shooter.

name: Wasteland Raiders
summary: This game was cancelled in 2023.

name: War Dust
summary: With 64 soldiers on the battlefield, War Dust will take you into the largest online battles that have ever been made in VR featuring a huge arsenal of guns and vehicles. Solidarity, rivalry, cooperation, confrontation: enjoy virtual reality from a new perspective.

name: Waronoi
summary: Imagine a chess board where you can zoom in to see that every piece, is made up by several smaller pieces, which is made up by several smaller pieces, etc. Waronoi is a modern military real-time strategy game on a breath taking scale, where the fate of an entire army can be altered by a single unit.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Lord of Skulls
summary:
This DLC adds the Lord of Skulls as a new neutral unit roaming the battlefields of Gladius Prime.

The Lord of Skulls is a massive behemoth, one of the strongest units in the game.

name: WaggaSim
summary: Take to the skies in the ultimate paragliding and speed-flying simulator. Experience lifelike physics, design or modify your own gear, and perfect your style: soaring, thermaling, acro, freestyle, and more. With soft-body wings that move like real fabric, the sky is no longer the limit!

name: War Platform: US Aircraft Carrier
summary: US Aircraft Carrier is a simulation game based on the God's perspective, which can command the aircraft on the aircraft plane to take off and land, the real simulation of the aircraft carrier operations.

name: Warp Speed: Infinity
summary: Put your reflexes to the ultimate test with this unique arcade-style racing game: Warp speed: Infinity. Make your way through space at incredible speeds while dodging asteroids and space junk. Unlock a variety of different ships with unique features and handling by reaching ever higher scores.

name: Waffle
summary: Waffle is a daily word game of letters and logic. Rearrange the letters to solve the words. The top score is awarded for solving the puzzle in the least number of moves.

name: Wars Across the World: Fornovo 1495
summary: Fornovo 1495 is the story of the first 'War of Italy', with the expedition of French king Charles VIII against Naples. The French objective is to capture the key city of Naples and keep it against their adversaries.

name: Warships 3D
summary: Warships 3D is customizable battleship-like game done in 3D environment with animations and cutscenes. Players can define their own rules like map size, which ships are available and at which events what weapons will be granted to player(s).

name: Wan Nyan Pet Shop
summary: Become an employee at a pet shop, interacting with dogs and cats while selling pet products. The player will take good care of the pets so that they meet their wonderful owner.

name: Wan Nyan Doubutsu Byouin
summary: Wan Nyan Doubutsu Byouin is a Simulation game, developed and published by Columbia Music Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Warp Glider
summary: In Warp Glider you pilot a glider craft at blazing speeds pulling off aerial acrobats while surviving the Bandits swarming through the warp horizon. Classic arcade action and feel with a modern touch!

name: Wave Dungeon
summary: Wave Danjon is a roguelike RPG in which the player is forced to navigate a map that switches at regular intervals. Conquer dungeons that become more powerful and evil with each wave!

name: Watch This!
summary:
Watch This! Is a first-person single player platformer with horror elements.
You are the star of the newest, most spectacular show. Avoid traps, hide from the monsters, rescues out of the maze ... Or die. The key is to entertain billions of viewers!

name: Wandering Trails: A Hiking Game
summary: Wandering Trails is a peaceful experience of venturing for a hike in the great outdoors. There are no goals, enemies, jump scares or achievements. There is only you, nature and your trusty old camera.

name: Wars Across the World: Morat 1476
summary: Morat 1476 is a two player contest, between Spring 1474 and Winter 1477, opposing the Duchy of Burgundy under Charles the Bold and the Swiss Confederation and its allies, for the control of the key heartlands in the Wars of Burgundy, at the end of the Middle Ages.

name: Wander Wonder
summary:
As a child, Jino's ailing uncle tells him of a powerful treasure, the Orichalcum, lying unclaimed in ancient ruins he once attempted to explore. Jino vows to grow strong enough to finish his uncle's work. Years later, the young but unprepared adventurer collapses outside the town of Encia. He recovers upon healing at the local inn, then fights further into the surroundings of the capital city Delphi. Others also want the fabled Orichalcum, from his magic-using ally Tia Chanti to the antagonistic sorcerer Thales. In the end, who among them will revive and reclaim the land's hidden power?

Wander Wonder is a unique overhead 2D action-RPG by Compile, originally released in 3 episodes via their Disc Station digital magazine starting in October, 1999. Jino can jump, slash, and use a mix of items, tools, and special moves to explore and fight his way across the land. Weapons degrade with use, but are frequently found as loot or merchandise, adding an element of resource management and incentive to repair arms at blacksmiths. The game progresses in a flip-screen style a la classic Zelda or Ys; multiple complex overworlds and dungeons await you. Finally, there's considerable post-game content, from new side-quests to a 500-floor mega-dungeon!

name: War Thunder: Turm III Pack
Wand Wars
summary: Ride brooms, cast spells and transform your enemies into chickens in this intense magical sport

name: Warium
summary: Warium is a turn-based strategy for creating your empire. Choose your faction and go ahead. Recruit and upgrade units, build buildings and raise your economy. You are free to choose in which direction to expand your power.

name: War Thunder: AV-8B Night Attack Bundle
WarioWare Mouse Workz!
summary: WarioWare Mou$e Workz! is a custom made minigame that features eleven microgames and a boss game.

name: Water Ball
summary: Water Ball - a puzzle game from category 3 in a row, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.

name: Watch Quest! Heroes of Time
summary: A new kind of game experience that spans two devices. The iPhone serves as your kingdom, while the Apple Watch represents the Hero's journey. Your job? To help the hero travel the lands, battle monsters, solve puzzles, search for treasure, and complete every Quest!

name: WarZone Flashpoint
summary: WarZone Flashpoint is in an RTS in development by Dust Storm Entertainment. We're an indie team bringing you a classic RTS formula which we intend to update for a long time to come!

name: WakaVR
summary: Welcome to the VR game experience that combines the fast-paced action of Beat Saber and the classic arcade-style gameplay of Pac-Man. In this game, you'll step into a neon-infused world, ready to carve your path through each level.

name: Warlords Classic Strategy
summary:
The mission is simple – you should eliminate the other sides by capturing their cities. But victory is never easy - it can only be achieved by building massive armies, training and equipping mighty heroes, befriending legendary allies, and exploring the deep dark secrets hidden within Illuria's ruins.
