So make your choice! Will you lead the Sirian Knights, the Gray Dwarves, the Storm Giants, the Orcs of Kor, the Elves of Elvallie, the Horse Lords, the mysterious Selentine Empire or the evil Lord Bane? Whomever you choose, fortune and glory await you!
Detailed User Manual is included. We strongly recommend you to read it through carefully to refresh your memories and know about a few differences between this version and original game.

name: Wario Land: The Shake Dimension
summary: The Wario Land: Shake It! bag game is an Adobe Flash game published by extra toxic as part of their Nintendo advent calendar microsite. The game was made to promote Wario Land: Shake It!

name: WarSphere
summary: WarSphere is a fast-paced, Roguelike Top-Down Shooter. As an Armed Spherical Robotic System, you blast, loot and boost your way through procedurally generated worlds and dungeons in order to fulfill your purpose and become part of 'the Archive', which only marks the end of the beginning. Endgame activities include Daily Speed Running Leaderboards, Community Maps, etc.

name: WarSphere: The Worthy Branch
summary: Unlocks 3 additional acts, 2 additional endings and 35 new enemy types for the WarSphere base game.

name: Waifu Clicker
summary: The Gameboy Clicker game that nobody ever even asked for! Created during GGJ16 In ~24 hours with mild panic everywhere around the theme of "ritual" heck, there's nothing more ritualistic than a clicker game, let's Gameboy it up. This was the sadly somewhat lacklustre result, but still, it IS a gameboy ROM I made so, here it is in all its glory. Kiss the waifus.

name: Wandering Wolf
summary: Survival-Action experience in a dead world destroyed by civil war. You have to complete your own story, fighting for survival with monsters and nature.

name: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Mirumo no Mahou Gakkou Monogatari
summary: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Mirumo no Mahou Gakkou Monogatari is an adventure video game which was was developed by Jupiter Corporation and published by Konami and released for PlayStation on March 20, 2003 in Japan. This game is based of the Manga and Anime series Selfish Fairy Mirumo De Pon!.

name: War is Hare
summary: A two-player tactical game for Playdate.

name: Wanderfog
summary:
This multiplayer on-line game is about treasure hunters. 
   Do you like to wander alone through endless sands and stone deserts? Do you like the long quest for treasures and artifacts? Aren't you afraid of evil monsters and hidden robbers? Do you like craft and money? 
   Welcome to Wanderfog! Welcome to sands and rocks of the Dead Sea, treasure hunter!

name: Wars Across the World: Caesar 54
summary: Caesar 54BC covers the major invasion of the southern part of Britannia by Julius Caesar. The Romans must capture as many hostages as possible from the local tribes. The Britons must use all means at their disposal to prevent the success of the raid, to discourage further Roman invasions.

name: Wagrrr
summary: Give your viewers more FUN and INTERACTIVITY with your broadcasts! Let your viewers respond live on-screen to your gameplay, send text and questions, and make FUN wagers on your Battle Royale Games! ADD AN EXTRA LAYER OF FUN TO YOUR BROADCASTS!

name: Wave Run
summary: Superspeed jetpack platformer!

name: Warpspeed Infinity
summary:
Get ready for a hair-raising experience even for the most experienced gamers!
Warpspeed Infinity is a shockingly difficult minimalist flying game. Controls are as simple as it gets: Just tilt the device to fly through a psychedelic tunnel full of weird stuff.

name: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Hachinin no Toki no Yousei
summary: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Hachinin no Toki no Yousei is an adventure video game which was was developed by Jupiter Corporation and published by Konami and released for Game Boy Advance on December 11, 2003 in Japan. This game is based of the Manga and Anime series Selfish Fairy Mirumo De Pon!.

name: Watamelon's Adventure
summary: You are Watamelon, roll around, jump and collect Watamelon cards.

name: Warlock Survivors
summary: Warlock Survivors is the battleground where you will face hundreds of thousands of enemies in a single frantic run. Upgrade your build and grab all resources you can to reach enough power to survive.

name: WatanOS
summary: WatanOS is a c̶̭̄ọ̶͝m̷̝̂ṕ̵͉l̶͚̂e̵̥̽t̵͕̂e̴̝͑l̵͎͛y̸̮̌ ̷̡͝ñ̵ͅo̷̦͒r̶̤̽m̷̧̌a̵̼̽l̶̹̇ operating system for all your mistery-solving needs!

name: Wales Interactive Publisher Bundle
summary: Wales Interactive have bundled six great games including the recent hit FMV titles, Late Shift and The Bunker. Soul Axiom and Knee Deep round up the story-rich adventure games and if you're looking for fast-paced action at super speeds then look no further than Coffin Dodgers and Infinity Runner!

name: Walk of Shame
summary: Escape without getting caught by your one-night stand's husband!! An indie pixel art game.

name: Wanted: Gunslinger's Kiss
summary: Your life as a promising young deputy in a wild land inhabited by giant monsters and dangerous outlaws takes an unexpected turn when you're framed for murder while on your first field assignment. Before long, you've been captured by the most infamous group of mercenaries in the land—the Lazarus Gang, who are eager to claim the price on your head. On the way to turn you in, however, you realize that these outlaws aren't the evil men you expected… and they discover that you're a bounty unlike any other.

name: Wall Kickers
summary: Wall Kickers is an endless climber where the player must be careful which walls they use to jump on!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Traitor Legions Pack
summary: The emperor's children Legion betrayed their figurative father -- the Emperor of Man -- some ten thousand years ago, during the Horus Heresy. The Legion fell to the perverse temptations of the Chaos God Slaanesh, becoming addicted to the sensations of battle and conquest. They have served the Prince of Excess ever since.

name: Wanted Killer VR
summary: In the aftermath of being captured by the evil corporation he was trying to take down, Rick Slade died as an unwilling participant of an experiment to transfer consciousness to another host... or did he? Take down the corporation that did this to him. Welcome to Wanted Killer VR!

name: War of the Seraphim
summary: War of the Seraphim is a fast-paced FPS action game where one must skillfully choose their specific upgrade path and fend off the waves of hostile war machines. The player must navigate the map with care as many paths may lead to regions already taken by the hostile forces.

name: Watataku
summary:
When you approach Kuroki, interact to catch her.
Catching succeeds or fails depending on Kuroki's current speed and game progression.
If you catch Kuroki you win the game. Loses when the other characters catches Kuroki or Kuroki runs away.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution Imperial Guard Race Pack
summary: Includes 4 unique ability and wargear items to equip your squad with.THE EMPEROR'S EXECUTIONERS: Instantly kill infantry units with less than a fifth of their health remaining. BLESSED CARAPACE OF RESOLVE: Friendly units within the area gain increased damage resistance.

name: Water: Transformer
summary: This is a platform jumping game, you can obtain different abilities by transforming between solid, liquid, and steam three forms, thus crossing obstacles and solving puzzles. The workshop allows you design and share their own created maps with the players all around the world.

name: Way of the Wizard
summary: Way of the Wizard is a first-person adventure game. Take on the role of a traveler who wants to become a wizard.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Tyranid Elites
summary: Two deadly new units join the Tyranid roster in Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector: the nightmarish Broodlord, and the devastating Hive Guard.

name: Waifu Packer
summary: Waifu Packer is puzzle game where you try to fit tiles into boxes by moving them around on a grid. Each level you unlock an image of a beautiful waifu which will be waiting for you in the gallery!

name: Walk Around this Place
summary: I think I see a tree!

name: Way Back Witness
summary: 《归路：见证 Way Back Witness》是一款架空世界回合制RPG游戏。 玩家扮演“异界来访者”马次娜·骸，见证忒瑞阴德上的是是非非。在这不属于自己的世界中踏上那注定不平凡的归路。

name: War of Bellrook
summary: Go forth on a text-based, choose your own adventure where you can choose your role and embark on adventure as various different people who tread different paths.

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Stromdorf
summary: Explore 2 stunning new adventure maps in this DLC for Vermintide, where you travel outside of Ubersreik's walls to the ever-rainy town of Stromdorf

name: Way to Go!
summary: Over 400 tricky puzzles, intuitive controls and cute heroes guarantee hours of fun.

name: Waffle House
summary: Waffle House is a set of 9 MBF21 maps by a small group of people who decided to get together and answer a simple question: "What is bro waffling about?". Maps are balanced for pistol start, target port is DSDA, and difficulties are implemented.

name: Warlordocracy
summary: A party-based RTWP (real-time with pause) RPG that gradually grows into a large-scale strategy game as you amass soldiers and fame (or infamy).

name: Wakusei Aton Gaiden
summary: A vertical-scrolling shoot 'em up produced by Kokuzeichou: the Japanese equivalent of the IRS. Players are given frequent multiple choice questions while playing.

name: Wallenda
summary: Many years later, one early Magic Doll woke up quietly. With the awakening of the mysterious power, she travelled through the world full of nightmare. In order to find the airship and escape from the horrible world, she must go through various levels until the end of the journey.

name: War of the Worlds
summary:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story, puzzles and mechanics.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2023.

name: Warawara Invaders
summary: A 2d casual rolling shooter that is best for killing time!

name: Wargle
summary: You have to destroy advancing enemies while navigating through a maze.

name: Waste Labs
summary:
You are the last space marine at the Nuke Testing base on the Moon all of your friends are dead and you only have a pistol, so what are you gonna do about it?

Waste Labs is a megawad for Doom 1 with 3 episodes.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dark Millennium
summary: Set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe, Dark Millennium was under development by Vigil Games with a release window of Q1 2014. Following THQ's bankruptcy filing and subsequent asset auction, the development and release of Dark Millennium is currently uncertain.

name: Warlords: Under Siege
summary: Warlords: Under Siege is a mix of RTS and TD genre, where you build a small city and defend it against continuous waves of enemies. Improve your assortment of weapons with each playthrough, unlocking new possibilities to beat the ever-increasing threat.

name: WarBots
summary: This is a platformer, 2D MOBA game with shooting robots.An 5v5 PvP arena where the goal is to destroy the enemy team's core. You can customize your equipment, which you can acquire by reaching higher levels.While you're dead, you control a small but deadly drone.

name: War General: Multiplayer Rank
summary:
Lead your troops to victory in epic battles against opponents in "War General - Multiplayer Rank"! As a war general, you'll need to strategize and plan your attacks carefully to outsmart your opponents and emerge victorious.
With a variety of soldiers, weapons, and military vehicles at your disposal, you can customize your army to suit your playstyle and take on any challenge that comes your way. Choose your spawning position and deploy your troops across the battlefield, taking down enemy soldiers, towers, and walls while protecting your own base from attack.
Each victory earns you in-game currency that you can use to upgrade your soldiers and equipment, making them even more powerful for your next battle. But that's not all – winning games also earns you rank points that can help you climb the ranks and earn even greater rewards!

name: Wall to Wall
summary: Wall to Wall is an arcade scoring game.

name: War Commander
summary: Super shocking military strategy game world! Lots of weapons and combat effects. Collect more advanced commanders and build weapons and equipment. Loot resources, build military units, and pass various interesting levels. Legion battle, you can attack other players.

name: War of Tanks: Blitzkrieg
summary: Real-time tank RPG game. It recreates the classic tanks of World War II and restores the shocking war scenes with fantasy World War II plots. Command your futuristic tanks across history and rekindle your war spirit with the will of iron and blood.

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 3
summary: This pack includes 6 new playable characters. They are: Monkie Shifu Bowlie Chivalry Greatos Jr. Eye Boogie

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 5
summary: This pack includes 4 new playable characters. They are: Water Monkey Sea ​Anemone Erkui Grass

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 2
summary: This pack includes 6 new playable characters. They are: M-Fish, Mad Ding, Devil Ding, Ghost, Radish and Foot.

name: Wanagiri
summary: Wanagiri is a short visual novel where you play as Kamila, who accidentally isekai'ed to an uncompleted book that your friend wrote. How will you end the story, and will you be back there again someday?

name: Wars Across the World: Koenigsberg 1945
summary: Koenigsberg 1945 relates the major Soviet offensive against East Prussia in early 1945. The German player must hold at all costs against enemy onslaughts to gain enough time for his civilian population to evacuate from the last held East Prussian ports.

name: Wait What's That
summary: Wait What's that is a hilarious take on VR pictionary with imaginative drawing modes that are impossible in real life, making each gaming session a fresh and surprising experience.

name: Water Polo
summary: A team sports game of water polo for one or two players.

name: Wanderlust: The Bermuda Secret
summary: After your flight takes you into an ominous cloud bank, you soon find yourself hidden within the eye of a permanent storm at the center of the Bermuda Triangle, with no connection to the rest of the world, no supplies, and no hope of escape from a strange island! This point and click, puzzle adventure tasks players with finding a list of objects hidden, to uncover the truth of the island.

name: Waifu Bay Girls
summary: Waifu Bay Girls is a hot 15-puzzle game with charming heroines of Waifu Bay Resort. Gather all of the pictures of the beauties!

name: Wars Across the World: Zulu 1879
summary: Zulu 1879 recreates the British military campaign leading up to the destruction of the belligerent Zulu kingdom in South Africa in 1879. The British and their allies must quickly seize the enemy capital Ulundi or capture the Zulu king.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Temple at Zerzura
summary: The ultimate sand trap—the Sahara Desert—recedes after a thousand years, revealing a mini golf course fit for an Egyptian king and queen! Putt through the serene dunes, vast throne room, and great pyramids as you search for clues and lost balls within the forgotten temple.

name: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Yume no Kakera
summary: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Yume no Kakera is an adventure video game which was was developed and published by Konami and released for Game Boy Advance on July 15, 2004 in Japan. This game is based of the Manga and Anime series Selfish Fairy Mirumo De Pon!.

name: War Room: Blitz
summary: War Room: Blitz is a single-player, turn-based strategy game based on the historical WWII German bombing campaign conducted against the United Kingdom. Test your management skills as well as your intuition, and defend your land & protect your people.

name: War of Stealth Assassin
summary: It is stealth action, top-down shooter with armed soldiers and zombies which has sci fi style and rude and rectilinear humor. You play for a soldier who must come in to a secret base and take information about they work. But the main hero doesn`t expected that a base has many secrets from which blood getting cold in veins. The game is gived thrills with possibility to play by quite and stealth but also you can shoot if you ready to it.

name: Wake Cup
summary: Wake Cup is a coffee themed tower defense & clicker mash-up with rogue-lite meta progression. Shoot coffee to flocks of tired workers on a boring Monday morning to keep them energised. The economy must grow!

name: Warplock
summary: At the edge of the galaxy on the fringes of hyperspace and hypertime, your space craft is trapped in a bizarre space/time warp. You are engulfed by a band of space pirates bent on destroying you and your crew. It'll take some inside moves with your controller, and skill that's out of this world to get out of this one!

name: War Along the Mohawk
summary: A real time strategy game taking place during the French and Indian War featuring the ability to choose from 1 of 40 different "hero" units to fight your way through the campaign

name: Watson
summary: Watson is a two-player co-op horror adventure game. The two cute little robots must escape from the evil beings chasing them. Explore a grand and beautiful Victorian city with a steampunk makeover. Uncover secrets about the city, the robots, and the beings chasing them. But don't get caught!

name: Water Game Simulator
summary: A classic casual puzzle game that simulates a water ring machine.

name: Waifu Fight: Dango Style
summary: Waifu Fight Dango Style is an exciting new anime action based puzzle game. The gameplay infuses wall breaking mechanics from Breakout, silly narrative and sexual elements from HuniePop, special attacks and combos from Street Fighter, and retro action from good old fashioned Pong!

name: Warlords.IO
summary: Warlords.IO is a Class-Based Top-Down Shooter with MOBA elements that features 4 Player Split-Screen and Cross-Platform Multiplayer in several competitive multiplayer modes and a cooperative Survival mode!

name: Water Me!
summary: Indie 3D puzzle-platform adventure where you play as a water and change states to solve puzzles, find collectibles, create gardens, learn about flower cultures and save the world one plant at a time.

name: Warrior's Lair
summary: Classic dungeon-crawler comes alive on the Playstation 3 system!

name: Warrior Chef
summary: Play as Mako, a Warrior Chef in a fantasy world of sentient food, chopping up foes for ingredients to cook new abilities in a 3D Hack and Slash about eating your way through four Food Kingdoms in a race to stop the spreading Rot.

name: Wakka Follow the Treasure Ring
summary: The controls are really simple, so don't worry! To raise the spaceship, just press the button. When you release it, gravity will pull the spaceship down. Collect "wakka" while avoiding walls and obstacles.

name: Wars Across the World: Franche-Comté 1636
summary: Franche-Comté 1636 takes place during the so-called Ten Years' war, in the Modern era. The Franche-Comté player has to repel the French and Weimarian assaults by defending strategic places. This scenario allows Francs-Comtois to win by a diplomatic victory later in the game, via a peace treaty.

name: Wars Across the World: Serbia 1914
summary: Serbia 1914 simulates the Austro-Hungarian offensives against Serbia and Montenegro during the first month of WW1, in the Balkans. Three Austrian armies must crush Serbian forces and capture Belgrade. The Serbians are powerful, but their resources are scarce, whether to resist...or counter-attack!

name: War For Galaxy
summary: Become the ruler of the entire Galaxy: colonize planets, extract resources, build defenses and fight in planetary battles!

name: Wacko
summary: Wacko is an arcade game where the player is in the role of Kapt'n Krooz'r, a small, green alien. The game features a unique angled cabinet design and a combination of trackball and joystick controls.

name: Warlordocracy: Chapter 2
summary: Warlordocracy Chapter 2: Import your party and reputations from the previous chapter or create a new character from scratch.

name: Walk with the Living
summary: Walk with the Living is a strategy role-playing game with visual novel elements taking influence from series like Fire Emblem.

name: Wash Simulator: Clean Garage, House, Cars Business Tycoons - Extended Edition
Waking Nightmare
summary: A short horror game for the Gameboy Color

name: War Birds: WW2 Air strike 1942
summary: War Birds is a 2.5D World War 2 air combat game, with impressive 3D warplanes and beautiful 2D environments.

name: War of Roses
summary: Save a flower shop from a corporation. Fall in love. Maybe even at the same time.

name: Warren the Warlock
summary: Get ready to venture out as Warren, the ominous-looking warlock. Hurl your magic orb, invert gravity for yourself, and phase shift through walls. Fight your way to the leader of the invading horde in hopes of liberating your realm.

name: Walden Horde
summary: You are right in the middle of political conflicts and hot war in a kingdom that draws its strength from its ruthlessness. Fight against the ruthless wizards and great warriors in the Walden Kingdom. Revolutionise the fantasy/medieval world by honing your combat and diplomacy skills!

name: Warfork
summary: Warfork is a demanding fast paced first person shooter with a focus on speed, aim, movement, and above all competitive play.

name: Wall Jump Stuff
summary: Physics based arcade wall jumping game - Wall jump up an endless cliff, clear obstacles, catch gems, unlock quirky characters and fill your boat!

name: Walkerman: Act 2 - Herdchaser-girl
summary: The second installment of Walkerman, a Visual Novel by ScalemaiL.

name: Want to Hear a Scary Story?
summary: Take up the mantle of a Slasher villain, hack and chop your way through victims to get revenge.

name: Waven: Drhell's Bells Pack
summary: Check out the Drhell's Bells Pack, a thrilling special offer combining an adorable Drheller pet and 300 Gems - just perfect to start or continue your adventure in style!

name: Way Beyond
summary: Way Beyond is an open world roguelite with a procedurally generated, endless overworld. Defeat enemies with basic combat, collect gems as a high score mechanic. Use tools to hack and slash with (sword, hatchet, pickaxe) in this destructible environment.

name: WarOFuture
summary: WarOFuture is a two-player card and chess game inspired by military chess, where two players are divided into red and blue factions, manipulate their own chess to attack and destroy each other's chess pieces. You can also use pre-builded magic cards with different effects to assist in battle.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Armageddon - Untold Battles
summary: This scenario pack DLC features 5 all new scenarios in a variety of mission types, ranging from search and destroy to last stand defensive battles!

name: Water Spirit
summary: Water Spirit is three maps I have made for a year, with lots of enemies and detailed architecture. The feel is intended to be slightly moody, but with lots of action and danger that will test the player.

name: WALL-E 2
summary: WALL-E 2 is a cancelled sequel to the Nintendo DS game movie tie-in game WALL-E, which was developed by Helixe before being cancelled in November 2008 after they were shut down by THQ. Nothing is known about what the game was going to be about, with the only details about the gameplay surfacing online being that it would've featured a local co-op mode that contained multiple playable characters from the movie.

name: Wat?
summary: Wat? is a first-person open world sandbox game with dark humor. The protagonist of the game is a serious elderly businessman named Bill Board. An unknown virus somehow got into the water supply, so all the people became very strange and all the time want to kill Bill.

name: Wanderer 2: The Seas of Fortune
summary:
Prepare yourself for an exhilarating journey filled with a brand new collection of adventures in Wanderer 2: The Seas of Fortune. Get ready to embark on an unforgettable voyage into uncharted territories and discover the mysteries that await!

Explore new ages with the promise of swordfights, ship battles, pirates and maybe even treasure (?!) as you sail into uncharted waters and navigate the age of the buccaneers. What other exciting new eras may Wanderer 2: The Seas of Fortune unlock for eager time travelers?

name: Warrior Escape
summary: Help our Space Warrior escape this ship by touching your screen to fly higher. Stay away from the door, and don’t drop down.

name: War Heli
summary: War Heli was developed in 1987 by the two Swiss crackers M. Heubi und M. Köhler for the Atari ST platform. War Heli is a vertical shoot 'em up in a war setting. The player pilots a helicopter through an area where he has to destroy all enemy tanks. He has to be careful not to hit any ambulances. If he does so, his score gets set to zero. War Heli is a challenging game with high standards in graphics and technique for its time. War Heli came with a then unique feature: you could save the game to the disk and continue later. Further artists of the Argonica team were: T. Steimle, R. Gafner and H.P. Gysel.

name: Wacky Wings VR
summary: Launch into this idyllic, arcade-style ride and take to the skies to explore the thrilling and diverse VR world of Wacky Wings!

name: Warframe: Angels of the Zariman - Chrysalith Pack
summary: Venture into the dark Void of the Zariman with a fully reinforced Arsenal! Unleash electric fury as the newest Warframe, Gyre; unlock a bounty of new Customizations with Voidshell Warframe Skins; and master brand-new Weapons as you bring light to the dark and deadly Zariman.

name: Waifu Secret 2
summary: Waifu Secret 2 this is exciting, puzzle game with Fancy Girls. Control your tube and find the way to pass the level and unlock a lot of beauty in the gallery Waifu Secret 2 contain a nice mechanic, cute girls and awesome story.

name: Waku-waku Puyo Puyo Dungeon
summary: Waku-waku Puyo Puyo Dungeon is a roguelike dungeon crawler featuring characters from the Madou Monogatari and Puyo Puyo franchises.

name: Waifu Love
summary: Waifu Love is a casual puzzle game where you need to play puzzles like clicker, match game etc.

name: Wakataka Oozumou: Yume no Kyoudai Taiketsu
summary: Waka Taka Ozumo: Brothers Dream Match is a sumo video game developed by Tomcat System and published by Imagineer for the Super Famicom, which was released exclusively in Japan in 1993.

name: Wagyan Paradise
summary:
Wagyan Paradise is the third Wagyan Land game for the Super Famicom and the sixth game in the series overall. It features two new "Wagyan" dinosaur protagonists who alternate between stages: Takuto (a green male Wagyan) and Karin (a pink female Wagyan).

Wagyan Paradise introduces a brand new array of post-level mini-games, a staple of the series, and adds more story cutscenes which help explain what's going on with the various incidents happening to Takuto's and Karin's island home. It also has a new art style.

name: Waccha PriMagi! Studio
summary: Waccha PriMagi! Studio is a Japanese rhythm-based amusement arcade game, it's the successor of the Waccha PriMagi! arcade game.

name: Warped Times
summary: Born in a dystopian world, you will discover the secrets of the magic stone which provides life and death to whole civilizations. Experience the fight between good and evil, as well as the blending of time and space itself. And in the end, maybe you will save more than one civilization!

name: Wathan Games
summary: "Wathan Games" is designed to build bridges between streamers and their viewers, turning every game into an opportunity to strengthen community bonds.

name: Warframe: The Jovian Concord
summary: Rumors are circulating of an alliance between Alad V and our most feared enemy -- the Sentients. Infiltrate the remastered Corpus Gas City on Jupiter, drive your blade through Amalgam horrors, unlock the power of the Wisp Warframe, and shine a light on this sinister Corpus plot.

name: Watch Dogs: Vigilante Edition
summary:
The Watch_Dogs Vigilante Edition is dedicated to hard core fans who'd like to embody the hacker vigilante in real life!

The Vigilante Edition includes;
- Aiden’s Baseball Cap and Mask
- Soundtrack
- Single player mission: Palace pack

name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - The Traitor Curse Part 1
summary:
To celebrate the first anniversary of Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, we have prepared a free, two-part update called The Traitor Curse bringing more content to the game. Part 1 will release during November, Part 2 will follow before the winter holidays.

The Traitor Curse Part 1 - Features:

New Cinematic: Learn about the motivations of the Moebian 6th and discover The Carnival, a new disreputable zone promising transgressive distractions and entertainment.
New Zone & Mission: Strike at the heart of the Moebian 6th operations and fend off hordes of enemies in Mercantile located in The Carnival.
Inspect Feature: Inspect player loadouts in The Mourningstar.
Update to Veteran Talent Tree: Enjoy many changes and tweaks made to the Veteran tree, including the addition of Keystones (due to these changes, Veterans will see their talent tree reset and players will have to re-assign talent points).

name: Water Pipeline
summary: Water Pipeline is a strategic puzzle game. Objective of this game is simple, rotate the different pieces of pipe in order to get water and save the life. There is no time limit but you have limited moves for each round and you have to complete the pipeline before running out of moves. So think about a good strategy before you start working on the pipeline.

name: Warbringers of Angrul
summary: Warbringers of Angrul is a grand strategy RTS where you manage your empire on a grand campaign map and command your armies in exciting real time battles. Lead zealous crusaders, cunning elves, or savage orcs in bringing war to the world of Angrul in both single and multiplayer.

name: WarLord: Edenui Churak
summary: WarLord: Edenui Churak is a fantasy MMORPG game.

name: Watcher Of The Abyss
summary: "One day, a mysterious abyssal vortex appeared, unleashing countless monsters set on world destruction. Choose your warriors to guard the abyss. Collect tokens from fallen foes, buy nodes, and strategically place them for ultimate power. Reclaim abyss-covered areas."

name: Way Walkers: University
summary: Embark on a magical adventure through a spiritual world.

name: Walk With Me
summary: Through casual exploration of five unique character's spaces, the player has the opportunity to reflect on everyday relationships between game objects, the playable characters, and their own role as a participant in this fictional world.

name: War in Europe: 1940
summary: War in Europe: 1940 is inspired by classic FPS and historical operations happened during 1940 in Europe where you will fight along two campaigns(Axis and Allies) allowing you to fight in the conflict in both sides.

name: Wars Across the World: Carrhae 53
summary: Carrhae 53 BC, the worst Roman defeat in the East. The Legions of the wealth and ambitious Crassus must march onto Seleucia, the civil war ridden capital of the Parthians, with unreliable allies at their sides.

name: War 3010: The Revolution
summary:
An alien race named Kyllen has enslaved humanity. On the planet Joyec, rebels managed to take the Kyllen by surprise and seize one of their battle fleets. The player must now guide their efforts in trying to throw over the Kyllen.

War 3010 is a turn-based strategy game in which players move spaceships over a grid-map. There are different types of ships, such as Fighters, Marauders or Destroyers, that differ in movement range and weapon power. Weapon power is also divided into long and short range, i.e. a ship that is very good at long range combat may have poor close ranged weapons etc. During combat, the following actions can be chosen from a menu: Movement, Attacking, terrain information, unit information, a map of the battlefield, overview of all units, including those of the enemy; and an option to scout planets for technology. When an attacking unit is within range of an attacked unit, the attacked unit will always counter-attack (if it isn't destroyed first). In later missions it becomes possible to scout planets for technology and upgrade ships, as well as take control of space stations to build new ships. Ships cannot be taken into the next mission however.

name: Waterslide Extreme
summary: Feel the speed as you negotiate your way down the serious twists and turns of a massive waterslide in this unique racing game brought to you by Barclaycard. Nine stages await you, as you race against the clock picking up as many points as you can.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Collector’s Edition
summary: This fabulous collector’s box includes an 8-inch\20cm Cassia painted figure, hardcover art book, Warrant of Trade that you can personalize with your name, Rogue Trader banner, and sticker pack. As well, all the items included in the Developer’s Digital Pack.

name: Wars Across the World: Finland 1808
summary: Finland 1808 simulates the conquest of Finland by the Russian Empire in its war against the Kingdom of Sweden. The Russian must take all of Finland while the Swedes must oppose hold out until the damage of the continental blockade imposed by Napoleon ruins the Czar's war economy.

name: War Ender
summary: War Ender is an action platformer where players assume the role of Red, known within the The City as "the greatest fighter." One night, Red was wandering the streets of The City when he found his friends dead. The investigation that followed revealed that a group of people plotting against The City attacked and killed Red's friends. Out of rage, our hero determined to eradicate The City of these villains and thus joined a new movement headed by Cyrus, the CEO of Cycorp. This endeavor promises safety and security from the villains now referred to as The Outsiders.

name: War of Kings
summary: War of Kings is a 2D auto battler in which you have to win the battle against evil monsters coming from all sides in an endless stream. Discover the talents of the commander of a huge fantasy army and lead it to light and peace!

name: Wardialler
summary: Explore computer systems and comb through hacker bulletin boards searching for obscure software exploits in a fictional early-80's setting. Type, read, make notes and get the feeling for what it might be like to be a hacker!

name: Walking War Robots
summary: Epic battles of giant robots in a giant war machine and battle in 6 vs 6 online multiplayer.

name: Wave Mechanics
summary: The goal of Wave Mechanics is to match the color of each element to the colors of corresponding parts of the frame. Each puzzle includes a set of active elements that can by used in order to change the colors of all elements within range in chosen direction.

name: Warlock's Tower
summary: Warlock's Tower is a retro puzzler with elegantly designed levels around one simple rule - one move equals one life lost. Watch your step!

name: Waves of Rotting Flesh
summary: A wave based FPS where you defend a barricaded house against increasing hordes of the dead.

name: Warhammer: Mark of Chaos - Battle March
summary: During the single player campaign the player takes over the control of the Empire, the Orcs & Goblins and the Legions of Chaos. But in multiplayer all of the now six races (Legions of Chaos, The Empire, High Elves, Dark Elves, Skaven and Orcs & Goblins) are available to fight in the new multiplayer mode called "World Domination. There the old world is divided into several dozen territories and the goal is of course to gain control over every one of them. But this is no game mode that only a few players play. Instead the map is hosted by the developers and every player can join in the fight. Once a player chose a race, he can then attack one of the enemy territories which then activates a normal skirmish battle with different victory conditions. Once a race has won a hundred battles in that territory, it gains control over it. Depending on the territory, the race then gains a bonus like a higher gold production ratio or a 10% increase in fighting moral.

name: Watashi no Kokoro ha Kirei desu ka: Am I Kind Hearted?
summary: The heroines are left to pay for the treatment of a strange disease!? They have taken on shady jobs at night without the protagonist's knowledge…all while not knowing that it was actually a misdiagnosis.

name: War Thunder: Ancient Helicopter Snail Bundle
Walker & Silhouette
summary:
Team up with a dashing detective and an iconoclastic flapper to solve absurd and unfathomable crimes in this interactive story - where you control the action just by typing or clicking highlighted words in the text.

A piece of interactive fiction written by C.E.J. Pacian.

name: Warzone
summary: Warzone is a tactical turn-based war game which requires a chess level of logical thinking and which provides an entertainment comparable to that of a tank shooter.

name: War Gun: Shooting Games Online
summary: Join Armed Conflict - an epic war game! This is the place where your skill and tactical skills will determine the outcome of the battle. Fight with players from all over the world, diversify your arsenal with weapons and prove your superiority on the battlefield. Are you ready for Armed Conflict?

name: Wargame: France 1940
summary: A classic hex and counter wargame, simulating the 1940 campaign in the West - the famous Fall of France, along with Belgium and Holland. The game is big, with over 300 units, mostly divisions, representing Germany, Holland, Belgium, Britain, France, and even Poland. There are infantry, fortresses, tanks (Panzers), parachutists, and more.

name: Wakeboarding Unleashed Featuring Shaun Murray
summary:
Wakeboarding is the new addition to the Activision line of extreme sports titles.

A rider (using a board that's like a combination of a surf board, body board and skateboard) is pulled along the water by rope at high speeds by the boat up front, and must pull of tricks either by jumping of jumps or using the wake left by the boat itself (hence the sports name).

name: War Agent
summary: War Agent has challenging gameplay with pixelart graphics and a deep message

name: Wastebraver: A Tiny Survival Tale
summary: Wastebraver is a roguelite survival rpg set in a post-apocalyptic fantasy hellscape. Explore an open, dynamic world where evils beyond imagination haunt your every footstep. Execute abominations and weave through insane encounters as you fight for what little remains of your broken world.

name: Waddle Wars: Roguelike Defense
summary: Get ready for a cozy adventure in "Waddle Wars" by Cozy Labs! Play as the hero penguin in a unique blend of tower defense and roguelike gameplay as you defend your castle from waves of cute yet pesky invaders. But that's not all - after each wave, select from 30+ different perks to upgrade your defenses. Summon guards, upgrade your castle, level up your hero, and more. Complete quests to unlock new hero skins and compete for bragging rights on the local and multiplayer high score tables.

name: Waifu Collector
summary: Waifu Collector is a casual card-collecting gacha/loot-box simulator wrapped in a light visual novel and dating simulator framework, with nudity, sex, and full tradable and marketable Steam Inventory support! Designed to be played for a few minutes each day.

name: Warlords IV: Heroes of Etheria
summary: Warlords IV: Heroes of Etheria is a strategy game for the PC in the Warlords series.

name: Warau Salesman 1
summary: Game based on the manga series The Laughing Salesman, created by Fujiko Fujio.

name: Warframe: Valkyr Prime Accessories Pack
summary:
Exclusive Prime gear and discounted Platinum, available for a limited time! Masterpieces of the Orokin era, these rare items are coveted by the Tenno.

The Valkyr Prime Accessories Pack includes:
- 1365 Platinum: Highly discounted premium currency
- Liset Prime Skin: Explore the system in the style of the Orokin
- Saita Prime Suit: A gilded Operator suit
- 30 Air Support Charges: Use this gear to call in support from your Landing Craft
- 90-Day Affinity Booster
- 90-Day Credit Booster

name: Way Down
summary: Live this action-packed spy adventure based on the movie The Vault.

name: WaxHeart
summary: An atmospheric horror 3D platformer about a wax boy with a lantern for a heart, journeying through a dark, ruined world.

name: Wargame: AirLand Battle - Vox Populi
summary: Vox Populi, the first free DLC from Wargame AirLand Battle, has been developed specifically to respond to the demands of the community… and has just landed with a whole arsenal of new features! "Conquest" mode makes a great comeback in Multiplayer mode and against the AI, offering a range of new objectives to commanders all over the world.

name: War Thunder: Su-25K Pack
War Thunder: Saab J35XS Pack
War 2410
summary:
In the year 2003 geneticists tried to create the perfect soldier. Something went wrong however, and three new life forms turned against their creators: Brutally savage Orcs, cybernetic androids called Cromes and genetically enhanced human soldiers code named M.A.R.S. Players take control of a secretly assembled force and must try to restore order.

War 2410 is a turn-based strategy game in which players move various units, such as mechs, tanks, troops or planes over a grid-map. Units differ in movement and attacking range. Some ground units cannot attack air units and vice versa. Terrain also affects combat as some types of terrain, like trees or buildings improve a units defense. Attacked units always counterattack as long as the attacker is within range. The goal of most missions is to destroy all enemy units, while it is sometimes necessary to capture the enemies' bases. Units cannot not be improved or modified and every mission starts with all units already in place.

name: War Thunder: Kfir Canard Pack
Warlock's Gantlet
summary:
Warlock's Gantlet is a sword & sorcery themed, first person, open world, action-RPG with "Indiana Jones-style" puzzles (find and use clues such as maps, notes, drawings etc. to solve environmental mysteries).

You play as a warlock-in-training who has been tasked by their masters to retrieve a valuable item that was stolen from them. They have decided that this opportunity shall serve as a test of your general aptitude and your continued study with them depends on your success.

name: Wanderer's Shade
summary: Embark on a mysterious journey in 'Wanderer's Shade: Path of the Void,' a 2D pixel art and adventure game that blends intricate puzzles with deep narrative exploration. Discover secrets, solve challenges, and uncover a story of forgotten identities in an enigmatic world.

name: Wages of War: The Business of Battle
summary: A top-down turn-based strategy game.

name: Wall Street Bets
summary: Wall Street Bets is a comical simulation stock market game. Will you be the trader to break $100,000,000 or go bust? Remember: Always buy the dip.

name: Way to a Vampire's Heart
summary:
Being one of the youngest Vampire Hunters, Lucian Lockhart didn't expect to encounter one of those bloodthirsty creatures in his lifetime. After all, vampires were on the brink of extinction and no one heard about a single apparition of them for more than fifteen years.

However, the opportunity unexpectedly appears and Lucian finds himself face to face with the enemy he had only known from told stories and books. As if fighting a vampire for the first time wasn't astounding enough, Lucian also discovers one thing about his family's past that could tear apart everything he had believed to be true.

name: Wall Break
summary: An arcade game produced by Taito. The name, release era and cabinet design indicates it may be a Breakout-style ball-and-paddle game.

name: Wars Across the World: Hamilkar 264
summary: Hamilkar 264BC replays the First Punic War, a long land an naval war opposing the young Roman Republic to the Carthaginians, between 264 and 241 BC. The goal of the Roman Legions is to conquer the whole of Sicily, or capture Carthage.

name: Waifu Secret
summary: Exciting, puzzle game with fancy girls. Control yourtube and find the way to pass the level and unlock a lot of beauty in the gallery. Gameplay is beautiful and relaxing.

name: Wars Across the World: Estonia 1918
summary: Estonia 1918 covers the Estonian war of independence after the fall of Czarist Russia in 1918. The Estonian government must hold against the Soviet menace trying to recapture former Russian imperial provinces, but also against German troops trying to annex Latvia and its neighbour with the aim to settle for long in the Baltic states...

name: Watchers
summary: Watchers is a top-down Battle Royale shooter where battlers stay in play even after being killed: they can create anomalies on the battlefield, bet on their favorite survivors and turn the tables on other players.

name: Watchers: Batter Up Pack
summary: Are you a pitcher or a catcher? Hit a home run with the Batter Up Pack.

name: Water Rain
summary: On another planet in the future, you set up shop in order to try to rake in money, but you aren't the only one who has the same idea.

name: Wars Across the World: Kentucky 1861
summary: Kentucky 1861 relates the events and campaign around the key neutral state of Kentucky at the start of the American Civil War, which led to its entry in the conflict. Both the Union and the Confederate must influence the government of Kentucky to allow their troops entry on its territory, or, better, join their side.

name: Warlock
summary: In this isometric action-adventrue the player slips in the role of the evil Doomlord whos castle is under siege from the White Wizard and his hordes of do-gooders.

name: Wargame: European Escalation - Conquest
summary: "Conquest" for Wargame: European Escalation brings brand new exciting content to extend the conflict. Defy commanders worldwide in the brand new multiplayer mode: Conquest. To be victorious in this mode, in addition to the classic Command Points, you will have to control Victory Sectors (VS) located on the map, until the victory...

name: Wangan Midnight: R
summary:
Wangan Midnight: R is a racing game based on the Wangan Midnight manga. For Arcade it is a revised and updated version of Wangan Midnight while for the PS2 it is the first version and the first home console release in the series as well.

The PS2 release has an AC Scenario mode (original Arcade Scenario mode), Mission mode, Time Attack mode and an i.Link Battle mode (local multiplayer) similar to the Versus mode used for the two units of the arcade cabinet. There is also a Replay Theater where replays of races can be viewed. The mission mode has a number of challenges against one or more opponents divided over eleven series (series one to ten and then Tune as the final one). The game contains licensed cars from the manufacturers Mazda, Mitsubishi, Nissan, RUF, Subaru and Toyota.

name: Watashi Suzume
summary: Shamrock Creations is proud to present Watashi Suzume. A story that explores the far reaching impacts that love, friendship, and understanding have on not only our own lives, but how we view life itself. All wrapped up in a typical anime inspired narrative we hope everyone will enjoy.

name: Walled City Sunset
summary:
Welcome to Walled City!

You work here as an industrial climber. Fix AC units, talk to people, find lost cats, connect buildings and dream to witness the sunset at the top of the city.

name: Wasted Dreams
summary: Wasted Dreams is an isometric action game with adventure elements.

name: Waste It
summary: Waste it, flush it! The best game of 2022

name: Warcat Parade
summary: Catboy in a bullet hell! Nyan, nyan, pew pew pew!

name: Wave Shark
summary: Wave Shark, known as Jet Wave in Japan and Europe, is a Jet-Ski type racing game developed and published by Konami for arcades in 1996.

name: Walkie Talkie
summary: Send messages, receive messages, play messages.

name: WakeUp!
summary:
WakeUp! is a casual rouge-like game placed in a fantasy, dream world, where the goal is to escape and save yourself.

The game generates an infinite, procedurally generated world. You must gather resources and manage your inventory to survive. Look for hints where to find the exit!

name: Wargame: European Escalation - New Battlefields
summary: "New Battlefields" for Wargame: European Escalation brings new, free content to all Commanders!Willing to test your Clan's newest tactics? Or to just have some quick fun with friends without pressure? Team up with other players and jump into the action against a computer controlled opponent!

name: Wacky Wizarding Dungeon
summary: Plunge into a dungeon filled with horrible rats, relics from the past, and a Bug person who has an affinity for actual feces, utilize mighty weapons and upgrades to help yourself to stand a fighting chance.

name: Wampus
summary:
Wampus is an overhead arcade narrative adventure game developed for the Nintendo Entertainment System -- yes, the original NES!

Wampus takes place in the world of Irata, first introduced in the obscure economic simulator game M.U.L.E in 1983.

Irata is a planet invaded by colonialists, farming and mining the land for its natural resources. These resource-stripping activities threaten the local flora and fauna, especially the Mountain Wampus, who get hunted for their treasure.

As a young wampus, players set out to rid Irata of the settler invaders and restore harmony to the land. While a fun lark, Wampus explores themes of environmentalism, conservationism, stewardship of the land, and the destructive nature of colonialism.

name: War Pinball
summary: From the creators of the legendary Pinball HD the amazing new War Pinball HD, developed in collaboration with MGM Studios. Three unique, war-themed pinball tables based on all-time Hollywood hits: "Platoon", "Navy SEALs" and "Missing in Action".

name: Wars of the Roses: Rosenkönig
summary: Experience thrilling matches in "Wars of the Roses: Rosenkönig", either against your friends, players worldwide or against the AI in the campaign mode. Which player will apply the best tactics and get the right cards?

name: Warage: Necromancer Campaign
summary: 14 missions in which you can fight on the side of the undead against the kingdoms of Abreim.

name: Wars Across the World: Manchuria 1945
summary: Manchuria 1945 describes the major Soviet offensive on Japanese occupied Manchuria in 1945. The Red Army must capture as much of the Japanese-controlled Asian mainland as possible before Japan agrees to surrender to the Americans. The Japanese player must try to prevent this at all costs.

name: Warzone
summary: A turn based strategy game inspired by Risk.

name: Warpflux
summary: Warpflux is a top-down action based resource management game. As the commander of Earth's colony ship and a fleet of autonomous drones, collect supplies and defend against hostile forces during a thousand year voyage to save humanity.

name: Waves Running Simulator
summary: Have you seen the enormous waves destroying the planet? If not, you are in the right place! In Waves Running Simulator you have to escape from the tsunami as fast as possible.

name: Warbirds P-51 Mustang ACE
summary: Warbirds P-51 Mustang is a 3d WWII air combat game, a flight sim with accelerometer control, photo-realistic scene, and battle missions based on true history.

name: Watch Your Eggs!
summary: Experience the thrilling world of Watch Your Eggs!, an action-packed third-person shooter game. As Agent Pops, your mission is to protect unhatched Frostwing Penguin eggs from wild Icy Land creatures. Plan your strategy, equip yourself with powerful weapons, and face the wave of furious enemies!

name: Wanderers
summary: A short story with quick battles! Wander around, fight monsters, drink beer, make a friend.

name: Water Defense
summary: A strategy game that not only entertains, but also educates. Prevent pollution of natural resources with ACO products and score higher than others!

name: WarEcon: Build & Conquer
summary: WarEcon: Build & Conquer is an innovative fusion of real-time strategy (RTS) and first-person shooter (FPS) genres

name: War of Gaia: Into the Fire
summary: War of Gaia: Into the Fire is a Sci-Fi Survival game where you gather resources, build bases, create and join factions, go to war over scarce resources, find and salvage tech, customize your armor and weapons, and discover the hidden mysteries of the uncharted planet you are stranded on.

name: War, the Game
summary:
'War, the Game' is a global Real Time Strategy game.
Take the role of a supreme commander directing your armies across the globe. Use your strategic wit to battle AI and other players in realistic scenarios.
Conquer the world, city by city.

name: Wacky Cartoon Racers
summary: Play with a bunch of fun cartoon characters in a racing event for the Grand Prize of all Cartoon Land.

name: Waterbed
summary:
A short side scrolling game about depression and aquaphobia, as well as learning that setbacks happen in life.
"Charming and cute, yet also very serious and real".

name: Wasco
summary: Wasco is an RPG about the futuristic adventures of Wasco, the waste collecting robot! Play through an hour-long adventure that mimics the old but gold JRPG mechanics and brings a cyberpunked pixel art inspired by our favorite retro games to your device.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack
summary: The Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack includes the unique playable character Castellan Garran Crowe, and the Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters Original Soundtrack.

name: Warrior
summary: Up the difficulty level. Fast based combat and movement. Best of luck In beating the game..

name: War Clash
summary: War Clash is the first true mobile real-time strategy game and offers players the chance to unleash the power of unique heroes in head-to-head and 3v3 battles. Lead a variety of fantasy-themed troops into battle, and take advantage of heroes' powers to give yourself a strategic edge. The game features real-time base building, versatile army units, capturable resources, and a vibrant cast of characters.

name: Warning Forever
summary: Warning Forever is a top-down shooter that pits you against a never-ending onslaught of procedurally-generated bosses which evolve to counter your strategies.

name: Wand of Fortune: Mirai he no Prologue
summary: Wand of Fortune: Mirai he no Prologue is a fan disc of Wand of Fortune.

name: Wars of Succession
summary: Ageod's Wars of Succession is a strategic game designed to cover two major wars that consumed Europe at the eve of the 18th Century, the Spanish Succession (1701-1713), and the Great Northern War (1700-1721). Play out these two historical wars across a huge map, divided into 5,000 regions, across 5 different scenarios. Choose your battlefield tactics carefully, your decisions can turn the tide of battle.

name: Waiter
summary: Waiter is a first person game about a waiter. In this cool game, you play as a waiter who needs to serve drinks to club customers. This game will give you unforgettable emotions of joy and fun. Play it with fun and perky music!

name: Wave
summary: Wave is an extremely funny indie game with a very new gameplay and different from other games.

name: Wars Across the World: Caesar 58
summary: Caesar 58BC relates the First Campaign of Caesar in Gaul. The Romans must crush decisively the Helvetian and Germanic Barbarians before they capture key cities of the Gallic allies of Caesar.

name: Wars Across the World: Malaya 1941
summary: Malaya 1941 covers the December 1941 invasion of the Malay peninsula and the air and naval campaigns around it. The Japanese forces must capture Singapore and their offensive could be well stopped by the mighty 'Prince of Wales' battleship. The British have to repulse the offensive or hold as long as they can.

name: Wake Up: Liminal
summary: How far are you willing to go?

name: Wai Wai Mahjong
summary: Wai Wai means many people making noise so obviously this is a 4 player Mahjong game playing against many different characters.

name: War of Words 2
summary: Get ready for the ultimate word battle! An exciting blend of turn-based strategy and crossword game, War of Words 2 pits you against up to 3 other players for an all-out word destruction brawl!

name: Wabbit
summary: You are a farmer, named Billie Sue, trying to protect your crops. One patch in particular is giving you trouble. It's surrounded by ten holes from which wabbits dart into your field. Scare off the pesky creatures by throwing rotten eggs at them.

name: War Builder League
summary: Build your own Machine, join combat and win the battle using tactics and strategy. Take control over an enemy, use electronic defense of one’s allies or lock the target with radar jamming.

name: Wandering Duelist
summary: The Wandering Duelist is a single-player, narrative-driven adventure game that tells a story of love, conflict and reckless actions. The story takes place on a small and lively planet, where its residents carry on their daily activities that often pose dangers and obstacles for the player.

name: Wayfarers: Call of Osiris
summary: Jack and Leila Dawes explore real Egyptian pyramids and temples and delve into their mythical underworlds to free themselves from an ancient curse. The extensive traversing and fighting may take a toll on their bodies, but even greater is the burden of the dark calamity tearing at their souls...

name: Warframe: The New War - Reckoning Pack
summary: For a limited time, instantly add two Warframe Skins, Weapons, Customizations, Boosters and more to your Arsenal to repel the Sentient invasion and fight The New War! Evolve your look with new Protovyre gear, which will unlock additional Customizations as you play.

name: Wasting Away
summary: Retro horror 3D game tells a gloomy story of the Vainonmiel camping destination. It used to be popular, until some of the visitors started disappearing without a trace. Can the Reporter survive and keep his job, or will he get arrested or fall victim to the mysterious killer of Vainonmiel?

name: Wardogz
summary: Travel the war-torn world of Hellstain as last of the Wardogz, an ancient order of peacekeepers. Fight a huge variety of enemies, ranging from mutants to the walking mechs anc challenge yourself with puzzles and obstacles that will test you physically and mentally.

name: Warauinu no Bouken GB: Silly Go Lucky!
summary: A Capcom developed game released exclusively for the Game Boy Color handheld in Japan.

name: War Clicks
summary:
Description
Get under the wing of General MasterClicker in this unique idle/clicking game mashup! Train, upgrade and manage your army to prepare for waging endless battles in the War Zone. Focus on becoming the most renowned Warlord and provider of arms or chase glory on the battlefield as you climb military ranks!

The game starts off in Boot Camp where you focus on building a powerful army. Unlock new units, upgrade their production, deploy units off to battle in exchange for attracting dirty army contractors that will super-size your production! Best of all, you can amass trainers that will do all the work for you, even while you're away.

And once you're ready, head off to the War Zone where you will fight battles for glory... and loot! All that precious gold you can gather via various activities and completing missions, will provide you that extra boost to your Boot Camp production as well as improve the strength of your army.

But to really stand out from rest of the competition, you will have to collaborate with your countrymen in invasions where you destroy enemy bases to get massive war spoils! If you are focused on chasing that glory as a hero or care more about your renown in the world, there's plenty of options that are presented to you during the game to differentiate from others and focus on your priorities!

Controls
Everything is controlled via mouse/tap (it is playable on mobile, though NOT optimized for it).
There's a tutorial guiding your through ins and outs of the game so just get in there and you'll know what to do! :)

name: WaterMelon Mosikkaeng
summary: Combine watermelon and friends to make bigger fruits.

name: War Of Castles
summary: Lead your own soldiers to conquer all castles on the island! Create your own map and challenge players from all over the world! Play online games with friends.

name: Warship Jolly Roger
summary: Jon Munro, ex-officer seeking his family; Alisa Rinaldi, rebel mechanic; Nikolai Kowalski, cunning smuggler; Trace, jailed robotics prodigy. United in a prison escape, they command the Warship Jolly Roger, dodging galactic authorities in an epic space opera game.

name: Wandering Meatbags
summary:
Wandering Meatbags is a zombie FPS shooter.
Zombies are rushing at you in a big city, you have to walk around to find loot boxes, keep the best weapons and watch your ammo.
If you're lucky, you'll get a rifle, a shotgun or even a revolver, but if you don't, you'll have to deal with them with an axe or a knife.
And don't underestimate the little flare gun, it's pretty... explosive !
You will find walking zombies and running zombies that are dismemberable.
Every 5 waves you will have a deposit of breakable crates around the city, which includes weapons, ammo and health.
You need to find them before more zombies come running at you and before you run out of ammo.

name: Water Balloon Mania
summary: "Water Balloon Mania" is an addictive puzzle game. The goal is to remove all fires from the screen. To do that you have to rotate and position the water balloons on top of or alongside the fires and other water balloons so that there are at least 4 blocks with the same color next to each other. You can move and turn the water balloons with the joypad.

name: Warforged
summary: A fantasy sandbox RPG heavily inspired by Mount and Blade. Grow your skill with your choice of melee weapon, archery, or magic. Test yourself against powerful creatures. Upgrade your skills, raise an army, then go to war with other factions and conquer their settlements.

name: Warped Reality
summary: Warped Reality is a gritty, hard-boiled cyberpunk visual novel set in a future where chrome skyscrapers bathed in the light of holographic adverts tower over alleyways of blood and grime.

name: Warka Flarka Flim Flam
summary: Warka Flarka Flim Flam has you juggling with flat circles. You start with two paddles with which you bat one circle from one hand to the other, and then further balls, effects and influences are added to make juggling more difficult. Every mistake you make will be punished, starting you over again and again on your Journey to become the #1 Warka of Flarkas!

name: Warriors of Freedom
summary: Old schooled turn based tactics game. Pick your hero, gather up your army and fight for your freedom. You have to decide carefully as you have finite amount of everything. Prove your value.

name: Watashi no Kokoro! Kimi no Koto ga Suki desu.
summary: Watashi no Kokoro! is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Wars Across the World: Bouvines 1214
summary: Bouvines 1214 tells the War of 1213-1214 between crown of France against a coalition of England, Flanders and Holy Roman Empire. The French must consolidate their gains and punish the rebel Count of Flanders. The Coalition needs to spread out French forces, defeat them and stop the rise of France.

name: Warrior Souls
summary: Warrior Souls is a multiplayer and singelplayer medieval-fantasy game. Play with your friends or fight with other players in brutal battles. You can choose different Warriors from knights to samurais or Vikings. You will experience 1vs1, a great story, castle fights, and more.

name: Water Sort: Perfect Pouring
summary: Try to sort the colored water in the glasses until all colors in the same glass. The number of tubes and watercolors increases at every level of the game. Apply your gaming skills to arrange the same colors in one glass and the game.

name: War in the Pacific
summary: War in the Pacific: The Struggle Against Japan 1941-1945 is a classic strategy game, based on the award winning Uncommon Valor game engine. The scale is 60 miles per hex and losses are individual vehicles, aircraft, guns and squads. Since half the planet Earth is covered by the titanic Pacific struggle, the game is massive in scope, covering thousands of ships tens of thousands of aircraft.

name: Water Match
summary: A game featuring various water sports including free-style swimming, one-man kayaking, four-man boating races and so on.

name: Wars Across the World: Persia 1856
summary: Persia 1856 is the conflict between the British East India Company and the Shah of Persia, the former trying to compel the latter to remove his forces from Afghanistan. The British objective consists in seizing enough strategic cities in southern Persia before European diplomatic pressure forces him to withdraw.

name: Warlocks Deeds: Desolation horde
summary: In Desolation Horde, you are cast into a barren world devoid of any structures. This survival-driven variant demands meticulous resource management to stay alive. Periodical waves of ferocious, ever-increasing enemies will descend upon you, determined to claim your demise.

name: Warna
summary: Try to survive if you can! Soul's like a third-person action game. There are four skills and six types of weapons available, plus bonus weapons that fall from mobs and have a limited number of hits. Three types of potions. All acquired skills, weapons and potions are saved.

name: Warship Gunner 2
summary: Get Warship Gunner 2 is a strategy, simulation game. The game is set in 1939 of an alternate universe, and thus combines technology of this period in the real world with a variety of futuristic lasers and weapons. There are three story paths with different missions, story, and endings. The specific story path is chosen by the player's actions.

name: Wasteland Survival
summary: You are a Wasteland Cleaner! Cleanse the Earth from the evil consequences of Nuclear War and return to the Vault with victory!

name: Wars Across the World: Finland 1918
summary: Finland 1918 is a simulation of the tragic Finnish civil war that follosw the crumble of Czarist Russa. The Communists control the capital of Helsinki but Russian Soviet support won't last forever. Facing them, the Nationalists led by Mannerheim would love to defeat the Reds without having to resort to German support, as the latter are...

name: Warman
summary: Warman is a relaxing action-adventure game. Explore and battle your way through handcrafted challenges on your own or with your friends. Explore a vast and unique world!

name: Wandering Through the Vines
summary: You find yourself in a strange land, by shooting and melee defeat your foes and journey to the end...

name: Wartran Troopers
summary:
Wartran Troopers is the sequel to World Combat (Warzaid).

Game Play:
It is a different story then the first version. Player needs to equip up with a huge range of weaponry found on the battle field. It's the only chance of tackling the vast range of enemies. Each player will have their own skills and attacks. The rapid machine guns can take down infantry.

name: Warrior
summary: This is a megawad (32 levels) with common story for all its levels. You are the warrior who fights and passes all levels step by step, combat after combat. Every next level starts where you've finished the previous.

name: War Online Pacific
summary: War Online Pacific is the first in a series of fast action WWII combat simulations.

name: Warface: Sniper Tournament Pack
summary: This DLC contains the full, permanent sniper gear and the B-5000 Sniper rifle. All of the gear included in this DLC has been designed to deliver the best performance thinkable, delivered in-game with class-specific buffs and perks. Put it on and let nothing get in your way!

name: Watch
summary: Watch is a free incremental game combined with collecting wristwatches integrated into Steam inventory.

name: Warlords 2: Rise of Demons
summary:
Warlords 2: Rise of Demons is a strategy game developed by Ben Olding games, and is a sequel to "Warlords: Call to Arms".

Pick from a variety of different races, from Humans, Elves, Trolls and the Undead, and even the demons themselves, to conquer the land of Beneril.

name: Waifu Club: Ayame
summary: Waifu Club is the perfect Waifu puzzle game. Enjoy Ayame in 6 images in the gallery after you unlocked them in the game. The Gallery itself is easy controllable.

name: Water Fall
summary: Immersive side-scroller in a world where water has become scarce

name: Waterslide Island
summary: Waterslide Island is a 3D game that lets you race cartoon animals down 10 dangerous, curvy water slides. You can knock other players off the slide, collect bubbles and bonus items to increase your score, and create your own courses with the included course editor.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Shadows over Bögenhafen
summary: The wealthy city of Bögenhafen thrives on its merchant trade, attracting commerce via its appealing harbor and bustling marketplace. Gold flows through the city along the River Bögen, but this trading hub is also a ripe target for Nurgle corruption.

name: Waifu Desire
summary: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Water Festa
summary: Water Festa is a top-down shooter inspired by Thailand's Songkran water festival. You play as a mermaid girl, balancing wetness to remain human, dodge water to avoid becoming too wet, but seek it when dry. Expect a casual bullet hell experience as people continuously shower you.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War III - Collector's Edition
summary:
Celebrate the return of Dawn of War with a host of exclusive premium collectibles in the Dawn of War III Collector's Edition.
Including;
- Gabriel Angelos's iconic "Godsplitter Daemon Hammer" replica (14.2" x 4.2")
- 3 cloth faction banners on wooden poles with custom artwork and slogans (25" x 15.2")
- Premium Disc Book
- Official soundtrack with 18 epic tracks composed by Paul-Leonard Morgan
- Lenticular Art Card which rotates between the 3 race masks (5.7" x 6.7")
- "Master of War" digital content pack (same as pre-order bonus)

name: Wabbalidu
summary: An experimental rhythm based highscore game in which you wander through a hypnotizing world. Created around the theme of "anticipation".

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Death Guard Champion Chapter Pack DLC
summary: Corrupted and swollen by the pestilences and plagues that afflict them Death Guard Champions prefer short ranged combat where they can spread the diseases that the Chaos God Nurgle has blessed them with. Immune to pain or damage they grimly advance forward laughing off attacks and leaving a trail of pestilence and disease behind them.

name: Warface: Medic Tournament Pack
summary: This set consists of full and permanent medic tournament gear, as well as the class-specific primary, the SX-41 shotgun. This gear is the perfect choice for PvP missions and contracts. Find only the most useful class-specific stats for PvP combat. Gear up, do a brass check and let nothing stay in your way – no one sensible will!

This game features a series of around twenty "missions", many of them based on real historical data, from the 1860s to the 1990s, taking in the big stock market crash of 1929 that kicked off the Great Depression and the oil crisis of the 1970s along the way.

name: Wani Wani Attack
summary: It will be a game to play with an air gun using ST32 and ST32R to be sold. Of course, you can also play with the mouse. Repel the crocodile attacking from the back of the bridge! Do not harm any creature other than the crocodile. Defeat a lot of crocodiles and get a high score.

name: WanderVR
summary: WanderVR is an exploration game with puzzle and combat elements, intended to push VR to its limits when it comes to a player's exploration freedom. Made by Kaya Cady

name: Warface: Engineer Tournament Pack
summary: Contains the full Champion Engineer set as well as the class-specific primary weapon – the AP-84 Custom. This gear is permanent and is a perfect adaptation for any tactical PvP encounter you might end up in. The set also comes with class-specific perks that will make sure you’ll be the one standing victorious after the fight!

name: Wari: The Ancient Game of Africa

War Thunder: MiG-21bis "Lazur-M" Pack
War Church

summary: War on Mars is a side-scrolling RTS where you build a powerful army and destroy aliens!

name: Wandering Gem Jockeying

name: Warlocked

Search for secret maps and train Dragons to fight on your behalf. With a powerful army at your command, you'll be ready to besiege castles, conquer enemy hordes and drive your foe from the land.

name: War of Three Kingdoms
summary: This is a strategy type game, players can capture the city, the final one continent, in this process, players can collect hundreds of heroes, different heroes have different skills and abilities, you can also train the hero, build a strong army.

name: War Girl

name: War Pig

name: Wall-Breaking
summary: In this game you pilot a tank that must eliminate all enemies.

name: Waifus Smash
summary: Waifus Smash is a sokoban puzzle/adventure game. Control your hero to explore the world, solve the puzzle and prove yourself

name: Wanrobo

name: Wanderer of Teandria
summary: Wanderer of Teandria is challenging 2D platform game inspired by classic representatives of the genre.

summary: Norse Dragons is the third free DLC for Wargame: Red Dragon. Dedicated to the Scandinavian coalition, it features more than 60 new units for Sweden, Denmark & Norway. Effectively propelling this coalition as well as the individual countries into the early 90's era, it will bring them onto an equal footing with the other nations.

name: WarMA

name: Wai-wai de Q: Aki no Daikansha Matsuri! - Dai-5-kai
Wait
summary: Wait

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 R
summary: Upgraded version of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6

name: Warfare Ultimatum
summary: Modern FPS/RTS hybrid, Large-scale battles from the depth of the sea all the way to space! Either play the standard 64-player non-stop battle using Air/Land/Sea vehicles or drop in a thriller, long game of Diplomacy Warfare, experience sabotage, betrayal, war crime, organized operations and more

name: Ways&Ball
summary:
Ways&Ball 
In this game you have to balance the ball on flore and complete the level

name: Warpsquad
summary: WARPSQUAD is a space exploration rogue-lite in an ever-changing galaxy to be played solo or co-op. Encounter a wide range of hostile spaceships, special events, and upgrades to your ship and crew. Master the ship terminals and crew with unique traits to survive this hostile world.

name: Wasteland of East

name: Warphouse

name: WavePlayer
summary: WavePlayer is a single player 2D pixelart wave survival game, the goal of the game is to defeat all of the enemies that spawn in intervals using a legendary Warrior and emerge victorious from the depths of the deep circling forests and caves.

name: War Tanks
summary: Control the tank and destroy all the enemies. Monitor the condition of the tank's armor and fuel. You can switch between three views: First-person camera, third-person and top view. Minimal interface and understandable for any language.

name: War Town
summary: We developed this game to test your competitiveness among friends or foes. If you want to try new challenges, play War town

name: Warhawks
summary: Fly in some of the most notable air battles of WWII in powerhouses of the sky. This fully 3D VR experience puts you behind the stick of a P51 mustang air fighter to defend and destroy key targets in the allies' fight against the axis powers.

name: War of the Zombie
summary: War of the Zombie brings together the best of turn-based simulation and real-time strategic gameplay action across the entire world at the very start of a mysterious undead outbreak.

name: WarBirds Dawn of Aces, World War I Air Combat
summary: WarBirds, Dawn of Aces, is a single player, (thousands of different missions),  and massively multiplayer combat simulation of the first combat aircraft dogfights during World War I, 1914-1918!  WarBirds, Dawn of Aces is a graphically excellent, historically correct, and exciting simulation flying game for arcade, realistic, and expert players.

name: Wavey the Rocket
summary: Wavey The Rocket is a 3D side-scrolling arcade game where chaining huge combos through beautifully designed levels while listening to the funky hip hop inspired soundtrack will have you topping the leaderboards at a rapid pace! Master Wavey's movement and rule the waves!

name: Wayne's World
summary: NES Port of "Wayne's World"

name: Wandering Skies
summary: Navigate through the Sky Lands and uncover its secrets to restore their lost harmony. In this first person platformer, use your abilities to reach the end of each level. Observation and skill are the keys to success !

name: Walking Simulator A Month Club (Complete Edition)
summary:
Nothing gets in the way of the landscape. The player is merely there to witness, and there are no gameplay mechanics to dictate how the world arranges itself. There is no win condition, and no goals other than the ones you make. Set off in any direction for as long or as little as you see fit, taking only your memories with you.

The Walking Simulator A Month Club was an experiment to create and release a vast, explorable landscape with accompanying soundtrack every month that ran from 2015-2020. Between the solo development and the improvisational approach to design, some pretty wild and evocative stuff came out of it. Go forth and wander!

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX
summary: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX is the first major update to Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3. Based on the Wangan Midnight manga, this game marks the fourth installment in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series and the sixth entry in the overall Wangan Midnight arcade series, which also includes Wangan Midnight R and the 2001 Wangan Midnight video game.

name: Wars Across the World: Bosworth 1485
summary: Bosworth 1485 simulates the last battles of the War of the Roses in England, between the York and Lancaster families. Henry Tudor's objective is to land from France to claim the throne occupied by Richard III of York.

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+
summary: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+ is an arcade video game inspired by the Wangan Midnight manga. Serving as the second upgrade to the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3 arcade series, following Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX, it is the fifth installment in the overall Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series.

name: Water Park: Fun Water Slides
summary: Do you like active rest and adrenalin? Do you like roller-coasters and other extreme races? Then let's go to the water park together with Hippo! Funny kids games, waterslides, jumps into water and other unbelievable attractions are waiting for us! It is time to jump into swimming pool, swim and have fun! Call friends to try new crazy races on water slides. Water park simulator is created for all the family, these are the best kids games!

name: War Thunder: Su-39 Pack
summary: This Pack includes: Su-39 (Rank 7 USSR);Premium account for 20 days;2500 Golden Eagles.

name: Wars Across the World: Galicia 1914
