summary: Bienvenue! Prepare for departure from 'Port Eiffel'—a Victorian airport high above Paris in our whimsical tribute to Jules Verne's classic novel. Putt through stanchions, pneumatic tubes, over hot air balloons, and discover all of the luxuries 19th century air travel has to offer. Bon voyage!

name: Waterfall
summary: A shadowy figure seeks peace.

name: Warp 1
summary: An arcade shooter from Taito.

name: Warmth Of A Dying Sun
summary: Medium-sized Egyptian-style level. Comes with a custom desert skybox.

name: War Thunder: Ground Forces
summary: Gaijin Entertainment will be bringing its military MMO game War Thunder: Ground Forces to the PS4 leading historical battles not only in the sky but also in land and sea. War Thunder: Ground Forces is from the renowned War Thunder series that gave fans and enthusiasts a next generation MMO combat game devoted to World War II. With military aviation, armored vehicles, and fleets, gamers can take part in massive online battles, fighting with real players all over the world.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Double Nation Pack Reds
summary: Yugoslavia & Finland come to reinforce the pact side of Wargame: Red Dragon, bringing up to 186 new gorgeous units to add further strategic depth to Eugen Systems' spectacular RTS.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Nation Pack: Netherlands
summary: Wargame is back again with a brand new DLC for the million-selling franchise's third instalment, Wargame Red Dragon. In this new expansion for the spectacular real-time strategy game from Eugen Systems, the unique and diverse Dutch units are finally playable! Choose between 80 units and enter into a coalition with West Germany.

name: Warriors of Dust
summary: Explore desolate territories and scavenge the wastelands for resources and valuable items, while fighting off oppressive enemy forces and hostile creatures in this post-apocalyptic action RPG.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Charybdis Outpost
summary: In this exclusive mission, unravel the secrets of the Charybdis holding centre as you make your way through unique environments and experience brutal combat against an unknown enemy.

name: War Mechanic
summary: "War Mechanic" is a unique first-person simulator set in a dieselpunk world where World War II never ended. Manage a military base, explore with your combat vehicle, and survive in a world driven by war and money.

name: Way of Hero
summary: Great first-person shooter with excellent graphics and fun gameplay. In the city where you live as a retired soldier, one night scary creatures rushed in, followed closely by soldiers.

name: Waveform: Eris
summary: Eris, a world of discord and darkness, needs your help! Restore the light to a new planet in Waveform's first DLC pack. Play new levels and even re-play in challenge mode for remastered experienced. Interact with the brand new object - the PulsarExperience another mind-bending bonus level in Reverse Mode!

name: War in the Caverns
summary:
War in the caverns is an action platforme game.
this game integrates platform and shooting games in one.Use your armor and weapon to destroy all you see.

name: Way of the Samurai Portable
summary: Samurai Dou Portable is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by Spike, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Waterworld
summary: The sun. For millions of years the source of life. But for one planet the source of it's demise. The temperature climbed, the vast pools of ice at it's poles melted, and the oceans rose. Centuries later, few people remained on this planet, once called Earth. A lone mariner sails the expanse of water, trading to survive. For survival, is all these people do, in this place they know only as Waterworld.

name: Way Home
summary:
Way Home is a true survival sandbox experience, with highly realistic crafting system
you will need to hunt, fish, grow your own food and other useful plants, plan your actions sparingly to fight with the evil which would prevent you from surviving...

name: War Trigger 2
summary: Destroy, smash and blast your way to victory. Use advanced weapons and vehicles to dominate the battlefield.

name: Warm Monkey
summary: Warm Monkey is an Action/Platformer video game in isometric 3D landscape. In a modern architectural and exotic city, a monkey multiplies and its need for water increases. He must reach the seashore.

name: Waga Himegimi ni Eikan o
summary: The protagonist, Shaon who grew up in a remote area, taught a technique called Tenken by his teacher. The teacher hopes that Shaon will pass on his abilities to his descendants. When he is old enough, he needs to left his home to find a bride. How you live your life, who will you marry? It all depends on your choice.

name: Warp Shift
summary: An audio-visual voyage through time and space

name: Warfront Defenders: Westerplatte
summary:
This is a tactical defense mini game based on WW2. A single player hybrid of Tower Defense and Real Time Strategy. Played on a diorama inspired by the historical Battle of Westerplatte, Poland which marked the start of World War 2.

Warfront Defenders: Westerplatte is the first game of the series of tactical mini games based on WW2. The gameplay is a single player real time strategy game. Played on a diorama like map inspired from Battle of Westerplatte which marked the start of World War 2. Though this is not a chronological account of the battle, the gameplay and the tactics are heavily inspired by the proceedings of the historical battle and its challenges are designed to remember the defenders of Westerplatte.

Battle of Westerplatte was unique in many ways, and this game will try to reflect on that. Players can expect that they will be outnumbered, outgunned, but not out of tactics. Also, expect enemies with brains, they will react to your strategies and apply counter strategies to break down your defenses. All you have is a handful of soldiers to stand in their way.
Warfront Defenders as a series of games will attempt to take inspiration from the historical battles of WW2 and turn them into tactical games playable on small dioramas.

Feature List :
~ Destructible environments
~ Position your soldiers anywhere, use cover tactics, some of the areas are more exposed than the others
~ Equip/Add health and Upgrade/Downgrade your soldiers during battle
~ 10+ Achievements and unlocking of special weapons and fortifications to take on enemies
~ Build fortifications, lay mines to slow down or kill enemies
~ Reactive enemy AI, changes strategies based upon your movement
~ Overwhelming bosses like Battleship Schleswig-Holstein, Stuka dive bombers, snipers

name: Wasted Glory
summary: Wasted Glory is an old-fashioned fnaf fan game that follows the traditional five nights gameplay with freeroam mechanics.

name: Warnament
summary: A turn-based grand strategy game, simple for newbies yet challenging for masters. As the leader of a nation, you will conquer territories and advance in military, technology, culture, or politics. Choose from historical scenarios or create your own with an editor.

name: Wanted Driver
summary: Drive car and escape cops! Drive fast as you can to evade the cops. Buy faster cars and become the fastest driver.

name: War for the West
summary: Rule the land as you see fit, using alliances, intrigue or warfare to establish your House as a dominant force in the realm's politics.

name: War: Final Assault
summary: Use linked cabinets to play co-op or deathmatch in this arcade-only shooter.

name: WackyLands Boss
summary: WackyLands Boss is a frenzied virtual monster game, where players assume the role of a gigantic creature attempting to destroy the magical kingdom.

name: Wacambria Island
summary: Explore ancient ruins for treasure and upgrades while avoiding traps and solving puzzles in this retro-inspired Action-Adventure RPG. Slash your way through dangerous creatures with a variety of weapons. Explore a diverse island full of hidden secrets and learn to wield a mysterious power.

name: Warframe: Nyx Warframe
summary:
Warframe is pulling up to The Game Awards 2024 with plenty of goodies and great news to share!

Claim now to receive a free Nyx Warframe with a free Warframe Slot, for a limited time only.

name: Warp & Warp
summary: You control a monster fighter. A warp zone is set in the middle of the screen. Warp to the next level when flashing

name: WarShip
summary: Drive a warship to attack the enemy ships, and finally kill the boss of this level to win.

name: Waifu vs Zombies
summary: Unleash the Power of the Ultimate Waifu in a Post-Apocalyptic Showdown Against the Undead Horde!

name: War in the Pacific: Admiral's Edition
summary: Admiral's Edition, adds significant improvements and changes to the original title to enhance game play, improve realism, and increase historical accuracy. There are 15 campaigns included with the game, which can be played against the computer opponent, hot seat, and by secure email. Combined with a robust and time-proven engine, War in the Pacific - Admiral's Edition gives you the chance to fight the entire war your way on every level.

name: War of Freedom
summary: It is an open world game played from a third perspective. It is a medieval story-based game in which we interact with people and take part, character development, hunt.

name: Wario's Whack Attack
summary: Wario's Whack Attack was a browser game that was available to play on Mario Party's official website. Along with Mario's Memory Madness and Donkey Konk, it is among the oldest Mario-related promotional games released by Nintendo.

name: WarPlan
summary: WarPlan is an incredibly accurate World War II simulation engine. It is a balance of realism and playability incorporating the best from 50 years of World War II board wargaming. Play a recreated World War II in every detail, thanks to the engine flexibility and database.

name: Wallace & Gromit: The Grand Tour
summary: An unreleased Wallace & Gromit racing game that got reworked into the completely original Gubble Buggy Racer

name: WackyMoles
summary: WackyMoles is VR casual game like Whack-A-Mole. Take up your hammer and see how many you can hit!

name: Watch out!!!
summary: Immerse yourself in the exciting feats of Oto, a small but very brave firefighter cat, who ventures into a burning building, avoiding dangerous debris to save other cats. Help him in his daring battle for survival and rescue the kittens in distress.

name: Wall-E
summary:
Hey kids, do you like Wall-E? You do? Then great news! Now you can help Wall-E clean up trash on your Atari 2600!

Go around the junkyard and clean up all that garbage, but watch out! Electrical storms are brewing and if Wall-E is hit, he shuts down.

name: Way to the Cake
summary: In the game you have to face difficult obstacles. Go through all the difficult places and test yourself for strength. Finally, a delicious cake awaits you ...

name: Warframe: Dark Sectors
summary: Tenno, we have received word that Vay Hek has enlisted the ranks of the Grineer Prosecutors and Guardsmen to keep the Tenno at bay. To fight Vay Hek players must first find his location, a secret the Prosecutors protect.

name: Way of Retribution: Legend of Abyss
Warlock's Citadel
summary: Fight your way through dungeons littered with dangerous traps, equip your character, learn various skills and spells, defeat hordes of monsters, and save the kingdom from a threats of evil warlock.

name: Waking Tides
summary: Welcome to "Waking Tides," a small but captivating atmospheric adventure game that thrives on experimentation. Delve into a world where augmented reality extends your gameplay, seamlessly blurring the lines between reality and fantasy.

name: WarpZone vs. The Dimension
summary: WarpZone vs. The Dimension is a co-op beat'em up derived from the very essence of the 90s. Relive this nostalgia with a modern view!

name: Warship World War
summary: This is a large multiplayer military naval battle simulation game. By using the hundreds of battleships that really existed during the Second World War, the player experienced the most authentic and exciting fun of naval battles. Online PvP battles. Prove your commanding skills in fierce naval battles with players from all over the world.

name: Warframe: The Duviri Paradox
summary: A Mad King, a mysterious Drifter, and a color-shifting unreality as sublime as it is deadly combine in the latest addition to Warframe’s ever-expanding universe, The Duviri Paradox!

name: War of The Titans
summary: Your people have been driven from their homeland by war. The elders speak of an ancient land where gods and men lived as one. After months at sea you land on a mysterious island that the elders believe is your ancient homeland. Rebuild your civilization, and uncover the secrets of your ancestors.

name: Wakfu: Les Gardiens
summary:
Wakfu: Les Gardiens is a browser game intended as an initiation to MMORPGs for young teens and a crossover link to the animated series "WAKFU", released by ANKAMA and broadcasted by France 3.

Since 2014, ASHES, an association composed by three players (Krayth, Kyosset and Starlight) worked on its restoration. Reconstituted to be identical to the original, the game is online on a free fan-made server without any kind of monetization.

name: Wander
summary: Ever wonder what sort of secrets are hidden amongst nature? Now's your chance to find out. Soar through the skies, swim the depths of the ocean, and explore the lush rainforests in Wander, the non-combat explorative-based indie MMO. Slow moving and relaxing, with lots of trees and no explosions.

name: Wangan Sensen Red City
summary:
Wangan Sensen Red City is a cancelled Virtual Boy game that was to be released sometime in 1996. The game, like many others, was cancelled due to the failure of the Virtual Boy.

Translating the title of the game suggests that it is a tactical war simulator. The screenshots seem to confirm this. Reviews of the game say that it used both D-pads, was constituted of 9 stages and had a giant warship as a boss.

name: Watermelon
summary: Watermelon is a clicker Game, in which you click a watermelon!

name: Watch Mario
summary:
Gameplay style is an unaudited presentation of Mario assessing & orienting 'framework gameplay' with dynamic simplicity.

This hack has 77 exits and was made by BabyCan.

name: War Machines: Tanks Battle Game
summary: Get ready for the ultimate tank battle experience in War Machines, a tank game that allows you to command your own army of powerful machines and bring destruction upon your enemies. Dive into intense, heart-pounding tank battles and prove your skills in this war game!

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR
summary: Second upgraded version of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6

name: Wand of Fortune 2 FD: Kimi ni Sasageru Epilogue
summary: This fandisk gives gamers the epilogue, the final happy ending to Wand of Fortune 2 and new episodes.

name: Wasteland Survival
summary: Survive the post apocalypse in Wasteland Survival - the last shelter for survivors on earth! The first thing you need learn is survival. Build home. Craft & Upgrade weapons to kill hordes of zombies, Hunt & Explore with your dog. Gather resources and PVP Plunder... Can you stop the zombie apocalypse?

name: Walking Girl: Dead Parking
summary: This is a postapocalyptical shooter, which you fighting versus scared zombies. Your fight area it is an abandoned parking with huge numer of ugly zombies. You have a different types of ammunations, many patrons and one area.

name: Wastepaperbin VR
summary: Throw paper balls at trash cans... in VR!

name: Wave Runner
summary: WaveRunner is an arcade, personal watercraft racing game. Playable with a hydraulic motion system Jet Ski that provides the realistic feel and movement of riding the waves on a 3-axis motion system. Players can turn the Jet Ski's handle bars, moderate the accelerator, and lean the Jet Ski body with the turns on one of the three available courses (Beginner, Intermediate and Expert) . With realistic 3-D action, several tropical courses and the ability to link multiple units this is a must-have Simulator for any arcade or serious collector!

name: Wario's Grab Bag
summary: Wario's Grab Bag was an online Adobe Flash game published by Nintendo to promote the release of Wario Land 4 on the Game Boy Advance. It could be played from the Welcome to Greedville microsite inside Wario's Arcade.

name: Wario's Crazy Caps
summary: Wario's Crazy Caps was an online Adobe Flash game published by Nintendo to promote the release of Wario Land 4 for the Game Boy Advance. It could be played from the Welcome to Greedville microsite alongside Wario's Grab Bag and Wario's Dunk Tank.

name: Warface: Breakout
summary: Become the ultimate mercenary of tomorrow in Warface: Breakout, a tactical online first-person shooter where tight gunplay and strategic team cooperation define the high-stakes PvP experience. Engage in fierce gunfights, make split-second decisions and master a vast arsenal of weapons to outsmart your opponents and secure victory.

name: Wallace & Gromit Fun Pack
summary: The Wallace & Gromit Fun Pack, released on CD-ROM in 1996 shortly after A Close Shave, is a compilation of three games inspired by the series, as well as film clips and desktop customising assets.

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Ironskull's Boyz
summary: Iron-clad and muscle-bound, these brutal Orruks are trapped in an endless battle within the shifting city of Shadespire. They wield huge, rusted weapons and thirst for combat. Unlock this warband and play as the Ironskull's Boyz in Warhammer Underworlds: Online.

name: Wacky Golf Land
summary: Strap your VR headset on, pick up your putter, and step into our wacky mini golf theme park. Win races at Pole Position, conquer high seas at Pirate Bay, feel nostalgic at Arcadia, or chill with our Cafe Latte. How many holes in one can you make?

name: Warehouse Manager Simulator
summary: In "Warehouse Manager Simulator", step into the shoes of a burgeoning entrepreneur with ambitions to conquer the logistics industry. Begin your journey by acquiring your first warehouse and a humble forklift, ready to embark on a path towards warehouse management mastery.

name: Wand of Fortune: Mirai he no Prologue Portable
summary: A port for PSP

name: Warbl
summary: Warbl is a daily guessing game where players are presented with a song played in reverse, and must guess the correct song within six attempts. Each incorrect guess will reveal information about the artist, genre, and decade of the song's release.

name: Warriors of Might and Magic
summary: Warriors of Might and Magic is a game in the fictional Might and Magic universe.

name: Wangan Midnight
summary: Basic game modes are the Story Mode that follows the manga's plot according to the main characters point of view. The Time Attack Mode is based on time trials, and the Free Run Mode allows the user to drive the Shuto Expressway selecting his starting points without racing, and can drive anywhere on the Shuto Expressway. The One Match Mode is made for head-to-head quick games against the characters. Wangan Connection is the online game mode that allows people to create, host and join online games with up to three other players. Through the game's progression, the user can unlock two extra game modes, Survival Mode and Maximum Speed Mode. Survival Mode puts the player up against characters from the series. The goal is to beat a designated amount of rivals without losing. If the player loses, the game is over. Survival Mode is divided into three classes. Rookie has 20 rivals, and runs on the C1. Runner has 50 rivals, and runs on the New Belt Line. Monster has 99 rivals, and runs on the Wangan, part of the New Belt Line, and Yokohane. Maximum Speed Mode is where the player drives a car of his choice on the Yatabe Test Course. The goal is to go as fast as you can without blowing the engine.

name: War in the Gulf
summary:
A game produced in Brazil for the NES clone Turbo Game.

The Persian Gulf and the Paradise of the Black Gold (Petroleum). Many countries depend on the oil for its proper economic development. One ambitious politician, to satisfy its desire to control the world, ogranized an army with extraordinary power fight and occupy the Persian Golf. The dependent countries had been without conditions to face this ruler, then, they had created an organization for the protection of peace worldwide and had sent the helicopter SUPER AH-64 to intervene in the enemy battlefield.

name: War Thunder: Greek AH-64A Apache
Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Sentry Gun Pack
summary: Arm your squad with new equipment and bring them even more glorious victories in the battles to come! This pack includes: Tarantula Sentry Guns with Heavy Bolters, Lascannons, and Multi-Meltas; a new Chain Effect; two Combat Shields; and three legendary melee weapons, each with unique combat properties.

name: Wander Stars
summary: Wander Stars is a turn-based RPG with roguelite elements where you make your own attacks by combining words! Create your own fighting techniques, befriend your rivals, and explore the universe in this story-driven adventure inspired by 90s anime.

name: War Robots Shooting Simulator
summary: Join the epic battle in deep space with War Robots Shooting Simulator! Create your robot hero, determine your strategy, and destroy enemies.

name: Warno: Southag
summary: Warno: Southag takes the action to southern West Germany, as NATO’s reconstituted SOUTHAG counter-attacks against Warsaw Pact forces. Play 2 massive new Army General campaigns and 4 Operations as you command 10 new Divisions and units, including new nations Canada, Spain, and Czechoslovakia.

name: Wallmount
summary:
Never-seen-before development and presentation has allowed us technology for this innovactive interative media piece - use the WASD keys, or arrows, to guide a wall on your "browser window" and have them, among other things, push characters about and collide with items!!!

Fascination Guaranteed!

Tenth in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Saga of the Great Awakening
summary: In the depths of Kanak, the Necrons awakened - the baleful Xenos who are alien to all that is living. Your squad has the honour to be the first to fight them; you are to prove that the name of Valgard Twice-Slain is worthy to be mentioned in the Space Wolves' sagas. For Russ and the Allfather!

name: War on the Street
summary: War on the Street is a top-down shooter game in which you have to fight a group of terrorists occupying the streets of Zamir city. Take them out, run or die.

name: Warden of Time
summary: Manipulate time to your whim! Use your powers of time manipulation to advance in this 2D puzzle adventure!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Fall of Kanak
summary:
When the frontline squads of the Word Bearers legion landed on Kanak and proceeded to capture the planet's key installations, they encountered fierce resistance in the form of Kanak Skull Takers loyal to the Imperium. But alas, in spite of the defenders' inhuman heroism and tenacity, their resistance amounted to nothing but a brief hindrance for the advance of the forces of Chaos.
This DLC allows you to witness the events of those long gone days from an unusual perspective.

name: War Leaders: Clash of Nations
summary: War Leaders: Clash of Nations is a strategy game which takes place during WW2, it allows you to take control of the leaders of the nations involved in the war.

name: Wand of Fortune Portable
summary: A port for PSP.

name: War Thunder: MiG-23ML Pack
War Mines: WW2
summary: Play using the logic of traditional minesweeper games in this reinterpretation of the classic game. Interact with the story of World War II by solving the minesweeper puzzles, finding land, naval, and anti-tank mines.

name: Wanted Guns: Gold. Greed. Gunfire
summary: You play as Reverend Devlin, an unforgiving priest whose dubious past as former leader of Los Gauchos, a Mexican gang of gold-thieving gunslingers, has finally come back to haunt him.

name: Watch Me Stream My Mental Breakdown
summary: Get rich by playing games all day or die trying. In this Story Card Game you'll get to experience what streaming is REALLY all about.

name: War Thunder: F-4S Phantom II Pack
War of Wizards
summary: Draw & cast your spells, magic showdown! War of Wizards is a VR game with MOBA confrontation. Draw dragons to summon dragons to fight for you, draw fireballs to summon fireballs to shoot at enemies, draw pills to heal yourself... - Draw & cast your spells! - Dodge the skills that the enemy fires!

name: Way of the Samurai Portable 2
summary: A Japan only PlayStation Portable entry into the beloved Way of the Samurai series developed by Spike

name: War of Gods Athena
summary: WarOfGods Athena is 3D RPG Metaverse game using Voice recognition. User can talk with NPC for mission or play game by voice commands for various avatar's actions. This game is based on Greek Mythology. This is the open world game and the world consists of 8 regions.

name: War Zone Soldier: Battle Royale Shooter
summary: Welcome to the action-packed battle royale shooter! Grab your weapons and try to be the last one standing, shooter!

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6
summary: Play on a driver unit to get the lifelike experience of a high-speed race down the highway! Featuring 13 domestic and foreign car manufacturers! Over 80 car models ranging from the latest to popular classics! Dominate the stage of real highways nationwide in ultra high-speed battles! Enjoy intense battles with friends or on your own!

name: Wake Up Magical Girl
summary: Wake Up Magical Girl is a deceptively cute, dystopian visual novel about becoming a Magical Girl in a totally hopeless, monster-ridden town with your very own emotionally-constipated magical familiar, Hope — for as long as you can.

name: Water Chaos
summary: Water Chaos - 2d game where the player needs to control the fish with the help of four selected directions, and together with it, all other marine life, but many of which can harm the player, and some simply do not allow you to swim in the right direction in order to collect all the lost pearls!

name: War Thunder: Tornado IDS WTD 61 Pack
summary: This Pack includes: Tornado IDS WTD 61 (Rank 7 Germany);Premium account for 20 days;2500 Golden Eagles.

name: War Thunder: Ancient Tank Bundle
Wayout
summary: A 3-D action game in which the player has to find a way out of 26 different mazes.

name: Wacky Worlds Creativity Studio
summary: Wacky Worlds Creativity Studio is a video game for the Sega Genesis released in 1994 under the Sega Club line for younger children. In it, the player has a choice of six different Wacky Worlds in which they can place animated "stickers", creating a two-dimensional diorama, of sorts. Among the Worlds are an underwater scene, a scene inside a house, a jungle, and the Moon. This game is considered a Sonic the Hedgehog property, as he appears on the cover of the box. Sonic also pilots the flying saucer that is used to choose a Wacky World to play in. He also appears in a small portrait sticker for the default sticker book in the house scene. Miles "Tails" Prower and Ecco the Dolphin appear on the box of the game as well. This game was made to compete with Nintendo's Mario Paint.

name: Warbit Union
summary: Wabit Union is a Free to Play FPS Game. Create a team and fight against the terrorist team.

name: Warmode
summary:
Free to play shooter about the confrontation of two irreconcilable sides, represented by the government military housings and the armed hirelings. Try your hand at virtual battles with off-scale dynamics and hurricane gameplay in the spirit of the classical shooters.
In the game are available a wide range of maps and several modes. Level system allows player to open achievements, weapons, stickers and more.

name: Warden
summary: Play as a Warden, the sole protector of a small village from sadistic entities that come from the Mist. A simulation role-playing game most easily described as "The Witcher meets Stardew...

name: Warcube
summary: Become the WARCUBE. Crush your enemies, siege castles, and bring glory to your six-sided self! These cubes were made for battle, not building.

name: Waiting for Instructions Run
summary: Speed and accuracy are key! The "Waiting for Instructions RUN" is a RUN game in which you must use your typing skills to avoid obstacles. Use your typing skills to lead the human waiting for instructions to the goal in a situation where one fingertip can change his fate!

name: Waxwing
summary: A collaborative arcade game in which two players use light guns to guide a moth and other characters along a dangerous path.

name: Wathitdew Record: Game Studio - Battlefield
summary: Wathitdew Record presents a new turn-based arcade fighting game featuring four universes from Wathitdew Game Studio franchises!

name: Wart
summary: No random, pure strategic board games.

name: Walk
summary: You can walk freely in the world of Walk, enjoy the beauty of the virtual world, and let the wonderful scenery bring comfort to your soul.

name: Warlock of Firetop Mountain
summary: The Warlock of Firetop Mountain, based on the 1982 as a paperback has been brought into game form! Play as four different heroes: Lunika Ekaadi, Dekion Strom, Alexandra of Blacksand and Arran Gottspeed. Overcome quests with a fantastic combat system and discover epic story.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dark Nexus Arena
summary:
The game launched into early access on May 1, 2015 and was set to launch in 2016.
However, development has since ceased on the project, and servers are set to be shut down 3/31/2016 as per notice on company website.

name: WarFire: Deluxe Edition
summary:
This version includes:

- WarFire
- WarFire Original Video Games Soundtrack

name: Was God Birthed!?
summary: Explore a lush, liminal museum with surreal suprises at every turn as you avoid your dad with your wits and scooter, and make it downstairs in time to catch the Club Ruby Rave!

name: Wan Nyan Doubutsu Byouin
summary: A Strategy game, published by TDK Core, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Wanko Mix
summary: A GBA game by TDK.

name: Walking Steel
summary: Fight epic tank battles, upgrade your vehicles and survive in dangerous conditions. Explore the world, find resources and fight enemies to become the best tanker. Join "Walking Steel" and prove your strength and tactics on the battlefield!

name: Wasteland Story
summary: This is Wasteland Story. Pixel 2D Side Scroller Post-Apocalypse RPG! The player must survive and conquer the nuclear fallout tainted wasteland and carry out the secret mission to save mankind.

name: Wall-Defender
summary: The mission - you are defending the wall from attacking aliens. Don't let them hit as they make the wall weaker. This sounds simplistic and is, but highly addictive as you score points for every alien destroyed. If a segment of the outer wall is destroyed (by the aliens kamikaze into it) if this happens enough times the outer wall flashes and you need to move in a level, post haste. If you don't, you drift off to space and all is lost. Don't fret though you have a chance to regain lost wall space by simply staying alive. If you stay alive long enough with no more incidents, you can regain that which has been lost...precious wall.

name: Warlords of Aternum
summary:
Now is the time to prove yourself in intense 3D-animated combat. Your mission is to build a powerful army and lead it to save the fantasy-world of Aternum. On your journey, you will not only face off against the evil Orcish horde and treacherous pirates, but you must also strategically claim key trade and resource outposts.

Rise above your competition by training your special units to their full potential and equip them with unique abilities and legendary armament to enhance your tactical capabilities. Seize victory by skillfully placing your units on the battlefield and you'll go down as one of the greatest Warlords in the history of Dunmar.

In addition to the eternal gratitude of the good citizens of Dunmar, your heroic efforts will merit a rank among Dunmar’s greatest PvP fighters.

name: War Thunder: USS Arkansas Pack
Warm Snow: The End Of Karma
summary: During the ten years of Bi'an's slumber in the Ash Of Nightmare, the malevolent god Helo was fully unleashed, bringing havoc to the world. The resistance force led by Linglong once glimpsed hope, but in the face of madness and despair, everything seemed so fragile...

name: Waxwing Radio
summary: Ambient precision flight in technoindustrial wastelands.

name: Water & Domestic Animals Bundle
summary:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Animal Shelter Simulator grants you the opportunity to tackle the challenging but also highly rewarding task of running a refuge for strays and rescues. Witness firsthand how much effort goes into helping abandoned and injured animals as you handle a number of tasks necessary for your shelter to operate smoothly.

name: Walkerwall
summary: mini-exploration-puzzle-platformer

name: Warriors & Castles
summary:
When a kingdom and an empire collide, the best warriors are called to battle. Join the mighty Kingdom or the glorious Empire and conquer your enemies.
A team-based, 3rd person action shooter with cartoon styled, fantasy themed backgrounds. 3 classes to choose from, each with its unique set of skills. Take over fortresses, take over kingdoms, take over everything.
Play with bots or with friends!

name: Wanderer's Sigil
summary: Wanderer’s Sigil is a turn-based roguelike RPG with a unique dice management system. Embrace the role of the courageous team of Wanderers in a realm scarred by mystical devastation. Manage your caravan, traverse the unknown, reclaim forgotten knowledge, and fight to survive!

name: Warband Survivors
summary: A unique mixture of vehicular combat and a wide selection of awesome characters, deploy into big map of an action packed events and objectives.

name: War Planet Online
summary: Build your army, dominate your region and lead your alliance to conquer the globe!

name: Wag
summary: Survive the Worst Apocalypse Game in WAG, an action-packed open-world survival game. Battle with zombies, fight other survivors, and find refuge in the central church of the city, your last hope in a chaotic world.

name: Warrior Maiden
summary: Warrior Maiden is a colorful and enjoyable side-scrolling platform game.

name: Warp
summary: It is a sci-fi top-down shooter in which the player's main task is to destroy alien power bases that is threatening Earth. The game consists of 26 levels and the players are provided with two weapons.

name: Watch The Fish
summary: Keep the fish water in jar as long as possible ! Watch The Fish is an arcade game where you have to show your dexterity to manage the fish water and get the best possible score. Choose to turn the wheel of fortune at your own risk.

name: Wally wo Sagase! Ehon no Kuni no Daibouken!
summary: Wally wo Sagase! Ehon no Kuni no Daibouken! is a Puzzle game, developed by Natsu System and published by Tomy Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Walkr: Fitness Space Adventure
summary: Walkr is a game that tracks the amount of steps a person takes and converts them into energy. One may then use that energy to speed up lengthy processes such as exploration, upgrades, and even planet production. Explore the galaxy by walking and stumble upon hungry aliens that need your help to live.

name: Warframe: Dante Chronicles Pack
summary: Bring the power of the Warframe chronicler, Dante, to your Arsenal along with a devastating Incarnon Melee Weapon and his signature Customizations!

name: Wario's Dunk Tank
summary: Wario's Dunk Tank was an online Adobe Flash game published by Nintendo to promote the release of Wario Land 4 on the Game Boy Advance. It was playable from the Welcome to Greedville microsite, alongside two other games called Wario's Grab Bag and Wario's Crazy Caps.

name: Wanderzone
summary: Jam to a chaotic tune and get lost in bizarre terrain.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade
summary:
Based on the extensive universe of Warhammer 40,000, Eternal Crusade will take gamers into a vicious battle between four factions of the 41st millennium in order to control a persistent world at war. Whether it is PvP (Player versus Player) or PvE (Player versus Environment) squads will have to work together and engage in massive battles and exterminate the other factions! To do so; fans can choose from twenty different sub-factions, earn hundreds of weapons, customization options and accessories drawn from 29 years of Warhammer 40,000 lore to create their perfect warriors.

Your faction is your family now. Plan your strategy from orbit, then face death side-by-side with them as you defend strongholds or delve into the Underworld to combat hordes of ravening Tyranids.

Victory is not a thing for a single warrior to claim, but the result of the fury of armies. Dive into the shifting frontlines and crush your foes by cutting off supply lines, sieging walled fortresses and striking deep into the heart of enemy territory.

Go toe-to-toe in melee, snipe your enemies from afar or fire into the fray from one of the seats of a gun-loaded Predator tank. Combat in Eternal Crusade ranges from a personal clashing of swords to truly epic warfare involving hundreds of other players.

Choose your allegiances and background, then earn hundreds of weapons and accessories drawn from 26 years of 40k lore to craft your perfect warrior.

name: Wajin Ibunroku: Asaki, Yumemishi
summary: Wajin Ibunroku: Asaki, Yumemishi is a second game in Asaki, Yumemishi series. It's a Visual Novel directed to female demographic, developed and published by MIO, released in Japan in 2012 for PC.

name: Waku Waku Sweets: Happy Sweets Making
summary: With easy operation, you can make sweets happily! You can learn how to make sweets with over 100 kinds of fun while playing! There are many recipes including cakes, cookies, Japanese sweets and so on.

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Collector's Edition
summary:
This version contains:

- Ubersreik Map.
- Vermintide Wallpapers.
- Behind the Scenes Pack.
- Official Soundtrack.
- UNIQUE Headpiece: Candlelight Guard.
- UNIQUE Headpiece: Dal Grimazul.
- UNIQUE Headpiece: Hat of Purifying Light.
- UNIQUE Headpiece: Tal Amere Crown.
- UNIQUE Headpiece: Ironside Helmet.
- 2 UNIQUE Trinkets.

name: Wannabe Challenge
summary: Find your heart-throbbing romance with hidden fates through the best romantic story RPG!

name: Warrior Fighter
summary: The warriors of history fight for immortal glory.

name: Way of Rhea
summary: A puzzle adventure. Hard puzzles, forgiving mechanics. Solve mind bending color puzzles that build off of one another, unlock new areas of a vibrant hub world, chat with townsfolk, and undo any mistake with the press of a button.

name: Wand of Fortune R2 FD: Kimi ni Sasageru Epilogue
summary: Fandisc for Wand of Fortune R2.

name: Wakerunners
summary:
Wakerunners is a 4v4 & 5v5 team action game set in a near-future Earth, now a relic of its past. Glide through arenas with a top-down view, employing a unique speed mechanic. Unleash swift combat in diverse landscapes for an immersive experience.

Are you ready for battle? It is too late to stop. In order to protect the team and secure victory, get yourself ready to dive into the battlefield.

According to a final news post before the game's page was removed from Steam, development was halted and the game was permanently canceled after feedback from the Steam Next Fest playtest indicated that significant improvements were needed to achieve the core gameplay quality the developers were aiming for.

name: Wandness
summary: Craft wands, create synergies, battle monsters, and survive. Dive into the depths of magic crafting, where you'll forge spells from magical components and elemental gems for endless combinations. Explore procedurally generated dungeons, and unleash your magic madness to overcome the darkness.

name: Wanton Destruction
summary:
This add-on for Shadow Warrior was released for free on September 9, 2005.
The add-on continues Lo Wang's story after the end of the original game.

name: Wasted: Will Be Brutal
summary: A Survival Open World PVE/PVP

name: Warlanes
summary: Experience the fusion of WWII action and strategic MOBA-style gameloop. Lead your troops in third-person shooter battles, guide them down their lanes, and siege the enemy base in a war-torn landscape.

name: Wake Up Before You Get Killed, Minions!
summary: The player controls Bowser, who is in a rope conveyor belt. In the left side of the screen is a orange pipe, which let's out Goomba's and Toad's. Bowser can roar and wake them up, where waking up a Goomba will earn him a point while waking up a Toad doesn't do anything. If the Toad's fall in the lava, Bowser will earn a point while letting the Goomba's fall into the lava will cost Bowser a life. Hazards occasionally show up, most of which can make Bowser lose a life in contact.

name: War of Zanzor III: Birth of Unity
summary: A traditional turn based RPG with a huge focus on story. An endless evil plagues the world but are they truly evil? Watch the world change before your eyes as the universe reaches its end! Save the universe from the secrets of your world in War of Zanzor III: Birth of Unity!

name: War of Beach
summary: This is an Early Access version that offers you to experience this game in advance. It is of great importance that we hope to have your advice and suggestions for our game, as we are willing to develop a game that belongs both you and us. Your precious idea will boost the development of this game.

name: War Thunder: Type 96A Prototype Pack
Warface
summary: Join a five soldier team and take the fight to Blackwood across the globe. Your team will have to master each class's special abilities in order to come out victorious. Missions and location are renewed on a daily basis and can be played on each difficulty: Regular, Skilled, or Hardcore.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Dark Angels Chapter Pack
summary:
Bear the honoured colours of the Dark Angels with the Dark Angels Chapter Pack!

This DLC contains an exclusive Champion skin for the Bulwark and his shield, three weapon skins, and over 40 cosmetic items from 8 Dark Angels Successor Chapters.

name: Warfront Tactics: Battlefield Chronicles Battle Simulator
summary: Unleash the commander within in Warfront Tactics - Battlefield Chronicles Battle Simulator, a captivating physics-based strategy game that thrusts you into the heart of epic warfare. Strategically allocate your resources, craft a formidable army, and outmaneuver your opponents in intense battles governed by realistic physics. Witness the chaos and spectacle of combat as your meticulously planned strategies unfold on the battlefield. Every decision carries weight, every encounter presents a challenge, and every victory is hard-won.

name: War Thunder: Merkava Mk.3 Raam Segol Pack
Waifu Space Conquest
summary: Kill the aliens and enjoy the cyberpunk aesthetic

name: Wandering Star
summary: You are a team of researchers going to explore a planet for possible colonization. Unexpected storms have crashed your ship and you are now stranded on the planet's surface. Pick your class from 4, each with their own skills and abilities. search out for parts to help repair the ship and send in for some help.

name: War Thunder: Type 90B "Fuji" Pack
summary:
This pack includes:

Type 90B "Fuji" (Rank 7, Japan)
Premium account for 20 days;
2500 Golden Eagles.

name: WarTorn
summary: Action Platformer with unique Controls.

name: War Thunder: Ezer Weizman's Spitfire Pack
War Thunder: J-7D Pack
War Thunder: Object 120 Pack
War Thunder: M1A1 HC "Click-Bait" Pack
Warlords Battlecry III
summary:
Warlords Battlecry III further expands the Battlecry tradition of featuring persistent RPG-like fantasy heroes with its retinue of loyal followers fighting massive battles in the Warlords' world of Etheria. It is a true sequel to Warlords Battlecry I & II, featuring many familiar races and troop-types, while also adding some new ones into the mix. 

Warlords Battlecry III continue to perfect its automated feature system, greatly reducing gameplay micromanagement and quickly proving to be the holy grail of RTS games among gamers of the genre. 

While being a strong RTS outright, there are also numerous activities for players to engage in between battles, such as obtaining titles and awards, trading and purchasing items & retinue members, and even an upgradeable castle to reflect your importance and influence in the world of Etheria. 

Extra features included in Warlords Battlecry III are specifically geared to please the legions of previous Battlecry players, including the removal of hero and unit caps, the addition of new special abilities for high-level heroes and the creation of an intuitive hero system. All of these features, coupled with new races and hero classes, new spells and items, and new building and dragons meld to form a Real-Time Strategy game that once again raises the benchmark for other games in the genre. Warlords Battlecry III is poised to receive even greater accolades than the previous award-winning titles in the Warlords Battlecry series.

name: Warzone
summary: Duke finds himself in a large warzone

name: Warbanners
summary: "Warbanners" is a turn-based, tactical strategy game with role-playing elements. Managing a squad of mercenaries, the player will experience the story campaign's 42 missions, with the ultimate goal of solidifying their place in the ancient legends.

name: Warface: Global Operations
summary: Intense PVP and PVE fights, exciting events, and lots of unique content are waiting for you! Join the game and try them yourself! Dynamic battles await you in the universe of the world-famous Warface shooter! Enjoy various combat modes, easy-to-learn controls, and amazing graphics. Create a unique character and break into exciting multiplayer PvP battles designed specifically for mobile devices!

name: WarpedSpace
summary: An open world scifi adventure, set in deep space, encounter ships and creature, some hostile some not, explore different environments scattered across the dark. Gather resources and equipment as you uncover the mystery of WarpdSpace. Explore on foot or eva discovering alien bases, outposts, wrecks and more....

name: War Tortoise
summary: Take control of the mighty War Tortoise, a heavy tank armed to the teeth with powerful weapons and automated turrets! Equip weapons, recruit units, build defenses, collect resources, and ultimately defend against a huge onslaught of enemy forces. Combining a shooter, idle gaming, and tower defense, War Tortoise is a unique mix of gaming that anyone can enjoy!

name: #WarGames
summary:
#WarGames is a passive game using an interactive video format that influences the story based on what you chose to watch from a selection of multiple video feeds all playing at the same time.

"The series that watches you.
You shape the story in this thrilling tale of modern espionage, hacking and government conspiracy."

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Chaos Wastes
summary: Chaos Wastes is a free update to Warhammer: Vermintide 2. Explore the unpredictable and dramatic lands of Chaos Wastes in this all-new 1-4 player co-op rogue-lite experience, expanding the Vermintide story in a new game mode.

name: War Drone FPV Quad Simulator
summary: FPV quadcopter flight simulator developed in collaboration with military drone operators of Ukrainian Armed Forces. Realistic flight physics, payload mass customization, battery discharge, wind influence and electronic warfare effects. Peaceful freestyle piloting experience is also included.

name: Warp Lab
summary: Experience seamless portal gameplay mechanics in VR. Warp Lab allows you to take full advantage of immersive player-controlled portals across a diverse array of puzzle, combat, and sandbox levels.

name: Wasps!
summary: Wasps is a battle arena which puts you in the backyard of your house to fend off all the nasty wasps attacking you and your neighborhood, built for the HTC Vive and room scale VR. Get your lawn mower, chainsaw and the axe and tear them in pieces!

name: Wadanohara and the Great Blue Sea
summary: Wadanohara and the Great Blue Sea is an adventure RPG made in late 2013. It follows the young witch Wadanohara and her familiars. After a journey from the witch world she had been visiting, she returns to her deep sea home to find it had been attacked by an unknown enemy. Wadanohara is tasked with repairing the magical barriers protecting the kingdom destroyed by this enemy, but fixing them shall not be the last of her worries...

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Drachenfels
summary: Explore 3 stunning new adventure maps in this DLC for Vermintide, where you travel outside of Ubersreik's walls to Castle Drachenfels

name: Watch Out For Goblins!
summary: Experience the joy of physics based goblins in their natural habitat! Run, jump, kick and flip your way through a delightful physics sandbox! Explore and collect Power Cogs to become Goblin Royalty! There's no saying what might happen, and no stopping the BIG GOBLIN ENERGY!

name: Warp League Basketball
summary: The sport of the future is basketball with guns. Play 3-on-3 in VR!

name: WarioWare: Touched!
summary:
Wario makes his debut on the Nintendo DS with hundreds of all-new minigames. Now you must complete your goals by using the touch screen and a stylus. Tap, scratch, and rub your stylus on the touch screen to play minigames that have you do everything from milking a cow and drawing a mustache to hurling stars at evil ninjas. You can even play some minigames by blowing into the DS's built-in microphone. The more minigames you clear, the more characters and items you unlock.

The 3DS version was exclusively available for a few months in 2016 to My Nintendo members.

name: Walkerman
summary: Hunt monsters by discovering and exploiting their rules in this Visual Novel/Adventure Game from ScalemaiL.

name: Warlock Revenge
summary: Darkness gathers over the Isle of Shadows, and hordes of evil demons called by the water mages are flooding the peaceful lands, sowing chaos and destruction. The evil draws its power from an ancient artifact - the book of thousands of deaths that rests in the deepest chambers of hell. Warlock Haviron decides to destroy the book and leaves for a long journey full of adventures and dangers...

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Last Stand
summary: It's time to test your mettle in Last Stand, a brand new gamemode with a single objective: staying alive. With no hope of rescue, the heroes are making a last desperate stand, fighting increasingly difficult hordes of Skaven. How long will it take before they finally fall?

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Champions
summary:
Command powerful factions & legendary Champions in this Warhammer Trading Card Game.
Deploy units and unleash deadly magical abilities, while completing quests to earn blessings from the gods. Only the mightiest of warriors will stand victorious in this battle for the Mortal Realms, a war that spans both physical and digital worlds.

name: Waldorf's Journey
summary: Waldorf didn't go looking for adventure. He was just trying to enjoy a nice nap...

name: Wavelength
summary: Hot or cold. Soft or hard. Wizard or…not a wizard? Work together to decide where your clue falls on the spectrum - and win by reading your friends' minds.

name: Warmonger: Operation - Downtown Destruction
summary: Warmonger: Operation - Downtown Destruction, is a free game available for download from Nvidia with their GeForce Power Pack. It provides multiplayer online play and offline play with bots. It uses PhysX technology, allowing the destruction of walls and various other objects.

name: Warrior Beneath Heaven
summary: 3d duel fight support local multiplayer.

name: WaveShaper
summary:
Triangle blushed, looking away as sheepishly as she could given that she was a just a primitive vector shape.
Square advanced on Triangle, gently rubbing her corners. His touch was as soft as a sphere's surface.
Triangle had never experienced such a thing. It was a feeling out of her 2D reality.

name: Wall Gai
summary: A cancelled business simulation game for the 64DD.

name: Wampee Helicopters
summary: Wampee Helicopters Is 3D action game, part 3d platformer/shoot em up, involving Helicopters and blasting your way to the goal.21 action packed levels, Genre, 3D action/ 3d platformer/3rd person shooter A game based on flight Low poly 3D...

name: Warriors of Fate
summary:
Warriors of Fate is a beat'em up with nine stages. Each contains large mobs including spearman, archers, strongmen, bomb-wielding opponents, and at least one boss. Using two buttons, Attack and Jump, the characters all have standard moves typical of Capcom side-scrollers of the day.

There is also a variety of weapons in the game which can be picked up. As with most side-scrollers, food is used to replenish health and can be found in various breakable containers in the game level. One notable feature of the game is the ability to summon a warhorse which adds more attacks to the characters, generally involving pole-arms. Most characters are given a special wrestling throw of their own, like in Final Fight and The Punisher.

In the Japanese version, the game follows Liu Bei's plight in Jingzhou from the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, a history-based novel from China, set in the Three Kingdoms period as Cao Cao sets to invade his lands. In the English adaptation, however, the Three Kingdoms theme was lost, and most names have been changed to names of Mongolian origin.

name: Waluigi's Road to Glory: Horlogic Will Go On
summary: The plot of this SMW Hack happens during the events of Luigi's Misadventures 3: Recipe for a disaster. This hack contains 112 exits.

name: War Lords
summary:
War Lords is a strategy MMO (Massively Multiplayer) game that requires players to build and upgrade their kingdoms as fast and efficiently as possible. Get ready to face invaders from all across the land and engage in epic battles for imperial supremacy. It’s time to claim your rightful place as ruler of the War Lords and build your Empire!

Make use of the card system to build an even greater army! Each card represents an officer or general who can lead your soldiers. Cards are classified by rank: S is the highest, followed by ranks A, B, C and D. The higher the rank, the stronger your troops! Take a chance and buy random cards from the store, search for cards in the Recruitment Center, or combine existing cards to get new ones. You can even trade with other players! Choose from famous generals such as Guan Yu, Liu Bei, Cao Wei, Zhuge Liang and Sima Zhao and many more!

name: Warzone
summary: Turn based strategy game inspired by Risk.

name: Waialae Country Club: True Golf Classics
summary: Grab your clubs and head for the first tee. This golf sim recreates the world famous Hawaiian Waialae Golf Course, noted for lots of bunkers and very fast greens. You can choose your golfer, assign him a caddy, pick your set of clubs and adjust the power, putting, technical, recovery and wind game stats to suit your personal preference. The game offers a practice training mode, a tournament mode and the ability to challenge your friends in a stroke match. Oddly, this game was not sanctioned by the PGA and assumes that the golfer is always male.

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Death on the Reik
summary: Explore 2 stunning new adventure maps in this DLC for Vermintide, where you travel to Reikwald Forest and follow The River Reik in the pursuit of a thief!

name: War Thunder: Leopard 2A4M CAN Bundle
Wanna-Be a Dino Finder
summary: Help Dr. Rock Hound dig for fossils and learn some fun facts about dinosaurs and prehistoric eras. You can also play dinosaur-themed mini-games with anthropomorphic animals Addie, Katie and Rufus. Part of edutainment series of games.

name: Wakedas
summary: WAKEDAS is a contemplative and thoughtful shape shifting puzzle game with the perfect combination of eye-candy visuals and serene sounds.

name: Walk It Out!
summary: Walk it Out! provides gamers on the Wii platform with a unique way to explore an inviting and entertaining gameworld, while staying active and social. Containing both local single player and multiplayer options, and supporting the DanceDanceRevolution (DDR) controller for Wii, the Wii Remote/Nunchuk configuration or Wii Balance Board, players walk to the rhythm of an in-game soundtrack, as well as take on a series of mini-games. With continued success the gameworld expands with new physical elements, as well as additional songs by popular artists which together keep the fun coming and players moving as they discover new challenges with each step they take.

name: Wagon Gloom
summary: In 1961, a mysterious subway train disappears, in which operates a dark cult of souls of the sect all entered the cars, turning the train into a ghost, and again the train falls into the subway, an ordinary resident who fell asleep after a day of work, accidentally fell into another dimension

name: Waluigi's Taco Stand
summary:
Waluigi's Taco Stand is a rom hack of Super Mario 64 made by Kaze Emanuar and a standalone Waluigi's unofficial and unlicensed game, being released in cartridge format (only one cartridge was made).

In this game, Waluigi has to work in a Taco stand to pay his debts.

This game was based on a mock fictional video game meme.

name: WarTorn
summary: A 3D strategy game from the late 1990s. The premise is that war has been eliminated and Wartorn is a tournament that simulates war for an audience bored with all the other sports.

name: Wadality
summary: Multiplayer VR Shooter platform with unique vertical gameplay! Here you can literally fly around using "flapping" locomotion!

name: WarioWare: Snapped!
summary: A downloadable WarioWare game for the DSi which lets the player use the camera to play a variety of absurd microgames.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: 8-Bit Lair
summary: Traverse a wicked corporate skyscraper, global headquarters of Vincent Vector, hacker billionaire and spoiled genius. Will you be able to stop his bogus plot to shred the physical world and bring it all into his vast Virtual Reality? Find out in this radical '80s mini golf adventure.

name: Warpgate
summary: Freeverse's space trading/exploration/combat game for iOS.

name: Warriors of the Lost Empire
summary: Warriors of the Lost Empire is an action RPG located in a fantasy land, built long ago by the great Emperor Hadrianus as a testament to his beautiful wife Antinos. But, when Hadrianus mysteriously locked himself in the temple, the city dwellers began to flee. The city became besieged by criminals and other worldly creatures, and now a special team of warriors have been tasked with investigating the lost city.

name: Waking Nitemare
summary: Waking Nitemare: A newtro FPS with modern twists. Dash, heal with melee headshots, use bullet time. Face unique bosses, find upgrades. Classic shooter action meets innovative mechanics. For retro fans and newcomers alike.

name: Wario Destroys A Glass of Milk
summary:
The third and final outRAGEous installment in the Glass of Milk series.

Wario comes out of nowhere! Punching, bashing, and butt-stomping everything in his path, all in a vain effort to rescue the kidnapped Mario and Luigi. Explore exciting new industries and defeat tough new bosses! Meanwhile, a certain mad scientist watches from afar...

name: Watcher
summary: I just want my life to end

name: Wamu Wamu 2
summary: A cute short experimental game about cleaning fruits that are infested by big worms.

name: War of the Monsters
summary:
Experience War of the Monsters originally released on the PlayStation2 console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Stare in disbelief! Scream in Horror! Run for your life!

100-foot tall monsters have stormed the world, causing panic and despair! Engage in a savage battle, these behemoths won’t let anything stand in their way. Which one will win this War of the Monsters?

name: Wachenröder
summary: Wachenröder is a turn based game with 3D maps and set in the victorian era. The story takes place in a dark future on the island Edward, which is ruled by the noble and magnanimous King Wizar.

name: Warrior Kings: Battles
summary: Warrior Kings: Battles maintains the excitement that made Warrior Kings a leading RTS. It is a stand-alone title that adds a new strategic and tactical dimension to the series.

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR+
summary:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR+ is an arcade racing game developed and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment, based on the Wangan Midnight manga. As the thirteenth installment in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade series, this game marks the third upgrade to Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6, following the 6 R and 6 RR updates. It was released in Japan on April 17, 2024, with the release date for the Asian version yet to be confirmed.

The game was announced during a live stream celebrating the 20th anniversary of the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series.

name: Way to Yaatra
summary:
Way to Yaatra tells the tale of a young pilgrim who has received the call from the Gods, and answering their call he'll embark on a journey across the altars searching for an ascension to divinity and his own completion. During the journey the player will face intricate puzzles and zones which require the highest of abilities.
The journey will have the pilgrim climb mount Itkinkalla, a sacred and hostile place for anyone willing to learn the truth that ravages those lands, where all the gods live as one. Way to Yaatra is an experience designed for a single player based on platforming with an elegant artistic style that will defy and charm even the most demanding players.

name: Warzone World
summary:
Slots meet war... spin, build, attack, conquer the world!

Build your base and train troops that you can command & conquer the world with. You won't be battling any ninjas, pirate kings or animals in this game... this is a plain and simple war game with soldiers, tanks, fighter jets and nukes.

A spin-based casual game where a slot machine meets turn-based strategy warfare. A super casual time waster for when you're bored. Optimized for mobile phones.

* WARNING *: This is a very casual creation meant to waste time when you have nothing to do... so please don't expect action or anything too complex. And it's definitely not meant to be completed in 1 go.

Download game on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.WarzoneWorld

name: Wacky Races
summary: You take on the role of Dastardly and Mutley from the Hanna-Barbera cartoon series in this action title with superficial racing overtones. Your aim is to complete each course in a particular position, which is achieved either by waiting for them to suffer enough damage to drop out of the race, or by inflicting that damage yourself. Your car is armed with a forward-shooting arrow to impale the opposition cars, and deal with the many hazards the races throw at you, including boulders and rabbits, which can be taken out for points.

name: WarioWare: D.I.Y. Showcase
summary: WarioWare: D.I.Y. Showcase is intended as a showcase for all the different WarioWare: D.I.Y. products, including microgames, music, and four-panel comics - all with simple controls using only the Wii Remote controller. Use the Game Blender and its many modes to play microgames featuring Wario, ninjas, animals, and even classic Nintendo franchises. Or check out the Music section to listen to or play a selection of songs using a character from Balloon Fight.

name: Warplanes: WW1 + Space Commander Bundle
summary: Become a legend of air combat! Two thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW1 Sky Aces and Space Commander: War and Trade.

name: Warplanes: WW1 + WW2 + Space Commander Bundle
summary: Become a legend of air combat! Three thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW1 Sky Aces, Warplanes: WW2 Dogfight and Space Commander: War and Trade.

name: Wangan Midnight
summary:
Wangan Midnight is the first video game adaptation based on the Wangan Midnight manga. The cabinet consists of two racing units with a chair and steering wheel. Similar to the concept of the Tokyo Xtreme Racer \ Shutokō Battle series, players roam the Metropolitan Expressway in Tokyo that has been divided into eight tracks. The Story mode adapts parts of the manga as the player's character seeks out and defeats increasingly challenging opponents. The player can freely roam the expressway with a traffic density that shifts according to the time of day. When an opponent is encountered the game enters a battle mode and the cars start to race each other. Each car has a life gauge, shown as an SP meter, that is drained for the trailing car. The race is over when time runs out or when one of the cars loses all SP.

The other game modes are the Time Attack mode and a Versus mode played against another player locally. The available cars are licensed from manufacturers such as Mitsubishi, Nissan and Subaru.

name: WarShip HD
summary:
There are enemies who have powerful warships and weapons in each zone. As you defend an attack by the enemies, you’ll get stronger. As you get stronger, you acquire trophies and in return you get stronger warships, each warship having a special feature. However, there will be pirates that will try to steal your trophies, so keep an eye out and make sure the trophies aren’t stolen.
We hope you win by understanding the features of each warship.
We wish you your victory.

name: Warbits
summary: Introducing Warbits, a war simulator for a better tomorrow. Give peace a fighting chance by settling your differences casualty free. Don't agree with your fellow factions? You don't have to! Put those blasters down, load up Warbits, and virtually crush the opposition!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Purifier Edition
summary: Lead the Grey Knights to exterminate the forces of Chaos in fast-paced, brutal, turn-based tactical combat. Personalise and equip your elite squad of Daemonhunters to purge the deadly corruption of The Bloom as it spreads in a galaxy-spanning campaign.

name: Warm Gun
summary: This single player adventure takes players on a post-apocalyptic ride through a decayed amusement park. Jammed packed with shooting ranges, mini games and a few surprises, players are invited to hone their skills in the many wonders of… The Carnival of Bullets!

name: Wandering Pet Garden
summary: Wandering Pet Garden is a relaxing pet collecting game with elements of simulation, collecting and resource management.

name: Wallace & Gromit: The Grand Getaway
summary: Wallace and Gromit: The Grand Getaway is a brand-new VR adventure involving the famous Aardman animated duo.

name: Warspace 2
summary: Warspace 2 is an open world RPG space shooter where you can trade, craft, fight and explore procedurally generated universe!

name: Wak Attak
summary: A retro-arcade adventure. It's Pacman, with weapons. Take our hero through 29 devious mazes fighting ghosts, dragons, vampires, and more. Cast powerful spells, find fun treasures, and try to rescue the rest of the Waka Waka's. Wak Attak is classic, retro goodness.

name: WASDead
summary: WASDead is a hardcore action platformer where you assume control over the character R in his quest to collect MONEY. Why? Because money makes you feel good!

name: Warrior Blade: Rastan Saga Episode III
summary: Warrior Blade in the final game in the Rastan series by Taito. Unlike the Previous two games, Rastan III is a beat-em-up.

name: Wakfu: The Brotherhood
summary:
Embody the heroes of the Brotherhood of the Tofu and team up with your most trusted allies to defeat the waves of metal critters sent by Nox, the evil time master intent on absorbing Wakfu power from all living things.
Beat Nox and his robotic army, and stop his ruthless and deadly pursuit of life force and energy!

name: WarioWare: Move It!
summary:
Strike a pose with a multitude of motion-based microgames in a brand-new entry in the WarioWare series!
Grab a pair of Joy-Con controllers and get moving as you gently shake, punch, dance, wiggle, and even curtsey through over 200 lightning-fast microgames (minigames that last just a few hilarious seconds). A second player can use another set of Joy-Con controllers to join the treasure-guarding, sheep-twirling fun. Up to 4 players, each with one Joy-Con controller, can laugh out loud in the local Party Mode’s minigames like a dicey board game with Wario-style rules.

name: Wallace & Gromit Adventures
summary: Meet Wallace and Gromit! Mind-blowing adventures are waiting for you in Wallace and Gromit Adventures. Help Wallace complete the levels, collecting various objects and schemes for building crazy cars. The game has more than 10 worlds and 3 bosses.

name: WarWizard
summary:
WarWizard is a role-playing game in a medieval fantasy setting. The player takes on the role of a WarWizard, a powerful character skilled both in combat and magic arts.

As the story goes, a Dark WarWizard rose to rule the land. It is the player's task to recover the Ancient Armor that was used to defeat the previous dark WarWizard, and rid the land of the current menace. The player starts alone and must build up his skills and acquire equipment and resources. Eventually, up to three other characters may join the player's party.

name: WarWar Battle Kingdom
summary: An exciting game that requires you to plan and analyze the situation. Get ready for exciting battles, incredible opportunities and exciting challenges. Become a great warrior and win this exciting battle of the kingdoms!

name: War Room
summary: War Room is a action strategy game set in the Cold War conflict between the United States and Russia, which is escalating into a nuclear showdown. The player controls a satellite hovering above the USA, which are represented in a top down view. By destroying enemy satellites with his own satellite, the player has to prevent the destruction of cities in his territory and is able to score points. To keep his cities defensible, the player also has to collect supplies from those cities and distribute them accordingly. This is done by entering the cities with the satellite and collecting supplies in a action sequence. The game ends once all of the player's cities are destroyed.
developers: North American Philips Consumer Electronics Corp.
publishers: North American Philips Consumer Electronics Corp.

name: Warhawk
summary: Based on the original PlayStation game of the same name, Warhawk for the PlayStation 3 opts for team-based multiplayer action on the ground and in the air instead of single-player flight combat.

name: Wasteland Kings Together
summary:
It tweaks a couple of things, but, most importantly, adds local and online multiplayer support for up to 4 players.

Would be great to hear from you on what works, what doesn't, and whether you think that this kind of online multiplayer would suit the actual game.

name: Warframe: Jade Chorus Pack
summary: Pierce through suffocating darkness by adding the radiant songstress Warframe, Jade, along with her signature Customizations to your Arsenal!

name: Walk the Past VR
summary: Walk The Past VR is a narrated journey through history. Explore the fortifications and environments of the battle of Cartagena in 1741. Listen to an enthralling voice acted retelling of the events. Find objects around the locations, read beautifully written journals and discover all the landmarks.

name: Watercolor Hell
summary: A rouge-lite wave survival bullet hell focused on customizing weapons. Evolve weapon specializations from base weapons each run. Level up to compliment your next build with more projectiles, speed, and starting weapons. Complete chapters to get permanent stacking damage and new weapons.

name: Way Nd Choice
summary: Way Nd Choice is a game that combines a resource management adventure with a text adventure. Explore the world and complete the given objectives by consuming health, sanity, and gold appropriately. It's important to choose your options based on your tendencies.

name: Wall of Insanity
summary: Wall of Insanity is a single player campaign third-person shooter, with a large arsenal of weapons, crowds of various enemies and difficult locations, concealing many secrets.

name: Waveform Wipeout
summary: Waveform Wipeout combines the fast paced action of pulling off a sick combo of tricks with the novelty of rhythm games. The levels are generated based on the song you pick, so the possibilities are endless.

name: Way of the Samurai 2
summary: As a peaceful town becomes victim to extreme violence and unrest, a Samurai arrives with the ability to change the town's destiny. In Way of the Samurai 2, you'll take on the role of the Samurai in feudal Japan and battle to save the town of Amahara. Now you can experience traditional Samurai techniques, with realistic swordfighting moves and more than 60 powerful swords. Whether you free the innocent or join the corrupt, your decisions affect the game's ending.

name: War Job
summary: If there was the war between professions, which side would win? Chef, Cameraman, Police, Singer, Farmer or other professions…?Use silly weapons like a pan or a spade, balloon ,pencil, needle, chicken, buffalo... 20 different job Will create a chaotic surreal physics effects on funny match 5vs5.

name: Wagyan Land
summary: Wagyan Land is an Action game, developed by Now Production and published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 1989.

name: Wave Race
summary: Jump aboard your Personal Water Craft and hit the waves! Pick one of three versatile PWC's - the nimble 550cc, the speedy 650cc, or the high-powered 800cc National Class racer. Splash your way through 8 tracks in the racing circuit, or compete in 8 different breakneck slalom courses. Watch the spray fly as you leave your opponents swamped in your wake! Save your quickest lap and course times. Race to top your fastest speed, or challenge up to three of your friends with the Four Player Adapter and pour on the power!

name: Watermelon Simulator
summary: Watermelon Simulator is a game in which you can become a watermelon.

name: Way of the Passive Fist
summary: Way of the Passive Fist is a unique and colorful arcade brawler. Parry, Dodge and Dash to outwit and outlast your enemies on a desolate planet ruled by raiders, mutants and fanatical sun worshipers. It's a new kind of tactical fighting in the licensed arcade brawler for the 90s cartoon you wish existed.

name: Warlords DS
summary:
Originally planned for a Q2 2007 release, the game was announced as a version of Warlords 2 for the Nintendo DS. It was silently cancelled after the publisher, Strategy First, dropped the game and the developer was unable to find another publisher. News about the game was removed from the publisher's site after it missed its release window and included their other DS projects for Jagged Alliance and Disciples II.

Warlords DS is an eight player turn-based strategy game of conquest and empire. Different worlds provide a stage for the player to excel in combat. In the quest for final victory, gamers can assemble vast armies, conquer and loot mighty cities, undertake perilous quests, make and break alliances, and wield magical artifacts of great power. Although economics, diplomacy, and exploration weigh heavily in the outcome of each game, the primary emphasis is placed on combat.

name: Warp Frontier
summary: In the year 2215, orbiting humanity's newest extrasolar colony, Police Captain Vincent Cassini, becomes embroiled in an intersystem conspiracy to bury crimes that occurred during the war that devastated his planet.

name: Wayward Sky
summary:
Risk life and limb as you explore a mysterious floating fortress in search of your kidnapped father.
Take on the role of Bess, a young co-pilot who must navigate her way through puzzles and perilous pathways to find her father and escape the crumbling airborne fortress.

name: Warstone TD: Gold Edition
summary: Warstone is a Tower Defense game with RPG elements, strategy and city building. A dreaded chieftain is assembling an army intent on taking over the kingdom. The villagers call for a hero, help them stand up against the forces of this feared villain. The hero is you!

name: Waverly Hills
summary: A real-time exploration horror game. You will explore an abandoned hospital in the game and search for key items to escape from birth. Please beware of those fears from darkness and unknown.

name: Wanted?
summary: It's not often that you look closely at the faces of people you pass on the street, is it? It's no wonder that there are people near you who look exactly like the ones on the wanted list .This game will test your observational skills.

name: Way of Boy
summary: Way of Boy is a 2D action-adventure with elements of platformer and shooter. You are free to choose and imagine what your boy's path will be like as he regains power of his old hometown while echoes of the old regime remain...

name: War Thunder: Leopard 2A4 Pack
War of the Lilies: An Eons Lost Story
summary: Join two lesbian revolutionaries on their quest to restore peace to their fallen nation.

name: War Theatre: Blood of Winter
summary: From the developers of War Theatre comes the next series installment, Blood of Winter. In this free-to-start turn-based strategy RPG, return to Kasalli, where the Endless War continues to rage and powerful new forces converge to determine the fate of the world.

name: Wartales: The Pits
summary: Dive into the black markets where the wealthiest brigands in the Five Kingdoms hold secret battles. Engage in intense battles in this combat-focused content, designed to test your strategic and tactical skills. Will you be brave enough to face this challenge?

name: Watchmen: The End Is Nigh
summary:
Watchmen: The End Is Nigh is an episodic video game series that serves as a prequel to the film adaptation of the DC Comics limited series Watchmen.

The game allows players to take on the roles of either Rorschach or Nite Owl in single-player or cooperative multiplayer.

name: Waifu App: 90 Days to Escape a Lonely Fate
summary: Hiyori lives a very quiet and lonely life, but she decides enough is enough... She wants to change! And everything indeed changes when a spirit visits her and installs a strange app on her phone! The clock's ticking now... There are 90 days left!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Sanctus Reach - Horrors of the Warp
summary:
Warhammer 40,000: Sanctus Reach is back with a new expansion. You will lead the Space Wolves in the last chapter of the Sanctus Reach campaign: Logan Grimnar's chapter will once again show its valour in a 16 scenarios single player campaign. In the Horrors of the Warp campaign you will have to face a new dangerous threat: Chaos Daemons. You will need to adapt and tailor your tactics to face this implacable new enemy.

Chaos Daemons have also been added as a new playable faction in Skirmish, with many new units each devoted to a different Chaos god! Servants and champions of Nurgle, Slaanesh, Khorne and Tzeentch are ready to swarm over Orks and the Imperium alike, with new mighty abilities derived from the Warp. Hordes of Bloodletters, crazy Chaos Spawns, fetid Plague Drones, and infernal Soul Grinders… the pits of Chaos are deep.

name: Wanderjahr
summary:
Wanderjahr is a JRPG with real time combat and an intriguing story.
"This universe, this reality, there's a source code behind all of it. We'd know, we already found it."
"And with it, we will cleanse this reality of all evil."

name: Warriors Orochi
summary:
Without warning, the venomous Serpent King Orochi descended from the heavens. Using his unworldly powers to shatter time and space, Orochi kidnapped the strongest, wisest and most courageous warriors from Ancient China and Feudal Japan in a scheme to test his might against the heroes of these ages. In Warriors Orochi, the characters from Dynasty Warriors and Samurai Warriors must team-up to wage war against this new, yet powerful force.

Warriors Orochi for PSP is the first to boast the massive, seamless battlefields of the console versions -- previous games in the series for handheld platforms had combat taking place on battlefields divided into smaller "cells", but this game allows free roaming for realtime tactics and combat. The game also includes all 79 playable characters, and features 2-player co-op play via wireless (ad-hoc).

name: Waifu Impact
summary: Waifu Impact is a third person shooter, immersive single-player game in a paradisiac deserted island. Find all the stars and unlock the 6 beautiful girls! Increase your affinity with the girls defeating your enemies with them and then check out the gallery to see what they have for you!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II
summary: With a focus on fast-action RTS gameplay, Dawn of War II brings to life the science fiction universe of Warhammer 40,000 like never before. Experience the intimate brutality of battle as you play through your chosen race's epic campaign.

name: Wall protection
summary: Protect the kingdom wall. Summon mighty warriors! Each type of warrior has its own characteristics, some attack from afar, some slow down, some heal.

name: Wartune
summary: Wartune is a RPG + Strategic browser game, which received Facebook Staff Favorites in 2013 and Facebook's Top Asian Game Award in 2014. You can choose from 3 distinct classes, change your units, alter your formation, and adjust your tactics to defeat hundreds of enemies. You can also summon mighty warriors and mystical creatures to fight by your side. So you can enjoy the maximum visual experience.

name: Warlords Battlecry
summary: Warlords Battlecry, released in 2000 by Strategic Studies Group and published by SSI, is a real-time strategy game that combines resource management, tactical combat, and role-playing elements set in a fantasy world.

name: Warsow
summary: Warsow is set in a futuristic cartoonish world where rocketlauncher-wielding pigs and lasergun-carrying cyberpunks roam the streets. It is a completely free, fast-paced first-person shooter without hard graphical violence. Red stars instead of blood indicate hits and colored cubes replace guts as gib effects.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Armageddon - Da Orks
summary: In Warhammer 40,000: Armageddon - Da Orks, a new turn-based strategy game, players will lead the Orks against the Imperial forces of the Armageddon Steel Legion and Space Marines from a variety of Chapters, under a scorching sun, through hostile ash wastes, and in the shadows of gigantic Hive Cities.
